1-1-message:
\."Just a random question,
 but you know what a \C[2]majority vote\C[0] is?"

\."Ahaha, no need to get mad.
 It's helpful to start conversations
 with an easy question."

\."It's when people are deciding something,
 and the choice that gets picked by the most people
 is what gets used... Yeah, that."

\."I love majority votes! They represent the way
 democracy should be, following the will of the people!
 It's a method that minimizes conflict!"

\."I hate majority votes!
 They're just a way to silence the minority!
 It only makes more darkness build in the shadows!"

"*sigh*... Sounds like they're having
 some tedious argument."

\."Incidentally, whose opinion do you support?
 Mr. Blue's, or Ms. Red's?"

\."But good for you!
 Your opinion had more supporters!"

\."In the end, the majority is absolute!
 That's just the way it goes in society!"

\."But good for you!
 Your opinion had more supporters!"

\."With that experience, your side's learned
 the terror of a majority vote."

\."If that makes you happy, then don't you have to
 recognize the appeal of majority votes?"

\."...Hmm? What's with that look?
\! If you'd known the other person would die,
 you wouldn't have voted?"

\."C'mon... That won't get you anywhere, okay?
 It's what the game is all about..."

\."Alright, if you insist, let's hold a vote!
 Your opinion versus mine!"
4-1-message:
\."Good day.
 Congratulations on beating the game for now!"

\."Currently, the game has only
 been released up to Part One (here)."

\."It's planned for future updates to
 add a Part Two scenario, make fixes to Part One,
 and gradually improve events."

\."Also, be aware that pre-update save data
 may stop working due to fixes."

\."Incidentally, I believe if you save here, you'll be
 able to go right into Part Two once it's added!
 ...Will you save?"

\."If you like, it would be helpful if you gave
 reports on errors you encountered or your thoughts.
 Thanks in advance!"

\.* PS: "Thanks to your aid, several serious errors
 have been fixed by now! Thank you very much!
 Being a personal project, it's slow going,
 but seeing predictions of the story is a blessing."

\."Now then, you'll be returned to the title screen.
 Is this okay?"
\."Thank you for playing to the end."

1-1-message: \.Because I was sleeping with my head on my desk...
\.This late already...? I have to go home...
Touch spots that look interesting to investigate.
1-3-message:
\.\C[4](Seeing the school like this...
 It feels totally different at night.)
\.\C[4](...I have to walk home when it's this dark...?)
14-1-message: \C[3]The campus pond.

\.\C[3]There's a rumor that if you look into it at midnight,
your reflection will talk to you.
\.\C[4](...Could be a great thing to a loner.)

\C[3]The lights are on.
Maybe it's the guard.

Can't go home without going through it.

\C[3]The front gate of the school.

17-3-message:
\C[2]Jou Tazuna\C[0], or rather, \C[2]Joe\C[0]. My classmate at school.
We often found ourselves together.

"You stuck around this late for clubs?!
 I was gonna wither up from waiting!"

"Well, it's fine! Listen!
 There's something I wanna tell you!"

\."Oh, you know! You introduced us, right?!
 Me and Ryoko!"
\."She's such a good girl! I'm totally moved!"

\."And I saw her swallow a doner kebab whole today!
 She's a real glutton to boot!"
\."Wahaha... Was on it 'til just a second ago!"

\."I came back to school
 so I could brag about it to ya!"

1-1-message:
"Drumroll... We held hands...!
 Isn't that great?"

\."Doing that on the first date...
 That'd just be monstrous!"

\."I mean... It was mostly that I fell in a ditch
 and she was helping me out, but...!"
\."For looking like such a flirt, you're awfully shy..."
\."I'm hurt, man... That seriously gets to me..."

\."Dammit... Maybe I should go back to
 the crew cut I had in middle school..."
1-1-choice:
I don't care
Did you kiss or what?
1-3-message:
\.\C[4](I've rarely ever walked home at this hour...
 It feels really dark...)

"On second thought, you'd probably crush me
 with that amazing grip of yours.
 Nah, forget it, Sara!"
\.\C[4](It's not like I'm boasting about it...)
"I'm just kidding! Don't actually get mad at me."

\."But real talk...
 Wouldn't it help things if you got a boyfriend?"
"Is that... why you always go home with me?"
\."D... Dummy... I just wanted to brag..."

\."...Nothin' to apologize for.
 'Cause I told you, it's not like that!"
\."I didn't mean it like an apology..."

\."For what, man?! Well, if you just
 feel like bein' grateful, I won't stop ya!"

\."Heheh! Prepare yourself to be bothered,
 day after day!"
\."Your parents'll be worried if you're late."
1-3-choice:
Sorry
Thank you
It's a bother

"Joe! Run!"

1-1-message:
\."I-It's okay.
 Should be fine now that we're here."

\."I'm relieved...
 If I'd gone home by myself..."
\."I'm so scared... Am I going to..."
\."I'm not gonna let that happen, okay?!"
\."I'll come with a boatload of freshmen!"
\.\C[4](He was trying to talk to me...?)

\.\C[3]On this night, the two of them would be
wrapped up in a major incident...
\.\C[3]To be continued in Death Game By Majority (TBD)...

\.So after this in the story, you find your parents
collapsed, encounter the stalker in your room, faint,
and wake up in an unfamiliar place, a Death Game...
                                  That sort of thing.

\.In the Death Game:
1. You gather items ala the earlier exploration part.
2. You have discussions with characters using
   a discussion system to advance the story.

\.This mockup allows you to experience just a taste
of the discussion system, so come over to the grounds.

1-1-message:
\.\C[4](I'm \C[2]Sara\C[4].
 An... incredibly normal person attending school.)
\.\C[4](Good... Start with what you know best.)
\.\C[3]I quickly tried to sit up, but I couldn't.
\.\C[3]It was some kind of belt... or machine...
\.\C[4](Right now... It seems I'm lying down.)
\.\C[4](What is this thing on my head...?)
\."No way... Ack... What's the meaning of this?!"

\.\C[3]Besides my head, my left arm, torso, and legs
also seemed to be restrained.
\.\C[3]All I could move was my right arm.
\.\C[3]I was about to scream, then went quiet.
\."Joe! Is that you?! Are you next to me...?!"

\."Yeah...! But I can't move!
 Can't you do something?!"

\C[3]I searched my pocket with my free hand,
but found nothing.

\."Sara, and, Joe.
 Find the \C[2]key\C[0] hidden in this room.
\! Then, remove your restraints."

\."If you cannot do so before the time limit expires,
 the device on the beds will activate..."
\."And your bodies will be crushed with a thud."

\."By all means, please enjoy this thrill
 with all your body and soul."
\."The time limit is a healthy 5 minutes."

\."And note that there is only \C[2]one\C[0] key,
 so please discuss who will use it."
\.\C[4](There's no time to fret about that...!)

\C[3]I searched my pocket with my free hand,
but found nothing.

\."When I took the phone from my pocket...
 I might've \C[2]dropped somethin'\C[0]...!"

\.\C[4](If that voice was telling the truth...
 I might die...!)
\."Joe, I'm sure you can figure something out!"

\.\C[4](Dammit... That took some time!
 I need to save Sara somehow!)
1-1-choice:
Touch it to check
Think calmly

Use that key!
Give me that key!

\.\C[4](Why doesn't this key fit, anyway?!

\."I... Is this the right time to be gazing at me?"

\.\C[4](The door isn't locked...
 But I can't leave Sara behind!)
58-1-message:
\C[3]Restraints are set up around the bed.
They can't be broken by force.

1-1-message:
"Left is a dead end...
 Seems we can only go right."

"N... No joking around, Sara!
 We got away, but somebody might come catch us!"
\."I mean it, Sara, don't let us get separated."
\.\C[3]But as far as we walked, we didn't see any light.

\.\C[3]It seemed to be a very... very long hallway.
Or maybe we weren't advancing much at all...

"That phone you used earlier...
 Could you try using that to light the way?"
\."Hmm... What can give us some light...?"

"I don't hear anyone around. Wouldn't it be good
 to run before someone comes?"

\."...Can't say I'm a fan, but...
 If you think so, I'm on board!"
\.\C[3]Just as we were about to run, suddenly...
1-1-choice:
Go along the wall
We should stay put

Use the phone for light
Let's be bold and run

1-1-message: \."You can't sit there stupefied forever, miss."

"Who the hell're you guys?!
 Where even is this?!"

\."Like we've got any idea ourselves!
 Calm down, lady!"
\."Is there no one here who can explain?!"
\."Just what is going on...? How troubling..."
\.\C[3]They seem too distracted to take any notice of me.
2-1-message:
\C[3]In the center, there's a discussion happening
centered around a single man.

"Now hold on a second!
 We should confirm what each of us knows."

"That's all well and good...
 But I don't even know where this is!"

"I had quite a terrible experience earlier...
 So I can't remain calm... Mwahaha."
\.\C[3]With a shiver, I touched my own neck.
\.\C[3]Everyone here had a collar put on them...!
2-2-message:
\C[3]The discussion centered around
the man in the middle continues.
\.\C[4](Joe's there too, but he can't get a word in.)
2-3-message: \.\C[3]Finally, my head was starting to clear.
\.\C[4](...Why isn't Joe coming over to me?)

\."Maybe that was too much force...
\! Joe! So you're okay!"

\."What are you saying?! I'm Sara!
 Did you forget your own friend's face?!"

\.\C[4](Don't tell me... He's seriously saying
 he doesn't know me or something...?)
\."Could you be the Sara who's a terrible swimmer?"

\."J... Joe!
 This is not the time for jokes!!"

\."Thanks for that.
 Joe here wasn't speaking up, see..."

\."Must've been wary of something...
 Wouldn't even tell me his name."
\."I bet we're all thinking the same thing."

\."What is this place?
 Why was I brought here?"
\."And about all you know is who you are."
\."What are you getting at, I wonder...?"

\."How about we \C[2]give introductions\C[0]?
 Should ease the suspicion a little, at least."
\."Not a whole lot else we can do."
\."True... I want to clear up our situation."
\."...See, the calm ones know what to say."

\."I'd prefer if you didn't immediately
 get on a first-name basis with me..."

\."All the more reason to introduce yourself.
 'Cause I've got no other basis to use."

\."Okay, once you're ready, it's introduction time.
 Just tell me when, Sara."
2-3-choice:
Call for Joe
Run up and punch Joe

I support it
Don't get friendly with me
2-4-message: "Right then. Time to give introductions?"
"Okie-dokie."
3-1-message: \C[3]Looking right, I notice an especially restless woman.

"Graaah!! We've been abducted!
 By some crazy assholes!!"
\."Be quiet, meow!! Don't scream in my ear, woof!!"
\.\C[3]I could feel the tension in the air.
3-2-message: \C[3]I can feel the tension in the air.
4-1-message: \C[3]Some slightly calmer people are talking on the left.

"What's goin' on...?
 Feels like we're wrapped up in somethin' outrageous."
"Yes... It would appear so."
\.\C[4](Huh... Have I seen this person somewhere...?)
\.\C[3]The girl squatting seems terribly frightened.
\.\C[4](Did something happen...?!)
4-2-message: \C[3]There's two men keeping a watchful eye...
\C[3]And a terrified girl.
\.\C[4](That's no ordinary sort of fear...)

1-1-message:
"Ahem... So then, I think we should all
 get to know each other a li'l more."

\."Myeow so? Mom tells me not to give personal info
 to strange guys I don't know, woof!"

\."Stupendous! A level-headed child
 who does as his parents teach him!"
\."Yet, this is indeed an emergency... Hrmmm."

\."Then we must prove that we adults
 are not suspicious characters... Mwahaha..."
\."Nothing for it. Well, where should we start?"
1-3-message: \."Ah... I should introduce myself too soon, huh."

\."Fine, I can read the room, woof!
 It's, you know, the mature response, meow!"

2-1-message: \C[3]Nao and Reko are looking after a fainted Kanna.

"Sara, come runnin' if you're in danger, alright?
 Feel free to leave the heavy lifting to the guys."

\."Then again, the scrawny beanie kid doesn't
 look so tough himself... You better run too."
11-1-message: \C[3]There are many exits out of the room.

\C[3]Taking a look through them,
most seem to lead to dead-end passages.
"You see those huge cushions in the dead ends?"

\."I wonder... When I fell,
 did I land on one of those cushions?"

\."Same for me.
 I bet all of us fell in a similar way."
\."Joe came carrying you into the hall here."
\."Didn't imagine you two would be friends, though."
11-2-message: \C[3]There are many exits out of the room.
11-3-message: \C[3]There are many exits out of the room.

A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
What's the large hole in the center for...?

 Can I fire the dart with this now?)

2-1-message:
\."Seems to be a lot of alcohol present...
 But you're underage, so keep away, miss Sara."

\."You'd better not drink
 at a time like this either, Sou."

\."On the other hand, some might say
 there's no better time to drink."
3-1-message: \C[3]Professor Mishima's inspecting every inch of the room.
\."Please tell me if you need anything, miss Sara."
\C[3]Professor Mishima's inspecting every inch of the room.

\."Have you encountered any dangers?
 Please take utmost caution... Yes..."

\."That cigar!
 A minor can't be carrying around such a thing!"

\."I wasn't going to smoke it!
 I thought it might be a clue..."
\."Is that so... Apologies for my suspicion."

\."Hm... It seems I slip into teaching mode
 whenever I see a student."

\."However... Err, well... Let's see...
 Yes, could you let me hold onto that?"
\.\C[4](I'm telling you I won't smoke it...)
\.\C[3]Handed the Cigar over to Professor Mishima.
\."Precisely. It's a tool used for smoking cigars."
\."...You won't be smoking, will you, miss Sara?"
\."Ah, well... Then... err... Could I take it?"

\."Uh... Professor Mishima,
 are you going to smoke a cigar?"

\."O-O-Out of the question!
 For a teacher to smoke...!"
\.\C[4](As long as you're an adult, I think it's fine...)
\.\C[3]Handed the Cigar Cutter over to Professor Mishima.
\."Perhaps... you mean to light up a..."
\."Hm... Then... Err... Could I hang on to it?"
\.\C[3]Handed the Lighter over to Professor Mishima.
3-2-message:
\."W-W-W-What are you speaking of?!
 There's nothing...! Indeed...!"
\."Like, maybe... You're happy about the cigar?"

\."Ooghhh...!
 A teacher like myself would not smoke...!"
\."Might not be something you can buy in Japan..."
\."Should someone put it back where it was?"

\."What in the world are you saying?!
 ...Ah, err... well..."

\."I know! Perhaps it would be good
 to inspect the cigar first! Yes!"

\."I wonder... Is that cigar really just
 a luxury item being provided to us?"
\."Would you let me inspect it a little?"

\."I get it... That's true.
 We should investigate it closely."
\."Hmm... Let us try using the cutter on this cigar."
\.\C[3]Professor Mishima cuts it with a practiced hand.
\.\C[3]Amazingly, there was a bill inside the cigar.
\."Aha...! It seems it wasn't a real cigar!"
\."What a relief. Smoking is bad for you, after all."

\."Miss Sara, please take the unused lighter
 and this 1000-yen bill."

\."When I really think about it,
 you will likely find more use for them."
\.\C[4](...So he did intend to use the lighter.)
3-2-choice:
Incite him
I want to inspect the cigar
3-3-message: "Please depend on me anytime, miss Sara."
4-1-message: \C[3]Gin is searching at a low eye-level.
"Bars are just full of alcohol, meow."

\."I hate alcohol, woof!
 And I hate my drunkard dad more, meow!"
\."What...? You've got a quiet look, woof."
\."...Nah, it's nothin'!"

\."Hey, once we get out of here,
 let's play together, Gin!"

\."Huh! Then I'll beat you up in video games
 'til you're crying, woof!"
\."Your dad has a bad drinking habit?"
\."He's an annoyance, woof!"

\."When you drink, you gotta be sure
 not to get swallowed up yourself."
\."I'm drinking age, too... I ought to be careful."

\."Could this be..."

 Right, there was that note in there."

\."Will that make something happen?"
\."It might. Which is a little scary..."

 A... Ahaha..."

1-1-message:
\."Seems to sell cigarettes.
 And in the back is a smoking area, I guess...?"

\."Don't buy any if you're underage, of course.
 Can't go turning you into a delinquent, miss Sara."
\.\C[4](Even lots of delinquents don't smoke, honestly...)
1-3-message: \."H-Hey, is it okay for you to be up?"
\."I just... really wanted to ask you..."

\."Back then... could Kanna have...
\! actually saved her sister...?"

\."I was disoriented...
 so I didn't hear what everyone else said."

\."But you and Joe... and Mishima and Nao...
 You all had the same trial, right...?"
\C[3]I was about to tell her the truth, when...
\C[3]I was about to lie, hoping to relieve her, when...
\C[3]Joe was about to say something, when...

\."Oh my, miss Kanna.
 Reko and Nao were looking for you, you know?"
\."I heard you talking here, so I came over."
\."Because we only had one key, we..."
\."We had to remove the other restraints \C[2]by force\C[0]."

\."...Luckily, miss Nao had myself,
 and miss Sara had Joe."

\."Due to our having \C[2]a strong man\C[0],
 we barely managed to survive."
\."N... No...! That's a lie... It can't be..."
\."I... It's not a lie! This is the truth, Kanna!"

\."I suppose it was a trial of...
 both assessing the situation, and of might."

\."For you and your sister...
 It was a trial with hardly any chance of success..."

\."I... I don't believe it! I won't!
 You're all trying to deceive me..."

\."E... Even if it sounds like a lie...
 It won't change the reality..."

\."Her sister was frantically trying to help!
 But Kanna's an idiot... She didn't listen...!!"
\."Even when we fought... she'd never be cruel...!"
\."Why... didn't she use the key for herself...?!"

\."Was it not that your very existence
 gave your sister happiness?"

\."Miss Kanna, I can sense that you were loved,
 as if it were in the very air."

\."Surely... Surely, you were raised
 with the utmost care, were you not?"
\."I'm sure she was a wonderful sister."

\."Miss Sara, if you were her sister,
 what would you say to her?"

\."You being there...
 let me be strong even in hard times."

\."I'm sure... Even if we're apart,
 I'll be there somewhere in your heart. So..."

\."When you smile, it makes me happy,
 and when you cry, it makes me sad."

\."As your big sister...
 Let me protect the little sister I cherish."
\."The fact you're alive... makes me happy!"

\."Now, the time for blaming yourself has passed.
 Your sister is surely watching you from somewhere."

\."Dammit, you nutty professor!
 What happened to "shout when you find her"?!"
\."Oh dear, it appears I'm being yelled at."

\."That's not it, Reko. See, um...
 Let's go and I'll explain, okay?"

\."Am I now?
 ...What a hopeless adult I've become..."

\."It's thanks to you two following along
 that I was able to make something of it."

\."Miss Sara. Do you understand
 why miss Kanna came to talk to you?"

\."It's surely because you resemble her sister.
 That is why she wanted to hear it from you."

\."Until we can leave here... Please take the role
 of miss Kanna's big sister for her."
\.\C[4](I wonder if... I can do a thing like that...)

"It's got a high-class feel, huh?"

38-1-message: \C[3]The back seems to be a smoking area.

1-1-message: There are human-shaped figures sitting in the chairs.
"Let's get closer and check them out..."
1-3-message: \."No... There's still plenty I don't get."

\."What's especially strange to me
 is how there were a gun and bullets in this room."

\."What meaning could there be to
 the kidnappers giving us a weapon...?"

\."A weapon that puts one person at an advantage...
 Who'd wanna hand that over to someone else?"

\.\C[4](A fight over the weapon...
 Yeah, that is plausible.)

\."But we've got good ol' Sara with us,
 so we won't fall for that trap."
\."...Why do you trust me so much?"

\.\C[4](...Keiji's been intentionally guiding everyone
 to put their trust in me.)

\."Didn't expect you to respond to a compliment
 with such a dubious look."

\."Oh right, Keiji.
 I found these dummy bullets in the cafeteria."
\C[3]Now... What to do while he's investigating?
1-5-message: \C[4](I guess I'll search elsewhere...)
"Oh, Sara. Hold on a sec..."
\.\C[3]Before leaving the room, I turned around, and...
"Huh? Miss Sara, aren't you coming?"

"Waugh...?!\.\.
 What the?!"
\."Miss Sara! Are you okay?!"

\.\C[3]Iron bars appeared over the door,
separating me from Sou...!
\.\C[4](We've been locked in?!)

\."It won't open...!
 I... I'll look for something to pry with!"
\."Well, this sure is bad."
\."Sara! You hurt?!"
\."No... I'm okay, but..."

\."Dammit, it's a trap!
 Who knows what'll happen! Stay alert!"
\.\sw[99]"Hey now, don't put yourselves so on guard."\sw[100]
\."Wha?! Whose voice was that?!"

\.\sw[99]"Ha ha ha.
 Don't sweat the details."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"I'm the master of this room.
 You can call me Meister."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"Now, to get right to it,
 lemme explain the rules of the next game."\sw[100]
\."T... The rules...?"

\.\sw[99]"Well, of course! You wanna stake your life
 without even knowin' the rules?!
 You're a real character, man!"\sw[100]
\."Stake... my life?"

\.\sw[99]"This one's simple! Right now,
 there's you \C[2]five\C[0] humans in this room, right?"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"Glance around the room...!
 There's \C[2]four\C[0] open seats."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"One will be the Challenger,
 and the other four'll sit down and be targets."\sw[100]
\."Targets...? Targets fer what?!"

\.\sw[99]"Well, I gave ya that cool weapon
 here in this room, didn't I?"\sw[100]
\."W... We're gonna be targets for a revolver?!"

\."And? What are the rules to this?
 Surely there's an outcome where nobody dies."

\.\sw[99]"Ha ha ha! Naturally!
 A regular deathtrap is just old-hat, get me?"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"But, see... First you'll have to
 \C[2]decide who'll be the Challenger\C[0] for me."\sw[100]

\."You're tellin' us to decide who's gonna shoot
 without knowin' what the game is?!
 Who's gonna want to be the targets?!"
\."Will the Challenger be safe?"

\.\sw[99]"Yep! Only the targets get to relish the thrill!
 What a shame!"\sw[100]
\."Sara, can I ask you to be the Challenger?"

\."D... Don't kid me!
 Ya can't decide that all on yer own!"

\."I suppose it may not be proper
 to make a young girl handle a gun..."

\."I'm in favor of it myself.
 Sara's got a clear head."
\."Well, Sara? You confident?"
\."Confident...?"
\.\C[4](In that trial, he did what I counted on him to do...)
\.\C[4](Now, he's making a request of me...!)
\.\C[4](I'll handle this...! Definitely!)
\.\C[4](In that trial, he did what I counted on him to do...)
\.\C[4](Now, he's making a request of me...!)
\.\C[4](I can't possibly tell him I'm not confident!!)
\."...Please, let me do it."
\."No way. Can't approve'a that."

\."'Snot like I don't trust ya...
 Don't think badly of me."
\."...Holding it to \C[2]a vote\C[0]..."\|
\."Perhaps... that is the best way to settle this."

\."Why don't we discuss it,
 and then hold a majority vote?"
\."Yeah... Might be the only way."
\."...Gotcha. Let's do it."

\."Talk to me when you're all set.
 I'll be standing right here."
2-1-message: "Sure is a suspicious place, I tell you what."
\."Jus' gettin' a big ol' view of the room."

\."But these guys... They're checkin' every corner,
 no hesitation... Ain't they scared of traps?"
2-2-message: "Well now... Doesn't seem there's security cameras."
3-1-message: "Wonder what this big painting is for?"
\."Maybe try taking it off the wall."

\."I think I'll check the easy things first,
 like these chairs."

\."Besides, Sara,
 it's just barely out of your reach, huh?"

\."Hey, I grew a centimeter since last year.
 Don't take me lightly!"
3-2-message: "Ahaha, I'm glad you remembered my name."

\."'Course, man!
 Keep watch of Sara for me!"

\."...Ahaha. I think I need to worry more
 about not dragging her down."
3-3-message: "I tried taking this painting off the wall earlier..."
\."But it's stuck on there tight, so no dice."
4-1-message: "Hey, Sara. Put out your hand."
\.\C[3]Received 3 bullets.
\."Wait, these are..."

\."No, they're not mine.
 Found 'em while checking the seats."

\."I've... never seen these in real life.
 Are these real bullets?"

\."Probably. Dangerous stuff.
 So would you take 'em?"
\."Joe'll get antsy if I have 'em."
\."That said, I can't give them to Joe either."
\."So I'm counting on ya, Sara."
4-2-message: "I'll take a close look at these dummy bullets."
\."Just gimme a little time."

"Alright... Better be a good policeman
 and look around a little more."
\."You keep it up too, you two."
5-1-message: "It would appear this is a doll."
\."When I shake it, I hear this... sloshing sound."

\."Perhaps the kidnappers' aim is to have us
 stick a straw in here for hydration
 when we find ourselves thirsty."

\."...Apologies.
 I was trying to tell a joke."
5-2-message: "I will search diligently."

 You shouldn't let it leave your sight."

 But definitely don't hand it over to someone else."

1-1-message:
"Alright, let's discuss who's gonna
 take the role of Challenger."

\."Once we've settled our opinions,
 we'll hold a vote at the end."

\."You know what's up!
 Show Q-taro what makes you worth trusting!"
1-13-message: "*pant*, *gasp*... I'm exhausted..."

\.\C[4](Me too...
 I've never strained my voice so much before.)

\."Bein' honest and arguin' it out
 is kinda refreshing, though."

\."Well, the discussion's settled down.
 Shall we have our vote soon?"

\."Right. Sorry, know you two are tired,
 but let's get started."
\>    Sara: 4 votes                    Q-taro: 1 vote\<\|
\>    Sara: 3 votes                    Q-taro: 2 votes\<\|
"Well... Seems it's decided."
\."There'd be no objections, right?"
\."Hahaha! Naturally!"

\."Sara, ain't hardly any kids these days
 who can make 'emselves as clear as you."
\."I feel like I can bet on ya!"
\."Hahaha! Can't help that!"

\."Sara, gotta admit that I couldn't
 trust you much from yer words..."
\."But you've got two guys who believe in ya."

\."So don't let 'em down!
 You do that fer me, an' I'll trust ya too!"
\."What a cool thing to say."

\."Man, lookin' at you guys
 just makes me feel like I'm bein' selfish."

\."Alright! Good luck with the rest, Sara!
 It's all riding on you!"

\."...Right!
 Leave it to me!"
\."Well then, shall we take our seats?"

\.\C[4](...Now's not the time to think about
 the meaning of Kai's vote...)
\.\C[4](Things are just about to get started!)

\.\C[4](...Okay. Once I've prepared myself,
 I'll talk to \C[2]the man in the painting\C[4].)
3-1-message: "My age or being a high-schooler shouldn't matter!"

\."Then if a grade-schooler like Gin were here,
 would you have him do it?!"

"Keiji said earlier that skill with a gun
 is irrelevant here!"
\."I don't have experience, but I can think calmly!"
\."I wonder! People can say anything they like!"
\.\C[4](I... can't explain something like that, can I?!)
3-3-message:
"Keiji's trauma means he isn't even able
 to point a gun at a person!"

\."Would you put your life in the hands
 of someone who wouldn't trust himself?!"

"Joe's entrusting it to me!
 You can't make him shoot!"

\."And he's got manly strength!
 You got the might to support a gun barrel, Sara?!"
"Are you seriously going to ask Kai?!"

\."To me, there's no difference
 between askin' you and askin' Kai!"
\."In fact, Kai's the most level-headed! Right?!"
\."I don't know about level-headed... He's just weird!"
\."You're a pretty weird high school girl yerself!"
3-5-message:
"That's wrong! Without motivation,
 you can't remain positive!"

\."You sayin' the power of positivity
 will give ya the wisdom to beat the game?!"
\."Ya can't prove that!"
\.\C[4](That was a failure...!)
"It's not that I distrust you, Q-taro!"
\."Then would you let me be the Challenger?"
\."Show it with yer actions, not words!"
\.\C[4](That was a failure...!)
"I do!"

\."I can say this much loud and clear!
 I'm confident I can save everyone!"

\."...No value in trustin' yer life
 to somebody with no confidence."

\."If even this doesn't freak ya,
 that's nothin' to sneeze at!"
3-7-message: "Joe and Keiji have acknowledged me from the start!"
\."And even now, that hasn't been shaken!"
"No matter how bad they are... I'll conquer them!"
\."What can a physically weak high-schooler do?!"
\."No guarantee wisdom alone'll get ya through!"

\."What if a tiger or a lion showed up?!
 Could you protect us?!"

\.\C[4](Without knowing what the game entails,
 I have no way to refute it...!)
3-9-message: "That's not true! I trust you all!"
\."Then why not leave it to somebody else?!"
"There is! I'll absolutely win this game!"
\."You ain't gonna persuade me by emotion!"
"That's exactly why I definitely won't mess this up!"

\."Not only Joe, but Q-taro, Keiji, Kai...
 I won't let any of your lives be taken!"

\."Q-taro, right now... You can't possibly feel
 a stronger determination than me!"

\."...You got a point there.
 To me, you're strangers I just met, all of ya."

\."Can I bet on...
 your desire to save your friend...?"
4-2-message: "Looks like you've got nothin' to say!"
\.\C[4](Shoot...! I messed that up!)
4-4-message: "Looks like you've got nothin' to say!"
\.\C[4](Shoot...! I messed that up!)
4-6-message: "Looks like you've got nothin' to say!"
4-8-message: "Looks like you've got nothin' to say!"
4-10-message: "Looks like you've got nothin' to say!"

3-4-message: \.\sw[99]"Fantastic! Now that's a job well done!"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"Seems a puzzle like this
 was a piece of cake for you!"\sw[100]

\sw[99]"Be glad! And accept it!
 See ya!"\sw[100]

\."I changed my mind on you!
 Honestly, I regret makin' light of you!"

\."It's artificial. ...What a cruel trick!
 It came falling down from above!"
\."Seems relevant to that note with the doll's head."
\."So... it'd be a good idea to take this along?"
\."Guess we gotta. I'll carry it in this box."
\C[3]Q-taro put the arm in the box.

\."Okay, we've got a clue of sorts.
 Let's get outta here."

\."Oh well, I guess...
 Sara, you were with Sou, right?"

\."It's dangerous to be alone,
 so I'll search together with you."
\."Ahh, you're too good to settle for me, Sara."
\."I'll keep shabbily tagging with Q-taro and Kai."
\."Well then, I'll put up with Joe."
\."I'm at least as good as a pebble on the ground!"

\."Whazzat? You must've got pretty fond of me
 after that flashy argument we had."
\."Nah, I'm gonna keep searching with Kai for now."
\."Well then, I'll put up with Joe."
\."I'm at least as good as a pebble on the ground!"

\."Me...?
 I'm glad you find me dependable, but..."

\."Should you not ask Joe?
 He's a friend who knows you well, yes?"
\."Well then, I'll put up with Joe."
\."I'm at least as good as a pebble on the ground!"
\."Ah, hold on! You got a second...?"

\."Allow me to state my gratitude
 for taking on such an important role."

\."Thank you very much for saving us
 amid such great pressure."
\."Miss Sara, you are no average high schooler."
\."But what's truly superb is your heart."
\."Indeed, you have a mind of steel."
\."However... Overdoing it brings harm to yourself."
\."Come to think of it, Kai, why did you..."
\.\C[3]I can hardly get any words out...
\.\C[3]I can't let him suspect me. I can't let him realize...
\."It's okay... I just felt a little drained..."
\."Don't push it! Lean on my shoulder and we'll rest."

\."Let's walk...
 I feel like I'll calm down if we walk..."

\."In exchange... If I say any complaints...
 You better come help me right away."

\."...So you're energetic enough to order people around.
\! Fine, complain anytime!"
3-4-choice:
Thank you
I'd prefer Keiji
I'd prefer Q-taro
I'd prefer Kai

Don't mention it
It's only natural
4-1-message: \sw[99]"Yo. That took forever."\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]"Is it okay for me to give the rules now?"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"You found the gun and the bullets
 in this room earlier, right?"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"And you should've also found
 dummy bullets in a different room."\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]"You've got \C[2]3 live bullets\C[0] and \C[3]6 dummies\C[0]."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"That's a total of 9 bullets
 you can load into this revolver."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"You gotta fire all 9 bullets into everyone -
 \C[2]human\C[0] and \C[2]doll\C[0] - in \C[2]any order you like\C[0]."\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]"Also, the bullets are fired in \C[2]clockwise order\C[0]..."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"But once you load 'em, the barrel'll spin and stop!
 Which means \C[2]the starting bullet is a mystery\C[0]!"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"If you fire all the bullets
 and all the humans survive, you win!"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"I call it \C[2]Russian Roulette\C[0]!
\! ...'Cause that's just what it is."\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]"Want another quick summary of that?"\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"Load the 3 live bullets and 6 dummy bullets
 into the gun however you like."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"The bullets are fired going clockwise,
 but the start point is random."\sw[100]

\.\sw[99]"Shoot whichever humans or dolls you like!
 If all humans survive, you win!"\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]"Alright! Then let's begin!"\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]"First, load up the gun how you like it!"\sw[100]

1-1-message: \."Hey, actually... Where have you even been?"

\."My heart is beating fast...
 What could possibly happen...?"
\."I got the door open just in case."
\."Well, onto the fateful moment... Let's roll."

\C[3]Keiji skillfully attached the parts
to the doll torso placed there...
\.\C[3]The right arm... left arm... right leg... left leg...
\."Hey... Is it just me, or is the room going white?!"

\."P... Poison...?!
 Not good... We need to leave the room...!"

\.\C[3]But the white gas filled up the room
in the blink of an eye.
\.\C[3]I can't even see past my own hands.
\."It's not poison gas, everyone, so please relax."

\."Heeheehee... Yes, I am the doll
 that you just rescued. Advanced, am I not?"

\."Ahaha. As it happens, I have revived to tell you
 what is happening, and support you through
 the trials and tribulations to come."
\."Stay away from me, you creepy-ass puppet!!"

\."Ehehe. There's nothing to fear, you see?
 I will offer you my full support..."

\."Ahaha... My word, is there no one
 who can speak calmly here?"

\.\C[4](It's a step too far to ask someone
 not to be surprised when a doll starts talking...)
\."I'm gonna ask!! Just what are you?!?"

\."Fill in the policeman here, too.
 I'm not really following..."
\."Ehehe. Then we'll begin with my introduction..."

\."Heehee. My name is \C[2]Sue Miley, the Laughing Doll\C[0].
 I am the doll who will guide you on this floor."

\."Ehee. My master has instructed me to
 guide you brave souls, who have already
 overcome several trials, to the Main Game."

\."Your master... In other words,
 you're on the side of the kidnappers."

\."S... So you're our enemy?!
 Don't try and say you're not!!"

\."Heehee... I'd rather not...
 No, I wouldn't like to be all torn up again..."

\."Ehee... heehee... I know...
 I just have to tear you up first..."

\."Ehehe. Anyone will do, heehee.
 If it'll make you quiet..."
\."I'm just \C[10]making your collar explode\C[0]. Ahaha, ahah."
\."Gh... Get it off... get this thing...!!"
\."Ahaha! Get away, get away! It's dangerooous!"

\."...That was a lie, of course. Eheehee...
 Did you enjoy it?"
\.\C[3]Joe's knees gave out, and he collapsed on the floor.

\."Eheh, it's so funny, ahah, I can't, heehee,
 even talk, mweeheeheehee..."
\.\C[4](Out of her mind... or not human to begin with?)
\.\C[4](But... it seems we should do as she says...!)

\."Eheehee. What I'm about to explain...
 is in regards a fight you must take, ahaha,
 for your own destiny."

\."Eheehee. What I'm about to explain...
 is in regards a fight you must take, ahaha,
 for your own destiny."

\."You will soon undergo a great trial
 in order to escape outside."

\."As it has been prior, the superior will live,
 and the inferior will die - it is far from easy."
\."Shall be decided by your own \C[2]majority vote\C[0]."
\."I'm saying that you'll pick it yourselves."

\."The one most unnecessary, hated,
 and acceptable to have die."

\."Stop talkin' nonsense...!!
 Like we're gonna do somethin' like that!!"

\."Ahaha. Then by all means,
 starve to death here, all of you."
\."Whoa, just laying it on the table."
\.\C[4](What... What is she saying? I can't comprehend...)
\.\C[3]Not one of us could speak up anymore.

\.\C[3]We would kill one of these people, stuck in
the same situation...? Who we had considered allies?
\.\C[3]Or else... we would be killed by them...?

\."Ahaha, don't go so pale, everyone!
 I've got something good to hand out!"

\.\C[3]My head won't work...
I hardly understand what she's saying...
\."Ahaha. Here, Sara Chidouin, have this tablet."

\."Ehehe, does everyone have one now?
 Let us test the functionality with some actual use."

\."When voting, if you know who voted for who,
 it turns into a quarrel, doesn't it?"

\."Eheehee... Thus, by voting with these tablets,
 you won't know who made what vote."
\."Ehehe. As a test, try voting for whoever!"
1-1-choice:
Talk to her calmly
Talk to her fiercely

Why kidnap us?
Brave souls...?
What's the Main Game?
Who's your master?
1-3-message: "Oh my... It appears to be a bit one-sided."
"Hm... So this is a tablet for voting..."
\."Ahaha. Is there something you want to say?"

\."...If you were a human, I suppose there would be.
 Something like, "cease this, if you have a heart.""
\."\C[10]Do you really want those as your last words?\C[0]"

\.\C[3]The smell of human flesh burning...
And the sound of blood evaporating...
\."Take it off!! Take it off, old man!"
\.\C[3]And with that, he fell backwards in front of Kanna.
\."Help!! The professor!! The professor's going to die!!"
\."D... Don't!! If you touch that collar...!!"
\."*sniffle*... A... Awful... Why would you do this...?!"

\."You've learned what a majority vote means
 from this experience, haven't you?"

\.\C[3]It wasn't an instant pain. He was burned at length...
And unable to even writhe... he died.

\."Everyone... everyone's a good person here!!
 How can you do this...?! What did we do?!"

\."Heehee... heeheehee...
 You annoy me, you powerless little girl...
 ...No."

\.\C[10]"Hahaha, I saw all of it.
 How miserable you were in your First Trial, Kanna."

\."Forgive me. The hand with the frying pan
 must have slipped."

\."...Don't think you can do this...
 and just get away scot-free...!!"

\."On the contrary... I ask that you don't think
 you'll be getting away with so little as this."
\."I will have you pay for toying with people's lives."

\."I'll be waiting...
 on the grounds of the Main Game...!"

\.\C[3]...Yes... Even if what awaits
is us killing each other by majority vote...
\SP[8]Your Turn To Die -Death Game By Majority-

1-1-message:
\."Good day.
 Congratulations on beating the game for now!"

\."Currently, the game has only
 been released up to Part One (here)."

\."It's planned for future updates to
 add a Part Two scenario, make fixes to Part One,
 and gradually improve events."

\."Also, be aware that pre-update save data
 may stop working due to fixes."

\."Incidentally, I believe if you save here, you'll be
 able to go right into Part Two once it's added!
 ...Will you save?"

\."If you like, it would be helpful if you gave
 reports on errors you encountered or your thoughts.
 Thanks in advance!"

\.* PS: "Thanks to your aid, several serious errors
 have been fixed by now! Thank you very much!
 Being a personal project, it's slow going,
 but seeing predictions of the story is a blessing."

\."Now then, you'll be returned to the title screen.
 Is this okay?"
\."Thank you for playing to the end."
3-1-message: \C[3]...Moving to summary of Chapter 1, Part One...

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]Where there had been nothing before,
now there were stairs.
1-3-message: \."Did he go to the second floor?!"

\."Alright, Joe.
 Can I trust you to the first floor?"

\."Huh?!
 Won't it dangerous with just you two?!"
\."...Could be a dangerous date, for sure."
\."Well... If you're late coming back, I'll go help!"
\."No way! What if she's on the first floor?"

\."I'll search down here, and you two look upstairs!
 Please, Keiji!"
\."Come back right away if you find her, Sara!"

\."...Everyone's on edge right now...
 If we go, we should get everyone together first."

\."...But you heard about the Main Game... right?

\."'Course I don't wanna take part in it.

\."Gonna try an' believe in you.

\."Anybody tries to go up on their own,

\."Hopefully nobody gets mad and goes after her...

 for someone getting killed."

4-1-message:
\."Gin, I know how you feel,
 but you shouldn't be here..."
\."...J-Just a little longer, meow..."

\."It was just for a little bit... but...
 We did go searching together, woof..."

8-1-message: "Hm...? Sara... Is that..."
\."H-Hwahhhhh...?!"

\."T-The hell is this about?
 That guy on your shoulder...?!"

\."Lend me a hand, please!
 You see...!"
\.\C[3]I told them what happened in the Red Room.
\."Relax. He's just fainted."
\."Who in the world is this guy..."
\."...He's got a collar."
\.\C[4](A collar...!)

\."...Would be nice.
 As the friendly neighborhood policeman, though,
 I'm wary about how we haven't seen him before."

\.\C[4](That's true...
 Was he in the Red Room this whole time?)
\."Ahh, you don't miss a beat, Sara."
\."...We'll tie him with whatever we got available."

\.\C[4](It'll be hard to figure out
 his situation until he wakes up...)

\."As long as he doesn't move, should be fine.
 Once he's up, let's leisurely question him."

\.\C[3]As I felt a bit of relief, my attention
unavoidably turned toward the situation in the room.

\."Uhh... Keiji.
 Are Nao and Gin still..."

\."...Yeah.
 Still the same as ever."

\."They haven't moved an inch.
 ...Hurts me to see, too."
\."Keiji..."
\."No thanks."

\."Listen, somebody's gotta investigate Mishima.
 Am I right?"

\."And even I'm not some kinda drill sergeant
 who'd ask someone else to do it."

\."...No need for somebody to wear themselves down.
 Since we happen to have a pro here."
\."...Well, yeah."

\."It's hard, but somebody's gotta do it...
 And I just so happen to be a pro."

\."...Though this is my first time
 investigating a body I once talked to."
\."It... is hard for you after all, huh?"

\."...Dummy.
 Nao's got it a million times worse."
\."Losing somebody she respects... Man..."

\."...U-Um!
 Is there someone you respect, Keiji?"
\."...Maybe there was."
\."A message for those in the room."

\."Please exit the room quickly
 to allow for retrieval of the corpse."
\."Retrieval... of the corpse?"
\."Don't be ridiculous!!"
\."I won't... I won't give the professor to anyone!!"
\."Defiance will not be tolerated."
\."Beginning fog dissemination."
\."That... gas again...!"
\."No...!\.\. Stop!!\.\. Please, stop!!"
\."The professor... isn't dead at all...!!"
\.\C[3]With that, Nao took part of Mishima...
\.\C[3]and put it...\.\. in the box Q-taro had brought.

\."W-What're you doing, meow?!
 You shouldn't do that, woof!!"
\."Please get out of my way!!"
\.\C[3]Nao brushed the others aside and took off running.
\."Hold on, meow!!"
\."Gin, don't!! Wait!!"

\."Now this is no good...
 Sara, Joe, let's give chase."

\."Please! Nao's lost her cool!
 So treat her carefully!!"
"Huh?! Where'd she go?!"
\.\C[4](No way... Did she go \C[2]up the stairs\C[4]?!)

Let's tie him up

Might you want to investigate?

\."Hmph... If you want to search, do as you please.
 I won't assist, but I won't impede either..."

2-1-message:
\."Tch, damn puppet...
 As if you've even got a change of clothes."
\.\C[3]Kanna looked at me with very surprised eyes.
\.\C[3]They weren't the trusting eyes she'd had before.

\.\C[4](Because of that lie...
 I deeply wounded Kanna's heart.)

\.\C[4](\C[10]"Sister-killer"\C[4]...
 It's all because Miley said that awful thing...!)

\."Hey, Sara, you think you could
 look for somethin' Kanna could wear?"
2-2-message: \."Sara, you found anything Kanna could wear?"
\."...I found this in the Blue Room."
\."Wha...! Ain't this the same exact uniform?!"

\."Creepy... Why the hell've they got
 stuff like this prepared?"
\.\C[3]Kanna moved away from me with a start.
\.\C[3]Kanna knocked away my hand in surprise.

\."H... Hey, Kanna...?
 Easy now. What's up?"
\."...Please don't be nice to me anymore..."

\.\C[4](I'm sure Reko will tell me
 I should have told the truth then...)

\.\C[4](...What good will telling her do?
 Will that help Kanna...?)
\.\C[4](...No, that's not what this is about.)

\.\C[4](I'm afraid.
 Of her saying I should've been truthful then...)

\."Sara, look me in the eye.
 ...Don't sit there an' brood over crap."

\."Talk to me.
 Or are you just not listenin' to what I say?"
\."Cut it out! Don't say that shit!"

\."Did you mean to hurt her?!
 'Course not, right?!"
\."Cut it out! Don't say that shit!"

\."Nobody did nothin' wrong!!
 Am I right?!"
\."Cut it out! Don't say that shit!"

\."Nobody did nothin' wrong!!
 Am I right?!"

\."Sure, Mishima was the first to lie...!
 And I dunno if that was right or not...!"

\."But guess what?!
 There was hope in Kanna's eyes!"

\."You know how hard it is to show hope
 to a person who's heart's been snapped...?!"
\."Why'd I go callin' Mishima a nutty professor..."

\."Guess it ain't fair to decide he's no good
 just 'cause he's a man..."
\."I get the sitch now. I'll back Kanna up, Sara."
\."It's what we do now that's important, right?"

"Any change of clothes is fine.
 Strip that flirt's pants off for all I care."

\.\C[4](It feels a little jarring
 for you to be saying that right now...)

"It is locked...
 Perhaps there's nothing to be done."

\."I was thinking of ways to enter the kitchen.
 It has not yet been checked, you see."

\."Ah, now that isn't very nice.
 I just want to cook for everyone, that's all."

\."Granted... I doubt there are
 any ingredients in the kitchen."

\.\C[4](I thought, if he was the stalker...
 he'd be with the kidnappers.)

\.\C[4](But... When he hit Miley,
 I sensed undeniable hostility.)

\."It may be a trap.
 Let us look for the switch."

What are you plotting?

\."Yes, I am Kai.
\! ...Is something the matter?"
\."We were just talking about all meeting up."

\."Come to think of it,
 Joe was saying to come gather in the bar."

\."The lights are restored, so at last I can move.
 Shall we all go together?"
2-1-message:
\.\C[4](There are glowing letters using fluorescent paint.
 ...They're on some sort of paper...)

\.\C[3]This now belongs to you. Keep it on you always.
This is a key to the exit.

\.\C[3]Let \C[2]no one else know the existence of this card\C[3].
Otherwise, you will \C[2]die\C[3].
\.\C[3]I hid the card before I could even think.
\."I-I'm okay. Looks like the lights came on."

\."Let us look at the other rooms
 to see if anything occurred in that moment."

\.\C[3]When I looked at the card again,
the text could no longer be seen.
\.\C[3]On the back of the card was a strange image.

\.\C[4](The other text seemed to disappear, so...
 What does "Keymaster" mean?)
\.\C[4](If I don't follow those rules... I'll die?)
\.\C[4](...I feel like I'm being led by them again...)

2-1-message:
\."...Geez...
 Didn't I tell you to leave me alone?"
\.\C[4](I can't talk to him right now...)

"Why so droopy, Joe?
 That ain't like you at all!"
\."...I'd say that right back to you, Sara."

\."Wonder why...
 I've never had a drink in my life."
\."Do you really think Keiji's a cop?"
\."Joe... Have you been doubting it the whole time?"
\."I-I mean... Just wanted your opinion, Sara."

\."Damn, I'm a loser, aren't I...
 Just a little difference in opinion's got me uneasy."
\."For real?! What makes you think so?!"

\."I-It's just a hunch, I guess...?
 I feel like... no policeman acts like that..."

\."Well, there's cops in plainclothes!
 I don't think it's good to suspect... just..."
\."Huh... So you do believe him, Joe?"

\."...Me, I can't think there's someone
 siding with the kidnappers among that bunch."

\.\C[4](Now that's strange...
 Wasn't Joe the first one to suggest there was?)

\."But the more I try to believe,
 the more suspicious I get..."
\."Could you... look into Keiji a little?"

\."...Nah, sorry.
 Yeah, pretend I never asked."
\.\C[4](Because he wants to believe... he suspects...)

\.\C[4](One thing's for sure...
 It's better if we know more about each other.)
2-1-choice:
Talk to him
Leave in silence
Joke around with him

I think Keiji's a cop
Keiji is lying
2-4-message: \.\C[3]Joe is sitting down wearily.
\.\C[4](He's staring at something in his hand...)
"What's the matter, Joe?"
\."Waugh! Sara! You startled me!"

\C[4](A piece of paper...?
 Kind of seems like... a card...)
\.\C[4](Don't tell me...!)
\."Waugh! Sara! You startled me!"

\."GYAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!
\! What the hell!! Sara?!"
\."Ahh... sorry."

\."Don't do that and then take it back!
 At least laugh!"
\."What are you looking at?"
\."This was in my inside pocket."
\.\C[3]It was a photo of me, Joe, and Ryoko.
\.\C[3]We were at a cafe, having a fun chat together.
"Hey, you said it. Hahaha."
\."...Ryoko looks cute here, too."
\."...Sure does."
"How'd you arrive at that?!"
\."...Ryoko... Wonder what she's doing now..."
\."...Haha, no kidding."
\."...Man, I miss her."
\.\C[3]Sure enough, it's unthinkable for me to suspect Joe.

\.\C[3]Sou... He must be just...
seeing shadows where there aren't any.
\.\C[3]Suddenly, I thought back.
\.\C[3]Joe got involved in this because he came to my house.

\.\C[3]If he'd gone straight home,
wouldn't he be living life as normal right now?
\.\C[3]How late a realization is that...?
\.\C[3]I was so focused on myself...
\.\C[3]I didn't consider Joe's perspective for a second...
\."...I had my first proper date with Ryoko that day..."
\."Heheh, I was so nervous I couldn't talk at all."
\."Somehow, we ended up talking about you, Sara."

\."Do you remember that time you tried to sit
 on a traffic cone and fell on your butt?!
 I couldn't stop laughing!"

\."Wahhh?!
 You promised you wouldn't tell anyone!"
\."Hahaha! It sure got the conversation lively!"

\."...So then I sorta asked her
 why she decided to go out with me."
\."Huh? What do you mean, "why"...?"
\."I mean, you didn't know me that much, yeah?"
\."Ahaha, really?"

\."Well, no friend of Sara's
 could be a bad person... you know?"
\."Hahaha... Funny, right?!"
\."'Cause I was thinking the same thing."

\."Ryoko and me made an agreement.
 \C[2]"If anyone makes Sara cry, we'll make them cry!"\C[0]"

\."So, like...
\! Stop lookin' like you're on the verge of tears."
\."I mean, Joe, you're..."

\."If I make you cry, Sara,
 that means Ryoko's gotta sock me, right?!"
\."...Heehee."

\."You're right, Joe.
 I'd better have you protect me."

\."Yeah!
 Whenever I see a traffic cone, I'll exterminate it!"
\."Erase that from your memory! I mean it!"
2-4-choice:
Try talking to him
Peek unseen from behind
Startle him

Do you miss Ryoko?
I'm so photogenic
What a narcissist
2-5-message: \."I'll rest a little, then get back to searching."
3-1-message: \."S... She wasn't on the second floor?!"

\.\C[3]Looking around the room,
I found almost everyone but Nao had already assembled.

\."...Erm.
 Who is the person tied up there...?"
\."You all... plus this "Nao" makes everyone, right?"

\."...Remove these ropes.
 So long as you don't want me to crush you..."

\."This guy's... a little riotous.
 That's troublesome..."
\.\C[4](I might have brought in someone dangerous...)

\."Why is SHE walking around freely?!
 Hurry, hurry! Somebody capture her!!"
\."I know! Oh yes I do! This girl is bad news!!"
\."C... Calm down! Could you start at the beginning?"
\."...And could you drop that weird tone of yours?"
\."Hmph... Look at me, getting so disconcerted."
\."Is this guy playin' a joke on us...?"
\."Listen, we don't have time to spend on you."

\."But... I'll allow a little time for inquiries.
 We'll decide whether to untie you after that."
\."Hmph...! Do not try to act superior, blond rascal!"

\."Oooh, scary.
 You handle the questioning, Sara."

\."Keiji, I want to know your perspective...
 What do you think about Kai?"

\."His eyes are dead, for one.
 Just like Mr. Policeman here.
\! Ha ha ha."
\."Do you think he's a bad person...?"
\."Everybody's got good parts and bad parts, right?"

\."...Look, you just do what you can, Sara.
 For now, we'll take this doll along."

\."Keiji, I want to know your perspective...
 Is there someone who has your attention?"

\."He's such a funny guy, y'know?
 Hahaha..."

\."...Now, enough about that.
 Want to take this doll along?"

2-1-message:
\."What did you come here for...?!
 Please leave... Sara...!"
"We're on your side. We won't do anything."
\."Please don't come any closer!! I'll be mad!!"
\."I won't... I won't hand over the professor...!"
\.\C[4](Nao... doesn't want him to be taken away.)

"Please calm down.
 We don't intend to take him."

\.\C[4](It's no good...
 This can't be resolved by a discussion.)
\C[3]I locked the kitchen door from the inside.

\."...Now no one else can enter.
 Will you talk to us?"

\.\C[4](Keiji...! Let's do a pincer maneuver!
 ...Is he following my lead?!)

\."You really... didn't come here
 intending to take the professor...?"
\."Since it's you, Sara... I'll believe you."
\."Well... Can we come a little closer?"

\."You put your back to the door
 and stay quiet, please!!"
\.\C[4](I need to put her at ease somehow...)

"We were worried for you, so we came looking.
 I was afraid... what the kidnappers might do
 if you resisted them."

\."You're right...
 I'm sorry... that I've just caused you trouble."
"I just... came to look for clues in the kitchen."

\."...I'm sorry for doubting you...
 Please... search all you like..."

"I was starving.
 Did you find any food here?"

\."...I'm sorry for doubting you...
 But, it doesn't seem there's anything to eat..."

\."...I've been hiding here the whole time
 with the lights turned off...
 Since if the kidnappers find me, they'll take him..."
\.\C[4](Does this room have a light switch?)
"It must have been scary in the dark..."
\.\C[4](Nao's starting to calm down, bit by bit...)
"During that time... did anyone come by?"
\."...No, no one. You're the first ones."

\.\C[4](I figured as much.
 If someone had entered, there'd be an uproar...)
\.\C[4](At this point... I think we can talk properly.)

\."Nao... Um...
 It's hard to say things like this, but..."
\."I understand... that what I'm doing is wrong."

\."...I shouldn't be...
 acting like this forever, should I...?"
"Nao... You should let the box go."

\."...That's not possible...!
 I just can't do it...!!"

"...Nao, did you know that
 stairs going to the second floor appeared?"
\."No... The rooms there are just as full of tricks."

\."In the process of searching for you...
 Gin got trapped in a cage."

\."We were able to save him, but...
 He was so shocked, he can barely speak still."

\."But... you can't be exposing
 the people who are alive to danger, too."

\."..."The people who are alive"...!
 That wording...!"
\."I kept questioning him... in the dark..."
\."But the professor... didn't say a word..."

\."No matter how busy he was, the professor I knew...
\! ...always answered my questions with a smile..."
\."...I was in the middle of painting it..."

\."...A portrait of the professor,
 that I meant to give him as a gift..."
\."But I can't give it to him anymore, can I..."

\."He must have taught you many things.
 About art... about studying...
 about many more important things..."
\."Who knows Professor Mishima best out of anyone?"

\."Nao... You should make it back alive,
 and finish that painting yourself!!"

\."He must have taught you many things.
 About art... about studying...
 about many more important things..."
\."Who knows Professor Mishima best out of anyone?"

\."Nao... You should make it back alive,
 and finish that painting yourself!!"
\."Until I finish that portrait... I can't die!!"
\."This box... I'll let go of it now..."
\."Sorry about what I said... Mr. Policeman."
\."Well, we better give our all too."

You should let go of the box
Tell her about Gin
Is dead

Then will you quit painting?
You should finish it
2-2-message:
\."...Err, well, Sara.
 If you don't wanna peek inside, you can look away."

\."No... searching every nook and cranny
 is the only thing I can do."
\.\C[3]I touched the box, and the lid opened easily.
\."...Sorry. Can I ask you to look?"

\."'Course. That's more or less
 what your friendly policeman's good for."
\.\C[3]Keiji opened the box and checked inside.
\."...No buts about it, it's totally empty."

\.\C[4](Was Nao... dearly protecting a box
 that had nothing in it?)
"This means the kidnappers took it, didn't they?"

\."But the way Nao was acting...
 I'd have to think she never let go of it."

"Maybe Nao never actually
 put it in the box then to begin with...?"

\."That's a nope.
 I saw it clear as day with my own eyes."

"Don't tell me...
 Is Nao actually still hiding it on her?!"
\."Something that big... There's no way, right?"
\."Gettin' hard to tell what's the truth."
\."...Nah, I just felt like saying that."

\."Miley, wasn't it? ...If Mishima could revive like her,
 just sticking his head on, I'm sure Nao'd be glad..."

\."Hahaha! It's out of the question.
 Nope... No way she's a doll."

\."...Hahaha. Surely even you can tell
 between a living creature and an object enough
 to know he was human like you, Sara."

\."Well, no point in worrying about it.
 Let's keep trucking along and just pursue the truth."
2-2-choice:
Look inside
Leave it to Keiji

The kidnappers took it already
It never went in at all
Nao is still hiding it

Do you think Miley's really a doll?
Was Mishima also a doll?

1-1-message:
\."Exams are a ways away yet.
 And I'm sure you'll be fine, miss Nao."

\."I can't...!!
 If I fail, I... What'll I even do?!"

\."Hrmm... Please calm down.
 I'm busy driving...!"
\."Maybe I'll swallow a bunch of mud and die?!"
\."To tell the truth, I failed my college exams."

\."I had grades as good as anyone's...
 And a more or less serious lifestyle..."

\."I put in a perfectly good effort.
 ...At least I believed so."

\."However, where some will pass, others will fail.
 There's nothing that can be done about it."

\."And, being more conceited than the average person...
 I lashed out at everything."

\."So, miss Nao. What do you suppose
 gives people the impetus to improve?"

\."My, my... I wasn't asking you
 to give the model answer, you know."

\."But still, how wonderful!
 It must speak to your purity that you can honestly
 embrace the words of others in any situation."

\."Perhaps that is why your friends
 are all such good people, miss Nao."
\."Ohh! A rather mature point of view!"

\."Yes, for most of a student's life is at school.
 By just taking a step outside, you can realize
 what a small community it really is."
\."Your worries... can appear much smaller that way."
\."Hmm! As I'd expect from one so devoted to art!"

\."In truth, not everyone can
 focus wholeheartedly on hobbies.
 So it's wonderful to have them, miss Nao."

\."The things you can proudly say you like...
 These things will save you someday!"

\."At times, even dealing with people can be hard...
 A pet can have greater insight and
 healing capabilities than a human."

\."If not an animal, even a plant can do!
 A dependable partner of the heart!"

\."It required an above-average amount of time...
 But I regained the courage to face forward."

\."And such is why now...
 I enjoy my time with you and the rest of the class."

\."Though I failed, I gained happiness.
 The dream I had pictured did not come to pass,
 but the reality I found was much like a dream."

\."There's nothing to fear in failure.
 A person's life does not end there."

\."As long as you live on...
 Happiness will surely come to you!"

\.\C[3]We keep our distance.
Nao alone sits near Professor Mishima.
\.\C[4](How should I sort out these feelings?)
\.\C[4](I can't... think of what to say to Nao...)
1-1-choice:
Talking to family and friends
Being in a new environment
Hobbies!
Pets!
2-1-message: \.\C[3]Nao is sitting by the professor, dumbfounded.
2-2-message: \."This is... just a lie, right? Professor..."

\."H... Huh?!
 I mean... it's because of the votes he...!"

\."It's always possible everybody voted
 for someone 'sides themselves, you know!!"

\."Listen, everybody.
 ...Don't do any probing into each other's votes."

\."We voted without knowing a thing.
 No one... had any ill will."

"...Keiji is right.
 We shouldn't talk about the votes, Joe."
\."Just let me... be alone for a sec..."

"...No, Joe is right.
 It's better that we make the votes clear..."

\."...Well, shoot. I thought if anybody
 would understand, it'd be you..."

\."...Well, fine. Even if we do talk about it, not now.
 Can't have a calm chat when we're emotional, right?"
\."F... Fine. Once we've calmed down a little..."

\."I'll go cool my head...
 Let me... be alone for a sec..."

\."Right...
 You've got a lot on your plate too, huh..."
\."...I'm gonna... go cool my head too..."
\."Just let me... be alone for a sec..."

\C[3]And the others... some left, some stayed.
They all began to scatter their own ways.\.\.
2-2-choice:
Keiji's right
Joe's right
Keep silent
6-1-message: \.\C[3]Professor Mishima... in a pool of blood.

1-1-message: \C[3]An extremely heavy air dominates the space.

\.\C[4](It's different... This is nothing like
 the discussions we've had before...)

\."Heeheehee... Well, I shall go over
 the basic rules one more time."

\."A total of two votes will be held:
 the \C[2]preliminary vote\C[0] in the middle of the discussion,
 and the \C[2]final vote\C[0] at the finale."

\."5 candidates will be chosen in the preliminary vote,
 and 1 victim will be selected in the final vote."

\."If the chosen victim is the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0],
 all lose, and all will die."

\."If the victim is the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] wins,
 and can escape with one person of their choosing."

\."If the victim is a \C[4]Commoner\C[0] or \C[3]Sage\C[0],
 the chosen victim and the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] will die."

\."Ah, yes... I have left rulebooks on the desks.
 Make use of them as items, everyone."

\."That is all... Heeheehee.
 Use your time however you please."
\C[3]Miley quietly sat down in a chair.
\.\C[3]And... in dead silence... the Main Game began.
3-1-message:
\C[3]The discussion is stuck in \C[2]equilibrium\C[3],
failing to come to an agreement...!

\.\C[4](I need to swing the needle to either side...
 or this balance will never collapse!)

\C[3]Both speakers will give statements at the same time.
By \C[2]affirming\C[3] or \C[2]denying\C[3] one party's opinion,
you can change their views.

\.\C[3]If all goes well, the balance will shift,
and you can advance to the next dialogue.

\.\C[3]Note that there is no time limit, but there is
a limit to the number of selections you can make.
3-3-message:
\C[3]The discussion is stuck in equilibrium,
failing to come to an agreement...!

\."Miss Nao, you are attempting to
 drag in as many others as you can."
4-1-message:
\.\C[4](Ack...! I can't upset the balance!
 Let's start over!)
4-3-message:
\.\C[4](Ack...! I can't upset the balance!
 Let's start over!)
5-11-message:
\.*cough* *cough*
"I'm exhausted... I feel kind of sick..."
\.\C[4](I think I refuted nearly all his remarks...)
\.\C[4](Why is there this air of swirling suspicion...?)
\."Could you calm down for a second?"

\.\C[4](Ugh...!! I refuted most of his remarks...
 Why does he look so unperturbed?!)

\."Seems like everyone's just plain
 unsure what's right anymore."
\.\C[4](Suspicion... An unpleasant air swirls around us.)

\."G-Get a grip, everybody!
 Doubting Sara just isn't right!!"
\."You want us all to be killed off?!"
\."...Hey, what do you think would be worst for you?"

\."If a guy like me with no trust were a traitor...?
 No, that can't be it."
\."It'd be if miss Sara was your enemy... right?"

\."Eheehee... Sorry to intrude
 while you're getting all fired up."
\."The hell do we do?! We've got no conclusions!!"
\."How we gonna make a vote without regrets?!"
\."Ahaha, coming in right at the end."

\."Of course, I'm the real \C[2]Keymaster\C[0].
 You really are a slippery one."
\."Sou... I won't be beaten by you...!!"

\.\C[4](If I let this chance go...
 I'll never have a chance to say it!)

\."Saying that now just makes you
 more suspicious, you know?"
\."Sou... I won't be beaten by you...!!"
\.\C[4](Now, I just have to believe in everyone...!)

\."Those feelings of not wanting to be betrayed
 are just getting in the way."
\."Doubting miss Sara... is a step forward!"
\."It's your turn to die... miss Sara."\.
Please choose who to vote for.
5-11-choice:
I'm the Keymaster
Don't say anything
5-13-message: \."Heehee... What do you think of the results?"
\."Five will proceed to the final vote."
\.\C[3]One of us five will, with certainty...

\."Dumbasses!!
 It's the next part that's seriously bad!!"

\.\C[4](It was... so everyone could escape...
 So why...)
\.\C[4](I don't want to die... I don't...)

\."...Erm, I mean. Hey now, Sara.
\! Your friendly policeman's with ya."

\."Listen, everybody.
 We need to narrow it down to just one person."

\."Forget your sympathy and your grudges.
 Just remember the \C[2]roles\C[0]."

\."If we choose the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] or \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0],
 we all die..."

\."Y-Yes, indeed!!
 We're far from safe at all, absolutely!!"
\."Oh! Hey, is one of us a \C[3]Sage\C[0]?!"

\."If we've got a \C[3]Sage\C[0] on our side,
 they'll know who's the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0]...!"
\."This's the worst...!! So it's one of the five?!"

\."Nothing to be done...
 There's only one course of action."

\."Have the five prove it with words.
 ...Isn't that right, Sara?"
\."I'll prove to you who the real Keymaster is!!"

\."Remember people's words and actions in discussion...
 That's where the path to victory lies."

\."Heeheehee... The final 20 minutes...
 Please use this endlessly short time effectively."

\."I'll be praying... you don't all perish.
 Aheehee."
\.\C[3]Miley quietly sat in the chair again.
6-1-message:
\."Huh? You're sticking up for him even after hearing
 such dubious emails? Miss Sara, clearly you're..."

\."Hmm, I wonder?
 Decide more calmly, miss Sara."
"Are those emails not just one of your lies, Sou?"
\."Ahaha, you sure do want to call me a liar, it seems."

\."If you can't believe it, why not close your ears?
 And I'll carry the conversation how I like."

\.\C[4](Grr...! I need to beat him on his terms,
 or I won't be able to shut him up...!)

"Hold on! You're wrong!
 Where's your proof that I'm definitely with them?!"
\."I think it can be inferred from the emails..."
\."So that's all it is! A conjecture!!"
6-3-message:
"Sou, earlier you said that they were all
 sent to different email addresses!"

\."That means saying they all went to one person
 is just your own assumption!"

\."I'm pretty confident in it, myself.
 ...Though I suppose there's no proof."

\."He wrote "I feel a deep affection."
 Isn't that enough for you?"

"Kai has no connection to my family!
 He couldn't have any devotion!"

\.""I'll offer myself up for the Chidouins"...
 That line makes him sound almost like a servant.
 Hey, I doubted my eyes too."
\."I saw it... so I just have to believe it, right?"

\.\C[4](Was Kai connected with my family
 in some way I didn't know about...?!)
6-5-message: "No way...! That's absurd! We're just a normal family!"
\."Maybe your mother, or your father...?"

\."Actually... It might be amusing
 if you were the big boss yourself, miss Sara."
\.\C[4](Don't call it "amusing"...!!)
"I don't remember anything about that!"

\."If miss Sara comes to harm, you're my enemy...
 That's what it says in the email."
\."Such a rebellious remark."

\."He'd go against another to protect you...
 How envious, to be loved."
\.\C[4](That was a failure...!)

"I understand how Kai is suspicious!
 Even suspicion of me is inevitable... but..."
\."Suspecting the three of us as a group isn't right!"
\."You're just presenting this in a manipulative way!"
\."Geez... That's a sharp remark."
\."Well, I'll say it like this for you."
6-7-message:
"Wait, please!
 Joe's name isn't even mentioned in the email!"

\."Making a conclusion off of that
 is letting your assumptions go wild!"
\."You like personal attacks, huh, miss Sara?"
\."Ah, well... I guess I'll acknowledge it."
\."That said, I'm not going to let you escape."

"M-Maybe it's referring to something else!
 Like video games, or sports!"

\."...The word Death Game is used at the start.
 It's normal to think it's that, isn't it?"

"Please, stop talking as if
 I'm enjoying the Death Game or something!"

\."That you were looking forward to it
 is why you're participating now, right?"

\."Don't joke with me! You're just reading
 the emails with a malicious intent!"

\."I want to defeat these villains...
 So of course I'm gonna take it seriously."
6-9-message: "What?! What list in the bar do you mean?!"

\."Oh, you didn't know? There's that list of
 people's names on the blackboard, right?"

\."Those are the names of the people brought here...
 20 in all."

\."And if you remove Sara, Kai, and Joe,
 that's 17 people. It matches up, right?"

\."Ehh...? He went as far as threatening miss Nao
 to keep the emails from being seen, right?"

"...Err... um... maybe there are
 some images he didn't want seen..."

"Of course I will!!
 Isn't this all conjecture anyway?!"

\."You provide some proof too, Sou!
 Proof those emails were there!!"
\."Funny you say that, after you guys stole it..."

\."Then we're in the same situation!
 I'm denying those emails!"
7-2-message: "Looks like you can't say anything back."
7-4-message: "Looks like you can't say anything back."
7-6-message: "Looks like you can't say anything back."
7-8-message: "Looks like you can't say anything back."
7-10-message: "Looks like you can't say anything back."

2-1-message: "No Nao, huh... Seems the second floor was a bust."
\.\C[4](I hope Joe found her on the first floor...)

\.\C[4](Speaking of Joe...
 Right, I made him that promise.)
\."Even policemen get bad luck sometimes, huh?"

\."Sure isn't great, is it?
 Maybe I'll hafta retire."

\.\C[4](Urk... I guess he'll just dodge the question
 if beat around the bush...)

\."Ah, come to think of it, Keiji...
 Earlier, you said there \C[2]was\C[0] someone you looked up to."

\."If she's on the first floor, then I'd guess so.
 Probably."

\."Come to think of it, you also said...
 there \C[2]was\C[0] someone you looked up to."
\."...Do you not want to talk about it?"

\."Hahaha!
 You're really as sharp as a tack."
\.\C[4]("Was"... means it was someone in his past.)
\."I want to know more about you, Keiji."
"If you don't want to say... I don't mind, but..."
\."Hahaha! Yep, you sure are funny, Sara."
\."If we survive that Main Game thing, I'll tell you."

\."So you're saying...
 we're really going to do the Main Game...?"

\."Doubt it'd be easy to avoid.
 These people aren't gonna allow that."
\."And once it begins... Everyone'll be serious."
\."And myself... I don't wanna die either."

\."...Bet you'll get to see even tackier,
 more despicable parts of us adults."

\."Nobody wants to die.
 ...It'll be an ugly struggle, that's for sure."

\."Hahaha!
 You're sounding like a real psycho, Sara."

\."...Bet it'd make things easier to act that way,
 like you don't feel any emotion."
\."...Maybe we'll all come to hate each other."

\."But if you survive regardless,
 and you're still curious about me..."
\."I'll be fine with telling you and you alone."

\."I'll definitely...
 look for a way to sidestep the Main Game."
2-1-choice:
Try probing Keiji
Ask about Nao's well-being

I absolutely want to know
I won't push it

I'm disillusioned
I don't want to die, either
I definitely won't lose
2-3-message: \."Hey, now that's a shout! Keep searchin' like that!"

\."Graaah!!
 Not in my ear, dumbass!! Shout AWAY from me!!"
\."Don't be scared. You'll be okay with me."
\."I know, Gin! Want a piggy-back ride?"
\."Wha...?! No, I'M gonna give ya a piggy-back ride!"
2-5-message:
\."Aren't you tired? It's not good to work too hard.
 You should take some time to rest."

"I can't rest...
 Not while everyone else is working hard."
\."I'd say rest is a valuable option in its own right."

\."Still... You never know who'll come attacking you.
 So I know how you feel, miss Sara."

\."If you start getting weary, everyone'll be uneasy.
 It's bad for your looks too, ahaha."

\."But... You never know when someone might attack.
 So it's hard to stay calm and rest, huh...?"

\."Miss Sara... I don't think you should
 go to the first floor on your own."

"Yes, he can be a bit stupid in ways...
 But he's a really good guy."
"Joe's just my classmate. There's not much to it."

\."Ahaha, I bet Joe would have
 a great comeback to make if he heard that."

\."...That's just how in-sync you two are.
 Can't joke like that without trust."
\.\C[3]Sou came very close to me, and spoke in a whisper.
\.\C[3]No... I'd been trying to forget it.

\.\C[4](The Second Trial...
 The vote in which Professor Mishima died.)

\.\C[4](Excluding my own vote...
 Mishima got 3 votes, Sou and Nao got 0 votes,
 and everyone else got 1 vote each.)

\.\C[4](But, of course...
 We thought that choice held no meaning.)

\."We'll be going now.
 Catch you later..."
2-5-choice:
I'm still energetic
I want to rest

Joe's my best friend
Joe's just a classmate

1-1-message:
\."I did try starting it up.
 There's no power cord, but it seems to be
 running on battery power."

\."So once the battery's dead, it's over.
 Want to investigate what's on it, but..."

"I'm aware of that.
 But we can't not investigate it, you know?"
\."This laptop is locked with a password."
\."So you can't see what's stored on it?"

\."I tried some random passwords,
 but all I accomplished was draining the battery..."

\."And if it opens with someone's name...
 There's a good chance they're the laptop's owner!"

\."...But if it's a name we don't know,
 there'd be no way for us to learn it."

"Don't tell me... You know the name
 of the organization behind this?!"

"Ah, the classic password.
 ...In a bad way."

\."If it's a birthday,
 then we'll find the answer in 365 tries!"

\."Ahaha... ahem.
 I'm guessing you wanna make me do it."

\."It'd be best if we could just conveniently
 find a piece of paper with the password..."
\."Now that would definitely be a trap."
\."Hmm... If we just had a hint..."
\."Maybe this is a hint from the kidnappers."

\."There's probably information on here
 that's valuable to us, but worthless to them."

\."\C[2]Solve the riddle, and we'll generously give it out.
 If you can't, it doesn't matter to us\C[0]... Like that."

\."And we can't see it once the battery goes dead,
 so it's like a time-limited treasure chest."
\.\C[4](...I can't see them being that kind.)

\."Okay, I'm going to stay here
 and work on figuring out the password!
 Miss Sara, tell me if you find any clues."
\.\C[4](But without hope, I can't think positive...)

\.\C[4](Until the battery runs out...
 maybe Sou will be able to think positive, too.)
1-1-choice:
What is on it?
This might be a trap, too

Someone's name
The kidnappers' organization
A birthday
1-2-message: \C[3]A laptop is placed on the desk.
\."I'll try to crack the password, miss Sara."
1-3-message: \C[3]A laptop is placed on the desk.

\."I... I can't lend a hand there.
 Sorry..."

\."I was sitting in the darkness,
 trying to think about the password."

\."Miss Nao and Gin...?
 They haven't come by here."
1-5-message: \C[3]There's nothing on the desk.
\.\C[4](The laptop that was here is gone...!!)
\.\C[4](...Nothing of note on the ceiling...)

\C[3]While looking under the desk,
I saw a green glow toward the back.
\.\C[3]A familiar card...
\.\C[4](...Keiji and Gin aren't looking this way...)
\.\C[3]I... grabbed the card.
\."Sara."

\C[4](I... don't know any card.
 I'm not looking at anything. It's fine.)
\.\C[3]I got out from underneath the desk and raised my head.
\."Sara."
\.\C[3]I quickly returned the card to where it was.

\."S... Sou...!
\! You've come to!"
\.\C[3]Did he... see that...?
\."Oww... Did I pass out...?"

\."You got whacked in the back of the head.
 Doesn't seem to have caused bleeding, though."
\."That's awful... Who would do that...?"

\."Ack... I've been had!
 The laptop's gone..."
\."It must have been stolen..."

\."...I didn't figure anything out.
 Not the password... or what data was on it..."
\."Oh well..."

\."It must've been inconvenient for somebody.
 So somebody used the confusion to steal it."
\."Somebody... on the first floor."
\.\C[4](Who could that be...?!)

\."Hold your horses, Sara.
 If you get restless... you'll let it all get away."

\."...Hold up. Joe's searching the first floor.
 We shouldn't be hasty just yet."

\."Good point. Don't want our feelings nor our actions
 to be all over the place."

\."We'll round everyone up.
 ...We should take the time to sort things out."
\.\C[4](Is there... someone malicious in our midst...?)
\.\C[4](...I don't know what's going on.)
\."Hey,\.\. miss Sara..."
\."Were you... looking at something earlier?"

\."...I don't know.
\! What are you talking about?"
\."...No, I wasn't looking at anything."
\."...Huh, I see."

26-1-message: \C[3]This appears to be a computer screen.
\."I'm lousy with machines..."
\."Something's written here."
\.\C[3]~Birdcage Game~
\.\C[3]Free the bird (hostage) in the cage.
\.\C[3]Hold down the green switch to raise output to maximum.

\.\C[3]Don't let your guard down.
Wicked masks will come kill those pressing the switch.

\.\C[3]Shine holy light on the masks,

\.\C[3]Gin dove into my chest.

\."Gin...
 It's okay... It's okay..."
\."...*sniff*... *sniffle*..."
\."...Now, let's go."

\."Yep. Best to be simple and methodical

\."Gin, thank you...
 I won't put you in a scary situation again."

2-1-message: \C[3]There's a handcuff at the end of a chain.
\.\C[4](Plus... the air in this room feels heavy.)

\."I can... sense a bad feeling, somehow.
 So please, tell me."

\."Ahh... And since there's dust,
 it was wiped a little while ago..."

\."I'd put the time around... yeah.
 Maybe the First Trial."
\.\C[3]Once I became cognizant of it, I understood.

\.\C[3]The unremovable, raw stench of blood.\!
...The air that repulsed my instincts.
\.\C[3]It's disgusting... I want to throw up.

\."I'll check every inch of this room.
 You get out, Sara."
\."I'm sayin' trust in your friendly policeman."

\.\C[3]With a gentle push on the back,
I proceeded to exit out of the room.
\C[4](To think an empty room... could make me tremble...)
\.\C[4](It's been planted in me... the fear of death...)
