\."And our flunking students are the three idiot girls:
 Sara Chidouin, Reko Yabusame, and Nao Egokoro!"
\."Who're you calling idiots?! This ain't a game!!"
\."Now to announce the bottom of the barrel!"
\."Came in at dead last! Just the worst!"

\."Don't call me dead last, woof!
 You're making me mad, meow!"

\."C'mon, you got 0 tokens!

\."...I didn't wanna do something that's
 like trading money, meow..."

\."Stubborn to the end! Do kids these days
 just not care if they lose or what?"

\."Well, whatever, let's take a commemorative photo!
 Stand right there!"

\."Ranger, let those two go. Or else..."
\."Ranger!! The hell you doin'?! Let them all go!!"

\."You aren't... still going to

\."Okay, you three noisy idiot girls!
 Watch over them from the Impression Room!"

\."W... We're high up!

\."As a reward for your efforts,
 I've given you a special invitation! Good for you!"

\."What do you mean Impression Room?!
 God dammit! Cut the crap, Ranger!!"

\."Better stop shouting and start listening,

 \C[5]The Arbitration Room.\C[10]"

\."Currently, first-place Q-taro and last-place Gin
 are attached back-to-back on a target."
\."When the timer hits 0, the machine will activate..."

\."And a \C[2]venomous stinger\C[0]
 will be fired at last-place Gin!"

\."The venom of the Rikuto giant scorpion is powerful...
 He'll die very painfully..."

\."Y-You're kidding, meow?! Why, woof?!
 I got 10 of the stars, meow!!"

"It's only natural to hand out a penalty
 to the last-placer who didn't earn anyone's trust!"
"We didn't hear about that!! Not once...!!"

\."Dammit!! Shit!!
 How's this not just an execution?!"

"Hmm, oh, fine...
 I'll give you one way to save him."

\."\C[2]If the one who gathered the most trust wants
 to take his place\C[0]... I might accept that, see?"
\."Q-taro, there's a red switch in front of ya."

\."Press that, and the target will do a 180,
 and the stinger'll aim at you instead."
\."The privilege to be a sacrifice for Gin!"

\.\C[10]"You're free to do whatever.
 That switch isn't a duty, it's a privilege."

\."Well then, should we get started?
 The rest of you can just take it easy!"

\."That asshole...!! I knew somethin' was wrong
 with it just ending like that!!"
\."Ahh... Gin...! We have to do something!"
\."Crap!! What now?! What should we do?!"
\."We can't jump down from this height...!"
\."Ain't there any way we can interfere?!"
2-1-message:
\."Now I'm gonna make you admit that me,
 right here... I'm the real Reko!!"
3-1-message:
"No, you must have been apart for
 at least as long as Alice has been in prison!"

\."That's plenty of time for a person's
 thoughts and personality to change!!"

\."And yet Alice keeps saying you're no different!
 It's simply him who's convinced of that!!"

\."Alice is a really weird person!
 He's not convincing at all!"

\."You got no proof, and ain't that rude?!
 ...Even if I agree!!"

"Siblings or not, I can't imagine
 he could tell that by intuition!!"

\."Intuition comes from years and years
 of experience building up!!"

\."Can you really deny all the years
 of my life we've been together?!"
3-3-message: \.\C[4](Urk...! No way of refuting that one!)

\."You took most of the Clear Chips
 we got in the Room of Lies, Reko!!"

\."And after that, did you really
 share the Clear Chips with anyone else?!"
\."That greed... isn't like the real Reko!!"

\."Then I'm the real Reko, too!!
 'Cause we went in the Room of Lies together!!"
3-5-message:
"No, there's a discrepancy between the wound
 Reko got on her hand and your memory!"

\."That's exactly why even Keiji is adamant
 about there being two Rekos!"
\."Nothing could be more important!!"

"You talked with Professor Mishima at length...
 And yet you're going to say you were sleepy?!"
\."Maybe the truth is we didn't talk that much, okay?!"

\."No, Keiji testified that
 you were talking in great detail!!"
"Then the lack of wound on your hand is bizarre!!"
\."Nao saw her hand with large fragments stuck in it!!"

\."I-It'd be a scar, yeah?
 It's not noticeable, but it's there...!"

\."Where, exactly?!
 You had perfectly smooth skin!!"
3-7-message:
"No, Keiji saw through Ranger's word-twisting
 and refuted him!"

\."And Ranger was unable to clearly say
 that there was no fake...!"
\."Shaking and vexed, he couldn't say it!!"

"That may be true...
 But he isn't saying you're real, either!"

\."That's 'cause if he did,
 you guys wouldn't be scrambling!!"

\."Has he ever given us a hint
 out of the kindness of his heart?!"

\."That damn Ranger wants us to be anxious,
 doubt each other, and die!! Don't trust him!"
"Are you saying Ranger is intentionally being silent?!"

\."Yeah, exactly!! And you're being toyed with
 if you can't see through that!"
\."Don't tell me, Sara, are YOU the actual fake here?!"
\.\C[4](This is just turning into a quarrel!)

\."Listen, even if we say somebody
 we haven't met has replaced me as a faker..."
3-9-message:
"No! Without there being someone we haven't met,
 the numbers don't line up!!"

\."It's as simple as that! If the numbers don't line up,
 that's 'cause there's no fake after all!"

\."Besides, you heard Keiji telling us
 that Ranger and Safalin can't lie!!"

"Wait a second!
 There is one more person we don't see here!"

\."The person at the Prize Exchange
 who called himself the Receptionist Doll!!"

\."Hold up!
 That guy clearly ain't human, right?!"

\."He's never got any expression,
 and he's called the damn Receptionist Doll!!"
"If there are no new people... then maybe so!"

\."Mishima's head came off...!!
 How would he become a fake me?!"

\."But if it were Kai... If the bleeding were stopped
 and he was treated, he could be alive...!!"

\."You're just dipping into fantasies now!
 We saw Kai die!!"
\."Enough! It's useless to discuss this any more!"

\."But no matter how much we talk, you can't clearly
 tell me who this fake or whatever really is!"
\."Come on... Say it already. Who am I?!"
\.\C[4](No humans we haven't met will appear...)
4-2-message: "What's up, Sara?! Can't say anything?!"
\.\C[4](Shoot...! I messed that up!)
4-4-message: "What's up, Sara?! Can't say anything?!"
\.\C[4](Shoot...! I messed that up!)
5-1-message: \.\C[3]The next one will be the last.
\."You don't... have to shoulder any more, Sara...!"
\."Was she... was she really, definitely a fake...?!"
\."Look at the corpse, you'll be able to tell!"
\."As if I could look... at the corpse...!!"

\.\C[4](Should I look down from above...?
 At the fake's body...)
\.\C[3]I looked down at the fallen Reko.
\.\C[3]She looked nothing but real to me.

\.\C[3]A human killed by impalement.
...And an ally, at that.
\.\C[3]Even if she was a doll... that was Reko.
\."...Look at that. She really was a doll."
\."But then... Where is the real Reko...?"

\."The Room of Lies...!!
 Not good! Reko!!"

\.\C[3]As Alice took off running,
our Impression Room finally sank back to the ground.

\."Don't die, Gin!! Keiji's... bringin' an antidote!!
 It'll be better soon!!"

\.\C[4](I shouldn't shake him...!
 It might make the poison spread more...)
\.\C[4](All I can do is keep shouting...)

\."Sara... Let's go find Reko.
 Gin will be fine with the antidote."

\."Believe in the policeman...!
 Reko... We're going to search for Reko!"

\."She's right... Keiji and me'll help Gin.
 You get goin', Sara!!"
5-1-choice:
Take a look
Don't want to look
15-1-message: \C[10]Will you let Gin die and save the fake?
\.\C[4](Even knowing it's not the real Reko...)

4-1-message: \C[3]One of numerous monitors.
\.\C[3]A photo of Gin is displayed on the back.
4-2-message:
\.\sw[564]"Myaaawn...? Woof!
 Why'd you wake me up, big sis Sara?"\sw[567]
\.\C[4](This is... an AI of Gin...)
\."Sorry. Can we talk for a bit, Gin?"

\.\sw[564]"Of course, meow!
 Woohoo!!"\sw[567]
\.\C[4](Heehee, he's so cheerful...)
\.\sw[564]"Still wanna ask questions, meow?"\sw[567]
\.\sw[564]"...History? What should I talk about, woof?"\sw[567]
\."Hm... Just an introduction would make me happy."

\.\sw[564]"Gin Ibushi from Heiwa Elementary Class 6-3!
 I'm 12 years old, meow!"\sw[567]
\.\sw[564]"I take care of the animals, meow!!"\sw[567]
\."Is school fun for you?"

\.\sw[564]"Hmm... It's not that fun
 'cause of some guys I don't like, meow."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"But it's fun to meet friends, woof!
 We play games together, meooow!"\sw[567]
\."Do you wear that outfit to school, too?"

\.\sw[564]"Nah, because people get mad.
 It's only when I'm at home, woof!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"...It's kinda easier to talk when I wear this, meow.
 But I can't wear it to school, so I get uneasy, woof."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"So people at school tell me I'm obedient, woof!
 But that's wrong... meow..."\sw[567]

\.\C[4](Maybe... he's not good at communicating
 unless he's wearing those clothes.)

\.\sw[564]"My aspirations are to
 live with animals all the time, meow!"\sw[567]
\."Heehee... What kinds of animals?"

\.\sw[564]"I'm way into gators right now, meow!
 They're cute, wooooof!"\sw[567]
\.\C[4](H-Huh... Maybe because he's a boy...)

\.\sw[564]"I'm 138 centimeters and 35.5 kilograms, meow!
 That's 4 foot 6 inches and 78 pounds, woof!"\sw[567]
\.\sw[564]"And I grew 2 centimeters at my last checkup, meow!"\sw[567]

\."Your growth spurt and voice change
 must be coming up soon."

\.\sw[564]"Obviously, meow!
 I'm gonna be bigger than you, big sis Sara!"\sw[567]

\."Ahaha, I'm sure you'll look really cool.
 I've got high hopes for you."

\.\sw[564]"Yeah! I'll sweep you off your feet, meow!
 Be grateful, woof!"\sw[567]
\."Okay, let's make it a promise."

\.\sw[564]"Got it, meow!
 A promise for when I outgrow you, woof!"\sw[567]
\.\C[4](A promise for the future...)
\.\C[4](Gin and I both have a future.)
\.\C[4](We definitely... can't die.)
\.\sw[564]"My family's a double-income household, meow!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"I don't have siblings, so...
 It's lonely when I'm there by myself, meow..."\sw[567]
\.\sw[564]"My mom's super nice even when she's exhausted, woof."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"No matter how late she gets home,
 she always makes dinner... And no matter how much
 I tell her not to overwork herself..."\sw[567]
\."Do you like your mom?"

\.\sw[564]"I love her, meow!
 I'm worried how she's even busier lately, woof..."\sw[567]
\."What about your dad?"
\.\sw[564]"I don't like some things... but I like him, meow."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"But I super hate when he's a drunkard
 who causes trouble, meow! It's embarrassing, woof!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"And he's always getting yelled at by mom and
 apologizing, so it's like he's got no dignity, woof."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"I don't wanna be that kind of
 pathetic grown-up, meooow!"\sw[567]
\.\C[4](Huh... So it's a decent enough family...)

\.\sw[564]"...But I'm sure I won't, meow.
 'Cause I'm not blood-related to dad, woof."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"I heard he married mom when I was 2, meow!
 So that genetics stuff won't make me
 turn out like him, woof!"\sw[567]
\."Is that so...?"

\.\sw[564]"Well, it's not like I hate dad, woof.
 It's true, meow!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"I dunno, meow...
 It's scary, woof..."\sw[567]
\.\sw[564]"What's dying feel like, meow...?"\sw[567]
\."I... don't know either."
\.\sw[564]"I don't wanna never meet mom and dad again, meow..."\sw[567]
\.\sw[564]"Big sis Sara... are you scared too, meow?"\sw[567]

\."...Yeah, I am.
 ...Really scared..."

\.\sw[564]"I'll definitely protect you, meow!
 Come see me anytime, woof!"\sw[567]
\."Heehee... Thanks..."
\.\sw[564]"What I hold dear...? That's hard, meowww."\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"Hmm... It's gotta be mom and dad, meow!
 I'd be sad if they went away, woof!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"Ah! And the Mew-chan cushion I'm always with!
 They're super precious to me, meow!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"We're always together, so I forgot, meow!
 Sorry, Mew-chaaan! Woof..."\sw[567]
\."Mew-chan is family to you too, huh?"

\.\sw[564]"That's right, meow!
 I got seriously mad when dad was gonna
 throw them away, meow! Unforgivable, woof!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"Get me a new one?! No way, meow!!
 You're a dummy, woof!"\sw[567]

\.\sw[564]"I'm getting furious just remembering, woof!
 Mom should yell at him again, meowww!"\sw[567]

5-1-message: \.\C[3]A photo of Alice is displayed on the back.
6-1-message: \.\C[3]A photo of Reko is displayed on the back.
6-2-message: \.\sw[560]"Hm...? Yo, Sara. What's up?"\sw[565]
\.\C[4](This is... an AI of Reko...)

\.\sw[560]"Huh...? Something's weird.
 Right, I'm an AI, aren't I..."\sw[565]
\."...Is it okay if I ask you things?"
\.\sw[560]"Hell yeah, ask away."\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"Still got something to ask?"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Err... I'mma super cool,
 23-year-old singer-songwriter...
 Something like that?"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"I've liked music since I was a kid.
 Classical, folk, heavy metal...
 I listened to all of it."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Think around grade school,
 I found myself starting to compose and write lyrics.
 My instincts moved my body."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"That was a fun time... People praised me,
 and my parents were just plain happy..."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Once they started calling me a gifted kid...
 Then there started being more noise."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Old bastards in the music industry wanting money...
 My pops craving the limelight... Before I knew it,
 I was making music that my heart wasn't in."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"In middle school, I rebelled. I was a rocker!
 I made tons of songs nobody even wanted!"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"But even then, noise swarmed around me.
 Man, even my spirit had to give in."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"From high school on, all the spice was gone...
 Didn't even have anger... My activity dried up."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"I had tons of chances to be famous.
 But I smashed 'em all. I was totally just
 the industry's problem child."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Everybody kept their distance from me.
 Once I couldn't even gather members,
 I borrowed Alice to make a band... Hahaha."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Then two and a half years ago...
 He caused that incident..."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Well, at any rate, I am who I am now
 'cause of that shitty past."\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"Learn something from that, Sara?"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"5 foot 7, 121 pounds.
 Pretty proud of my reflexes! And I can remember
 choreography in a snap, so... My memory's bangin'!"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Well... I'm not great at baseball and stuff...
 Hell, maybe I'm not great at anything
 that's got nothing to do with music."\sw[565]
\."By the way, what are your measurements?"
\.\sw[560]"N-No reason to tell you that, right...?"\sw[565]

\.\C[4](So she won't answer just anything...
 Even her AI can be kind of troublesome.)
\.\sw[560]"Family... Well, uh..."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"...I like my mom. Though she's a little weird.
 She's affectionate... and I cause her lots of trouble.
 Yeah, I gotta show my appreciation more."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"My old man... Well, he's a good guy...
 But let's say he gives in to temptation.
 He's not the most true to his convictions."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"I hated him for the longest time...
 But he's woken up now, and gone back to
 his plain and simple personality."\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"After them is... Alice, huh."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"He's... what should I say?
 Why'd he do something like that...?"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"A while after he got arrested...
 I left music."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Ahh... I just remembered.
 At the time, I wrote in my diary, which is rare..."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"I wrote that music, the thing I'd poured
 my soul into all this time... suddenly felt like
 a cold series of notes... this inorganic thing."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"I wondered, was this how music sounded
 to people who didn't care about it...?"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"I always thought I didn't care about my brother,
 and never listened to him, but..."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"Truth is... Maybe I was a little jealous of
 my normal brother. And acted that way out of spite..."\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"...You shouldn't ever murder somebody..."\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"Why do I gotta go through this shit...?"\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"Do we have anything in common...?"\sw[565]
\.\sw[560]"I haven't got a clue..."\sw[565]

\.\C[4](Something in common...?
 I wonder if there is...)

\.\sw[560]"Believe it or not...
 I think family's important, right?
 I wanna show appreciation to my parents."\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"But like, right now... The original me
 is being put through this Death Game, yeah?"\sw[565]

\.\sw[560]"If she dies, she can't do... anything.
 So when you think of it like that,
 what's important's my own life, ain't it?"\sw[565]
\."...What about your instruments?"
\.\sw[560]"Instruments...?"\sw[565]

\."When I first met Reko...
 I heard she treasured her bongos."

\.\sw[560]"Well, sure.
 I'm playing bongos in my new band, but..."\sw[565]

\.\C[4](Bongos don't seem to be
 ringing a bell for this AI Reko...)

8-1-message: \C[3]One of numerous monitors.
\.\C[3]A photo of Q-taro is displayed on the back.
8-2-message: \.\sw[562]"Hm? Now where's this?"\sw[566]
\.\C[4](This is... an AI of Q-taro...)
\."Um, Q-taro, could we talk?"

\.\sw[562]"Yeah, s'okay with me.
 If yer fine with an AI, we can have a chat."\sw[566]
\."Thank you very much."

\.\sw[562]"Quit with the formality!
 Let's talk all casual-like!"\sw[566]
\.\sw[562]"I'll answer any question ya got!"\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"I was raised up in an orphanage
 that's just a mite bit weird."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"Had people from all sortsa countries.
 I got a lotta dialects and stuff mixed in me..."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"On top'a compulsory education, they even put me
 through high school... Can't thank the place enough."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"An' now, I'm a pro baseball player.
 ...Kiddos at the orphanage root for me, too."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"I wanna hurry up and show 'em...
 That even guys in situations like ours can
 get on a mound and have the stadium roarin'..."\sw[566]
\.\C[4](So he has an affection for the orphanage...)

\.\sw[562]"Well, point is, I got no history yet.
 I'm about to be makin' some radiant records!"\sw[566]
\.\sw[562]"Better get yer autographs early, Sara!"\sw[566]
\.\C[4](I'll ask the real Q-taro for one sometime...)

\.\sw[562]"6 foot 4 inches! 230 pounds!
 And lemme tell ya, it's all muscle, not fat!"\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"My position's pitcher, but I got confidence
 in my batting, base-running, and fielding!"\sw[566]
\.\C[4](Not really familiar, but he sounds strong...!)

\.\sw[562]"But my greatest weapon's my head.
 Gotta be smart to be a first-class athlete."\sw[566]
\."Do you, now?"

\.\sw[562]"'Course, I'm reflecting on the time
 I tore apart those puzzle rings by force, but..."\sw[566]

\.\C[4](Whatever he's doing,
 his physical abilities tower above the rest...)
\."Is it hard to discuss...?"
\.\sw[562]"Nah... there's just nothing to discuss."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"'Cause I've never seen my birth parents' faces.
 Only place I knew was the orphanage."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"That's why... the people there were my moms and dads.
 Doesn't matter our blood relation."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"I do get thinkin' sometimes.
 What kinda people was I born to,
 and what kinda genetics do I got...?"\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"I started baseball jus' for fun, but...
 I've thought how if I pitch as a first-string pro...
 maybe my birth parents'll be watchin'."\sw[566]
\."...Do you want to meet them?"

\.\sw[562]"If we could talk and laugh it up, that'd be the best.
 All at ease, like "I'm havin' a great life"..."\sw[566]
\.\sw[562]"Huh, you're doin' this Death Game, right...?"\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"Knowin' me, I doubt I got even
 the slightest notion of dyin'."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"Hell, to a second-stringer, baseball's a Death Game
 with my life as a player on the line!"\sw[566]
\.\C[4](Don't joke about it like that...)
\.\sw[562]"But to do some self-analysis..."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"I wonder if maybe I'll try an' win
 within the rules of the game..."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"In the saga of a sports player,
 ya tend to forget about breakin' the rules."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"Maybe somebody like you, young and not knowin' fear,
 is more suited to findin' a path to survival."\sw[566]
\."...Is that so..."

\.\sw[562]"...Sorry to make it sound like it ain't my business.
 I mean look, I'm an AI, y'know?"\sw[566]
\.\sw[562]"Hold dear, huh..."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"The caretakers at the orphanage, the kiddos...
 Of course, baseball, and..."\sw[566]
\.\sw[562]"Myself... probably."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"I ain't gonna sugarcoat it.
 I don't wanna die, and I don't want
 the people I like to die."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"So I don't like to kick people...
 But if I gotta, I got the resolve."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"But I hate the kinda asshole
 who's got that as their first thought!"\sw[566]
\.\sw[562]"...Sorry for gettin' all fired up."\sw[566]

\.\sw[562]"Shouldn't have said that all cocky-like
 when you're involved in it... Don't you mind me."\sw[566]
\."...No, it's okay."

1-1-message: \.\C[4](No good... It doesn't seem to boot up.)

\."Quiet...
 Try not to alert anyone to this place, just in case."

\.\C[3]Q-taro produced a laptop computer
from behind the rubble.

\.\C[3]It was unquestionably Kai's laptop...
The one we found on the first floor.

\."But this laptop should have vanished
 from the first floor after Kai retrieved it..."
\."Why is it here on the third?!"

\."Beats me...
 But there's no mistake, this is Kai's laptop."

\."The possibilities I can think of are,
 either someone collected this and put it here..."
\."Hold it, guys. Seek the truth later, alright?"

\."Sara, Keiji, I called ya over
 so you could break into this laptop!"
\."I can't use a computer fer beans."

\."Wahaha... Investigate what's on it?
 Let's give it a shot, Sara."

\."Okay, it's on!
\! Please... Get us some good info! Anything!"

\."W-Wait a second!! We should come up with a plan first
 for what data to look for...!"

\.\C[3]The laptop quietly booted up
and displayed a password entry screen.

\."W... Whaaaaat?!
 Shoot...! It's still nearly drained!!"
\.\C[4](Sou mentioned it in the Main Game...!)
\.\C[4](No, calm down... That can't be right!)

\.\C[4](It's because he hit upon the password that
 he discovered Kai was the owner of the laptop.)

\."Kai... changed the password!
 That's the only explanation!"
\."What do we do?! The battery's at 4 percent!!"

\."Sara...!
 Type in something only you would know!"

\."If Kai really had a connection to your family...
 I bet he'd use a password we couldn't guess."

\.\C[4](I don't know! My family... is just normal!
 There's nothing special to try...!)
\."Our family's got a hero in the shadows, Sara."
\."The battery's on 3 percent!! What do we do?!"

\."Emails...!
 Let's check the emails Sou talked about."

\.\C[4](The email log...
 Sou suspected Kai after reading those.)

\.\C[4](We need to confirm
 whether those were real or all lies...!)

\.As planned, 17 people have been secured. Just in case,
is there no error in the date of the Death Game?

Everything is proceeding smoothly.

\.I feel a deep affection for miss Sara as well.
I will certainly protect her.

I am prepared to offer myself up for the Chidouins.

\.It's about time.

If any harm comes to Sara Chidouin,
I will stand against even you as an enemy.

\.Miss Sara is looking forward to the games.
Surely her \C[2]friend\C[0] will also take part.
\."Yep... Exactly what Sou said they were."

\."We just read them \C[2]in reverse order\C[0]...!
 From the newest to the oldest!"

\."...Sara, there must be \C[2]received emails\C[0]
 corresponding to these too."

\."There...!
 Sure enough, there were conversations over email!"
\."Sort 'em out! Rearrange 'em in the proper order!"
\.\C[3]I sorted the emails and began reading.

\.\C[4]Hello hellooooo! (^^)/
Didja know? Sara's going to a board game meetup!

\.\C[4]Wonder if she's goin alone....
Papa's worried she might make sum bad friends....

\.Miss Sara is looking forward to the games.
Surely her friend will also take part.
\.\C[4]Kaiii~? I never told you, so when'd you find out?

\.\C[4]I swear, about the only time I have
any idea what you're up to is when you're
there at home replyin from your computer,,,,

\.\C[4]Aw well, keep up the guard work!


Thankies a million!
\."So... yer pops and Kai... were in communication?!"

\.\C[10]Kai. You betrayed us?

Betrayed the organization. Betrayed me.

\.It's about time.

If any harm comes to Sara Chidouin,
I will stand against even you as an enemy.

\.\C[10]Unforgivable. It's all come to nothing.

Just try and struggle. With your puny arms.
\."H... Hey, the guy in this email...!"

\."From the context, maybe \C[2]one of Kai's parents\C[0]...?
\! And it says \C[2]Kai betrayed the organization\C[0]."
\.\C[4](Organization? Kai... just what were you doing...?)

\.\C[4]Hello hellooooo! (^^)/
Feelin kinda in danger lately....

\.\C[4]Well ok, its Sara they're after.
She's being targeted.

\.\C[4]I'm attached to this house,
but I guess I gotta discard it and run.

...Will you come with, Kai?

\.I feel a deep affection for miss Sara as well.
I will certainly protect her.

I am prepared to offer myself up for the Chidouins.

\.\C[4]Oh Kai.... u really are the greatest hero ever.


Thankies a million!

\."Discard the house and run...
 Sara, were you making plans to move soon, say?"

\."I didn't hear about that...
 I didn't hear anything...!"

\.\C[10]Are you the contact?
You should know not to use this address.
I'll hear the report, but follow the rules from now on.

\.As planned, 17 people have been secured. Just in case,
is there no error in the date of the Death Game?

Everything is proceeding smoothly.

\.\C[10]Thought you could pretend to be my contact
and disrupt things, Kai?

\.\C[10]You're at home right now,
away from the Chidouin house. Aren't you?

\.\C[10]I've got a tip for you.
The phrase you just sent, "X people have been secured,"
is the trigger that sets the plan into motion.

\."What's the big idea?!
 I'm not followin' at all!!"

\."I'll sum it up.
 Kai was in correspondence with two people..."

\."One was \C[2]Sara's father\C[0].
 And the other was... \C[2]one of Kai's parents,
 who belonged to the kidnappers' organization\C[0]."

\."It seems Kai \C[2]betrayed the organization\C[0]...
 He chose to instead \C[2]protect Sara\C[0]."

\."And to do that, on the day of the kidnapping...
 \C[2]Kai sent a fake email to the organization\C[0]."

\."Maybe the idea was that it'd disrupt
 the organization, letting Sara escape..."

\."But... his ruse was fully exposed.
\! He just got used instead."

\."'Cause \C[2]"thankies a million"\C[0]...
 was the signoff used between Kai and Sara's dad."

\."The emails were going straight through.
 All of their exchanges... went to the organization..."
\."He guarded me in secret... to protect me...!"

\."An' the only time Kai left his guard duty...
\! It was when he sent emails from home!"

\.\C[4](Even after his cover was blown,
 I'm sure Kai was still trying to warn me...!)

\.\C[4](That night, coming home with Joe...
 That's why he stood in our way!)
\."Couldn't get any info related to escape after all."

\."But still... Sure enough,
 Kai wasn't a good-fer-nothin' villain!!"
\."...There are still things we could check."

\."If we can just get it charged...
 We'll boot this laptop back up."

\."...For the time being,
 let's not tell everyone else about this."

\."It's a secret weapon just for us three...
 Make sure you don't spill the beans."

\."That's settled, then.
 We should act just the same as yesterday."

\."Y-Yeah! I'll hide the laptop in my bedroom
 and go do an attraction or somethin'!"

Sou lied to us
Kai changed the password

2-1-message: \.\C[3]If Kanna and I had the exact same trial...

\.\C[3]This was probably the phone used
to play the voice instructions.
\.\C[3]Did the kidnappers forget to collect it...?
\.\C[4](Since it's here, Kanna's sister might have had it...)
\.\C[3]Maybe... there's some message left on it.
\.\C[3]A message from just before her death.
\.\C[4](Please, let my bad feeling be wrong...!!)
\.\C[3]It didn't have a password on it, and unlocked easily.
\.\C[3]...I went as white as a sheet.

\."What's the matter...?
 It sounded like you yelled something..."
\.\C[4](Not good! If she sees the phone...!)
\.\C[3]My hands are shaking too much to type.
\.\C[3]I'm sweating so much, my taps don't register.
\.\C[3]I slid the phone in my hands under the bed.
\.\C[3]Somehow, I'd managed to hide it without Kanna noticing.
\."I came to call for you, Kanna."
\."Hmph... Quite the dark passage that was."

\."Kanna Kizuchi, rejoice.
 Shall the three of us trade tokens?"

\."Yeah. ...We shouldn't talk in a place like this,
 so let's head back for now."
\.\C[4](If I took the phone now, Sou would find out...!)

\."Ahem. Us three will do the token trade.
 Sara Chidouin, you should take a hike."

\.\C[4](Gah... As long as they're here,
 I can't go get the phone!)
\.\C[4](I'll have to come later when there's an opening...)

\."Well... I just happened to overhear
 that youngster Gin talking, but..."
\."It seems there's a ghost in the \C[2]Medical Office\C[0]..."
\."I don't know the details, but go take care of it."

\."Obviously...! I can't possibly go do attractions
 until something is done about it!"

\.\C[4](When he tells me that so directly,
 it's hard to muster the will to refuse.)

\.\C[4](Oh well... I'll make it a priority
 to do something about the Medical Office ghost.)
\.\C[4](Until then... I'll go do attractions, I guess.)

2-3-message: \.\C[3]The smartphone is nowhere to be found.
\."Huh? Wonder if I hit the bullseye."
\."Did you read what was on it...?!"
\."What I'm curious about is who sowed this seed."

\."Did you read what was on it?!
 That cruel message...!!"
\."A hateful message written to Kanna by her sister..."
\."Or rather, a prop made to seem that way."
\."What do you intend to do with that phone?!"

\."What should I do, indeed?
 Maybe I'll toss it..."
\."Or maybe I'll go show this cruel message to Kanna."

\."...As if.
 I wonder, was that was YOUR aim, miss Sara?"

\."...Heh.
 Just think about it, would you?"

\."Do you think she could write that message
 while on death's door?"

\."I recall there was a time limit
 in the First Trial, wasn't there?"

\."Would someone who didn't want to die
 give up so soon and leave a message?"

\."And one with linebreaks and capitalization...
 Ahaha."

\."Amazing, huh? This is definitely trying
 to drive Kanna into a corner..."

\."Just a solid ball of malice.
 Some people will do anything to harass."
\."...It was you, wasn't it, miss Sara?"

\."...I saw it all unfold.
 You set that phone in place under the bed."

\."I didn't "set it in place"!
 I hid it there so Kanna wouldn't see it!!"

\."...It's obvious that Kanna
 would search this room eventually."

\."The feeling that maybe her sister
 left something behind would guide her here."

\."A message on a phone she found herself...
 ...She'd be taking it head-on."

\."A heaping helping of despair...
 And this time, it'd totally destroy her."

\."Kanna was right behind me! If I wanted to show her...
 I'd have just picked it up, right?!"

\."You're too wary. You took extra precautions
 so she wouldn't suspect it was faked."

\."You were insistent on having Kanna
 find the phone all on her own."

\."Because... that would inflict
 the greatest despair on her head-on."

\."You did it with the intent
 to completely destroy Kanna's heart."

\."That's a false accusation!!
 You're just picking a fight!"

\."You believed Kanna would return to this room,
 so you set it up for her to discover the phone
 all by herself."

\."That awful message of despair...
 This time, it really would destroy her..."
\."Sou...! I swear, you are just the worst!!"

\."I wonder if you intended to offer Kanna a hand
 in the depths of despair, to make her depend on you?"

\."I can't help but be mystified
 by your methods of gathering trust."
\."Ever since the Main Game... I've been wondering..."

\."What was I to do? Certainly couldn't let myself
 be singled out if I wanted to get Clear Chips."
\."Of course, I didn't expect to trick you, Sara..."

\."But as long as I could find just one total sucker,
 that would be plenty."
\.\C[4](I'm a fool for even being a little worried...!)

\."Well, doesn't matter.
 You and I aren't going to get along at this point."

\."When I'm around everyone else...
 I'll act the same as before."

\.\C[4](I'm getting that phone back!
 I'll destroy it for Kanna's sake!!)

\."You've got a ghastly look on your face.
 Are these your true colors, Sara?"
\.\C[3]There was... one thing I didn't expect.

\.\C[3]Taking advantage of my surprise,
he grabbed the phone back.
\."I won't let you have your way."
\.\C[4](...I can't lay a hand on him...)
\.\C[4](I don't know what Sou might do.)

\.\C[4](He got me... again...!
 How does he keep doing it?!)
\.\C[3]Despairing, I put the room behind me.
2-3-choice:
Give it back!
Did you read it?!
What's your aim?!

I hid it so Kanna wouldn't see
I'd keep it if I wanted to show it
What a false accusation!

Take it back by force
Do nothing
3-1-message:
\.\C[4](I made it here without being found.
 Now I just have to search...)

1-1-message: \.Let's remember things one step at a time.

This is me.

My name is \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].

It all began when I was coming home from school
with my friend \C[2]Jou Tazuna\C[0].

Suddenly, a stalker appeared...
We ran in fear of being attacked, and arrived home.

But someone was lurking there,
and knocked us unconscious.
We woke up in an unfamiliar room.

Tied to beds and with collars put on us,
we were forced to solve a puzzle for our lives.

That was... the \C[2]First Trial\C[0].

Waiting for us after we got through the trial
were 9 people of varying age, gender, and occupation.

Still not knowing what was what,
we all cooperated to escape this place,
and evaded traps trying to take our lives.

Due to an unfair move from the suddenly-appearing
Floor Master - \C[2]Sue Miley, the Laughing Doll\C[0]...

We also met up with a murderer who had been hiding,
\C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0]...

And began a vote with our lives at stake...
The \C[2]Main Game\C[0].

Two cards decided our fates...
The \C[3]Sage\C[0], and the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0].

The ones who had them were...

\C[2]Kai Satou\C[0], my stalker who held
some sort of key to the Death Game, and...
And so Joe was killed... in the cruelest of ways.
In my crumbling heart... someone's voice echoes.
\C[4]"I entrust them to you... Our regrets, our hopes."
There... my senses gave out again.
\.\C[3]On the table are Clear Chips and a "Web of Happiness."

\.\C[4](In the final attraction, it may just save your lives.
 ...What does that mean?)
\.\C[4](It's clearly suspicious... but should we touch it...?)
\.\C[3]There's a table in the center of the room.
\.\C[3]I approached and examined the top of the table.
\.\C[4](And on the right is... a rope?)

\.\C[3]On top of the plate with the rope-like object on it,
there was also a note.

\.\C[3]This is the \C[2]Web of Happiness\C[3].
In the final attraction, it may just save your lives.

\.\C[4](That's astoundingly suspicious...
 Is it safe to touch?)
\."Reko, let's take the items on the table."
\."Wait...! In that case, let's do it together."
\.\C[3]I reached for Reko's hand at once and grabbed it.
\."She's still in the Room of Lies...!"

\.\C[4](I... I need to bring somebody...!!
 We need to open this door!!)

\."...Y-Yeah! I wasn't scared...!
 Somethin' the matter, Sara?"
\."Err... um... As long as you're okay..."
\."Relax. I didn't drop the Clear Chips."

\."I got a cold sweat when it went pitch black...
\! Don't you tell anybody I was freakin' out."
\.\C[4](I wonder if she doesn't like the dark...)

\."But I wonder what that was...
 You know, what was the "lie" part."

\."Are these Clear Chips the "lie"?
 Maybe they're fakes or something..."
\."Y-You serious...? They look real to me, though?!"
\."I wonder... if saying "there's a lie" is the lie..."

\."Seriously?!
 This ain't some trick question for kids..."

\."Maybe it was for real just a bonus?
 Man, that just makes it creepier..."

\."Hmm... What are we gonna do
 with these dubious Clear Chips?"

\."I was thinking I'd give them to somebody
 who was having trouble collecting 'em, but..."

\."Look, I get being wary...
 But you've got a right to have some."
\.\C[4](Should I accept this suspicious Clear Chip...?)

"We both risked life and limb for these...
 I'll take one."

\."Nah, you're right to be apprehensive of these things.
 I get how you feel."

\."...Tell me if there's anything I can do instead.
 Feel free to count on me, Sara."

\."Wait...
 Is this glove... not yours, Reko?"
\.\C[3]Reko was already wearing gloves on both hands.
\."When I pulled your hand earlier, I..."
\."Uh, pretty sure nobody pulled my hand..."
\."Hmm... Must be one of my spare gloves..."

\."Yeah. Ranger put full changes of clothes
 in our rooms, remember?"

\."Well, thanks, anyhow.
 ...We should get going, Sara."
\.\C[4](The Room of Lies... just what was it?)
\.\C[4](And this Web of Happiness... what could it be...)
\.\C[4](No use in worrying about it, I guess...)
\.\C[4](Maybe it's about time to do an attraction.)
\.\C[4](...I wonder if Keiji found the culprit.)
1-1-choice:
Are the Clear Chips fake?
The lie is that there's a lie?
I don't know

2-2-message:
"This is the Prize Exchange.
 Please inform me if you have business."
\."Can you trade for Reko Yabusame's \C[2]treasure\C[0] here?"

\."You can.
 It may be purchased for 20 of Ms. Reko's tokens."

"This is Ms. Reko's \C[2]treasure\C[0].
 You may now take it."

\."Impossible... you say her... Reko's treasure...
 is this worthless present I gave her...?"

\."I thought there was some mistake...
\! Some mistake of yours, Sara Chidouin..."
\."Good thing it wasn't my mistake, huh, Alice?"

\."I've been telling you from the start.
 Give Reko her treasure back."
\."I want to hear your real feelings already, Alice."

\."Sorry for poking fun...
 But I bet you were hoping for this."

\."Don't joke with me!!
 Reko and I... These bongos are...!!"
\."Alice, please tell me how you really feel."

\."You want to repair your relationship
 with Reko... don't you?"
\."...not a person who asks selfish things."

\."I intended to atone for my crime...!
 For the victim's family!! And for my own...!!"
\."If only it weren't for this Death Game...!!"

\."There's... not enough time left
 to do this in the proper order..."
\."So just once before I die, I..."

\."Thank you.
 I will give her the bongos."

\.\C[4](As the one who brought it up,
 I feel some responsibility to watch over this.)
2-2-choice:
Good for you
You seem happy
Gimme those

1-1-message: \C[3]Alice and Reko were talking in the lobby.
\."...If it's nothin', then I'm outta here."
\."...I found them at the Prize Exchange."

\."I was surprised.
 I thought you'd long since thrown them out..."

\."When you sent me that letter telling me
 you were cutting contact, rather than shock..."
\."You are... a musical demon overflowing with talent."

\."I thought you were quick to forget your garbage,
 deadweight brother, living life as it suited you."
\."I told myself that... to find relief."
\."To confirm that my actions had no effect on you..."

\."The traces of use... and of careful maintenance
 to conceal that fact... The more I look at them,
 the more they look like traces of your suffering."

\."Let me apologize.
 I made you and our parents... suffer for so long..."

\."It may sound flimsy!
 But it's how I really feel...!!"
\.\C[3]Reko took the bongos, seeming unable to bear it...

\."Didn't I tell ya? I was always thinking
 I'd throw these damn things out."
\."Don't act like a big brother, Alice."
\."You and me are complete strangers now."

\."You think this crap'll let us reconcile?
 You even realized you took a person's life...?"

\."...For 2 and a half years,
 I've never once forgotten about my crime..."
\."Then why would you ever interact with me again?!"
\.\C[3]I'd believed they would be able to reconcile.
\.\C[3]I'd never seen Reko look so terrifying.
\.\C[3]This wasn't a matter for an outsider to speak on.
\.\C[4](For now... talking with Alice is a priority.)
\.\C[3]Alice was picking up the pieces of the broken bongos.
\.\C[3]Very delicately, not missing a single small piece.
\."At least... not when she's around me."
\."I ask that you don't hate Reko."

\."Just because you saw one side of her...
 doesn't mean that's all she is."
\."You've helped me this far, Sara Chidouin."
\."I feel... I was finally able to take a step."
\C[3]As Alice left...\! I saw he was crying.

\.\C[4](A Reko I don't know...
 That only Alice knows...)
\.\C[3]Time passed me by as I racked my brain.
1-1-choice:
Go after Reko
Talk to Alice

1-1-message: \."Wasn't it a bond between you two?!"

\."A bond?! As if...!
 It was a shackle...! A chain connecting me to him!!"

\."That's right, I've always kept it in!
 The resentment I wouldn't let out on him...!!"
\."Then why did you treasure the bongos until now?!"
\."Hell if I know!! I just couldn't toss 'em!"
\."...I didn't want you to see this, Sara."

\."I admit I lost my cool.
 But listen, this is our problem...!"
\."I didn't do that 'cause I wanted to...!!"
\."I'm not gonna... be able to look you in the eye..."
\.\C[3]I can't imagine Reko truly hates him.
\.\C[3]But I couldn't do anything for their relationship.
\.\C[3]I heard a feeble voice behind me.

\."I... trust you, you know...
 For real..."

\."...No. It's because I like you
 that I can't turn a blind eye."

\."I... trust you too, you know...
 For real..."

\.\C[3]Hearing Reko's voice on the verge of tears,
I couldn't bring myself to turn around.
1-1-choice:
That went too far
Was that how you really feel?

1-1-message: \.\C[3]There's not a single person in the lobby.

\.\C[3]Looking to the windows,
the morning sun shone radiantly into my eyes.

\.\C[4](Today is the fourth day...!
 The time limit's up!)
\."Hmph... That wasn't so bad, was it?"

\."What is it, Sara Chidouin?
 You seem surprised..."

\."Dammit...! In the end...
 We've still got no means of escape!"

\."Now, now... Maybe we should be glad
 we're still alive, huh?"

\."The loner's a loner, but still stubborn, woof!
 What a world, meow!"

\."But I'm glad no one had to be sacrificed!
 Truly...!!"
\.\C[4](Not a single one of us is missing!)
\.\C[4](This won't go how the kidnappers expect!!)

\."Don't make light of us!!
 We're MORE stubborn than roaches!!"

\."Yeah, yeah. Guess I underestimated that.
\! Honestly, figured at least one of y'all'd die."

\."Well, whatever.
 There's a place I wantcha all to come to."
\."What?! Don't tell me... The Main Game already?!"

\.\C[10]"Not just yet...
 Gotta save the most fun for last..."

\.\C[10]"Great design, right?
 I want you to go through there."

\.\C[10]"Scratch that - you ARE gonna come through
 if you don't wanna get killed!"

\."...Don't worry. We won all within the rules.
 Shouldn't be anything too absurd..."
\."Guess we gotta, meow. Let's go, woof..."
2-1-message: \C[3]The room is dark; I can hardly see anything.
2-1-choice:
Proceed ahead
Cancel

2-1-message: \."Whoa, you're in a real hurry, huh?"
\."You wanna meet Reko that badly, ya bastard?"

\."...Why are you saying it like that?!
 Talk, you damn doll!!"
\."Ahaha... Fine... I'll let you meet her."
\."But first, I got a quiz for ya!"
\.\C[10]"What's the current status of Reko Yabusame?"
\.\C[10]"2. Dead from a trap in this room."

\.\C[10]"3. Watching over y'all as a severed head.
 ...Pick one!"

\."Stop it, stop it!!
 I can't believe that... I can't!!"
\."If you want her that bad, have her. Catch!"
\.\C[10]"You got a big hole in your stomach."
\."Aww, that's not great. You're gonna die, huh?"
\.\C[3]As my mind went blank, I heard footsteps approach.
\."You dumbass!! Bro!! Don't die on me!!"

\."Open your eyes!! Bro!!
 It's me!! It's Reko!!"

\.\C[3]I looked to the center of the room,
and saw an open pillar of sorts.
\.\C[4](Don't tell me... Reko was in there from the start?!)
\."Well? This is the Room of Lies!"

\."The correct answer to the quiz was
 "the real Reko is alive and tied up"!"

\."Didn't even notice it was a doll's head...
 Goes to show how much a sibling bond is worth!"

\."The moment it exploded...
 The trap should've been over with."

\."If you'd released me right away,
 I could've at least told him I was alive!!"

\."Huhhh? What he was thinking doesn't change
 that he was gonna die, does it?"

\."It changes everything!!
 It's totally different, dammit...!"

\."Hey, you should know... If you kill a Floor Master,
 y'all are \C[2]all gonna die\C[0]."

\."We're being tested as Floor Masters too!
 Get me?"
\."Well... That's only if you beat me anyhow..."

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]This is a waiting room
for until the next episode is released.

\.\C[3]If you save here, when the next episode is out,
you can, you know... continue on all nicely.

\.\C[3]Well then...
Thank you very much for staying with it this far.

\."Aren't you late. Welcome to the Room of Lies!
 The stage is all set!"

\."W... Who's this chick?!
 Doesn't she look exactly like me?!"

\."S-She was really... here...
 Then am I... seriously a duplicate...?"

\."Huh? Confessing it that easily?
 So boring! See, I was thinking of having a quiz..."
\."Ahaha... You guys ever heard of doppelgangers?"

\."Someone witnessing you somewhere you never went.
 Or else, you meeting another you..."

\."In some countries, that phenomenon...
 is considered an omen of death."

\.\C[3]As soon as he finished talking,
a sound began ringing out.

\."W... What the hell...?!
 Why'd my collar start making that noise?!"

\."...We don't need two Reko Yabusames.
 Only one needs to survive..."
\."Graaah...!! I'm gonna tear this thing off...!!"

\.\C[10]"Ahaha... I wonder what type of death
 that collar will give...? Can't wait to see..."
\.\C[10]"You three idiot girls are just so friendly..."
\.\C[10]"Well then... I'll let you choose who to save."

\."Save whoever you like more!
 And if you don't pick either, both'll die."

\.\C[4](We abandoned Gin to protect the life
 of the fake Reko... and yet...!)

\."Don't be so self-centered, Sara Chidouin.
 The one I'm saying I'll let choose is..."
\."Nao Egokoro! I'm gonna have you pick!"

\."Don't be stupid...!!
 It's just about choosing the real one, right?!"
\."*sigh*... You're just full of complaints, huh?"
\."As a special service, how about you use this?"
\.\C[3]The knife Kai used to commit suicide.
\."Nao!! Pick me if you don't wanna suffer!!"
\."I'm serious!! This ain't just a threat...!!"

\."If I'm gonna die... then not only Nao...!!
 Sara!! I'm takin' you with me too...!!"

\."Even in this short time, I understood...
 You can't possibly hurt a friend."

\."Reko is my friend, too...
 I need to save her..."

\.\sp[12]"You never... intended on letting
 the fake survive from the start, did you...?"

"Ahh, it was the exploding type.
\! Well, simple is best!"

\."Wake her up! Nao!! Sara!!
 Won't you explain?!"

\."Ahh, couldn't even come to see her die...
 Some siblings you are, huh?"

\."You see how much she's bleeding?
 C'mon, you know it."

\."This is the fake Reko's blood, right?!
 I won't be fooled!!"

\."Look, collapsed over there!
 The headless Reko is the fake."

\."Reko is so much stronger, luckier,
 and more hateful than me...!!"
\."She's... a person whose life has value...!!"
\.\C[10]"She's garbage now. It's just a corpse."

\."If you kill a Floor Master,
 all y'all are gonna die, y'know..."
\."Oh well. Seems I'll just have to kill you too!"

2-1-message:
\."Hmm... Normally, this is when I'd drive you off.
 But I'm a good mood right now..."
\."Urk... I'm good, meow. I'm scared, woof."

\."Mwahaha... Suit yourself.
 You've missed your chance..."
"Mwaha... My mind is clear as a spring morning..."
3-1-message: \."I'll tell you right away if I find anything, Sara."
3-2-message: \."I'll tell you right away if I find anything, Sara."
\."Did you just see something too, Sara?"
\."Wahaha... You had the same eyes as me."

\."The eyes of a shrewd detective
 who never overlooks the heart's unrest..."

\."You sensed something shady about Nao.
 Must be the result of spending days with her..."

\."Dunno. Unfortunately, we don't exactly
 have time to confirm that right now."

\."Let's do what we have to.
 There's only ever one option to take."

\."So, the Room of Rubble is past the Ruined Corridor.
 Let's go."
4-1-message:
"It is certainly within your options
 to spend some time together, you two."
4-2-message: \C[3]I can't tell anything about Gashu's heart.

"...To sense someone's heart,
 you need to have spent time together."
4-4-message: "Is something the matter?"
\."No, nothing."
\."If you have any worries, please inform me."
4-5-message: \."Urk... Smells like a fancy house, meow..."
\."Please, sniff as much as you'd like."
4-6-message: "Could I tempt you to some tea?"
4-7-message: "It isn't the time to be sniffing people, meow!!"
6-1-message: \.\C[4](Not good! Alice has lost himself in rage...!)

\."He doesn't have a gun right now...!
 I've been waiting for this moment!!"
"Go on, Alice! Question him about how to escape!"
\."Hmph, escape? That might be nice, too."

\."He doesn't have a gun right now...!
 I've been waiting for this moment!!"

\."Hmph, you make me laugh.
 So even you value your life."

\."You have it wrong!
 I must protect all of your lives...!!"

\."Huh?! As you murder us one after another...?
 Don't screw with me!!"
\."Now tell me where the exit is! Or else you're...!"

\."Be serious with me!!
 Then how are you gonna leave when it's all over?!"
\.\C[3]Alice reached his hand toward Gashu's neck.
\."What is THAT?! Please, enough of these games...!!"
\C[4](A collar...! Even the Floor Masters are...?!)
\."What do you want that would make you do this...?!"

\."It is all for our mission.
 The mission of everyone here."

\."Now, I will excuse myself.
 Please continue to spend your time before
 the Main Game well, so as to leave no regrets."

\."Ahaha. Good on you, miss Sara.
 That's our dependable leader."

\."Speaking of which, I've got something
 important to talk about with you and Keiji."
6-1-choice:
Make him stop
Go for it, Alice!
6-3-message: \."Really got on your bad side, huh..."
\.\C[4](I wonder, does he mean that literally...?)

\.\C[4](Maybe he means something more like
 striking a temporary truce.)

\."Thank goodness... I was afraid I'd get
 pelted with abuse and insults..."
\."You think we can at this point...?"
\."S-Sorry. But I'm thinking about what I've done."

\."I'm not going to let the Main Game happen!
 Look at my eyes...!"

\."W-What do you mean by that?
 I don't understand."
\."Huh? We've quarreled a bunch, haven't we?"
\."But I realized, you know, it can't go on like this."
\."I mean, our real enemy is the kidnappers, right?"

"Hold on now, what's this?! Sou! Old buddy, old pal!
 Haven't we always been the bestest of friends?!"

\."S-Sorry.
 I'm not really one for that sort of energy..."
\.\C[4](Neither am I, but I'm trying over here...!)

\."Still, I'm glad.
 I seriously do want to reconcile with you, miss Sara."

\."I don't want the kidnappers
 to make us dance for them any longer."

\."I want to put an end to this ridiculous Death Game.
 I want us to escape."
\."And of course, I mean all of us...!"
\."So how about we all share this laptop?"\.
\."It's my bad for taking it from you, but..."

\."In the end, I couldn't see what was on it
 because the password had been changed."

\."That explains why you suddenly feel like
 joining up with us, who know the password."
\."Enough with the bargaining. There isn't time."
\."We have the password. Sou has the laptop."
\."I really do just want to reconcile, though..."

\."Well, whatever.
 Okay, as a proof of rebuilt friendship..."
\."Here, Kanna, you make good with miss Sara too."
\."Well, at least shake hands with Kanna!"
\.\C[3]The moment I pulled back my hand...
\.\C[3]But that was all at Sou's instigation.
\."Yo. Sara, Kanna. I've been watching you guys."

\."I dunno what happened...
 But if there's no ill feelings, then great."

\."Um, Reko, will you look at it with us?
 At Kai's laptop!"
\."Tha's perfect. You come over here too!"

\."Hmph... So this is what's on
 that aproned rascal's laptop."

\.\C[4](If there are any clues
 we can use to escape in here...!)
6-3-choice:
Let's do it
Let's not
I don't understand
We've always been friends
6-4-message: \C[3]Kanna and Q-taro... seem kind of happy.
6-6-message: \."Um, we're in a little bit of a hurry, so..."

\."...Gashu is watching.
 Let's leave without drawing suspicion."
6-7-message:
\."Go on, then.
 We'll do what each of us needs to do."
6-8-message: \."Big sis Sara, don't sniff it! Run away!"
7-1-message:
"Yo, you two.
 What's the hurry?"
\."...On a date."
\."Bastard...! Get away from Sara!"
\.\C[4](This isn't the time for jokes...!!)
7-3-message:
"Damn beanie bastard...
 What's he planning with Kanna in tow?"
7-6-message:
"I bet I really would be happier
 forgetting painful memories, but..."
15-1-message:
\C[4](I'll go to the Medical Office...
 Everyone should be waiting there.)
15-3-message:
\.\C[3]Glancing at each other's faces,
and seeing looks of anxiety mixed with trust.
\."I hid it 'cause the suspicious loner was there..."
\."But I might've found a way out, woof!"

\."I don't wanna trouble you guys anymore, meow!
 So I'll do my best, woof!"
\.\C[4](I feel so uneasy... Is everything going to be okay?)
15-5-message: \."Oh, I just figured I shouldn't be sitting still..."

\."...I thought, I should be thinking about
 a way for us to escape, too..."
\."I'll tell you right away if I find anything, Sara."
\."Maybe I'll lend you my aid, Sara."
\.\C[3]You can now use Keiji's partner ability.

\."My detective sight...
 It should be at least a little useful."
\.\C[3]Touch the icon to activate your partner's ability.
15-9-message: \."Ehehe, you came at a good time."

\."D... Don't give me that displeased look...
 I just wanted to talk for a bit."
\."Huh? Wow, you're actually listening to me..."
\."Tha's right! There ain't no time, Sou."
\."S... Said it outright... Boy, that hurts."

\."It ain't anything bad, Sara.
 Won't you listen?"
\.\C[4](Have the three of them been working together...?)
15-12-message:
\."Mya!! Don't interfere, woof!
 We're in a hurry, meow!!"

\."But it would be dangerous
 if you tripped in your haste."

\."Move it, Floor Master.
 ...You trying to stall or something?"

\."Absolutely not.
 I simply spoke up out of concern. ...Go ahead."
\.\C[4](We need to head for Nao's bedroom!)
15-14-message:
"Hey, Sara.
 What're we getting started here?"

"You, Sara Chidouin.
 What's about to transpire here?"
15-16-message: "All right, everybody. Let's head for the exit!"
\."Hold up...!! I wanna hear the details!"
\."I'll explain later... There's no time now."
\."Whoever wants to escape, come to the stairs."
\."...If you wanna stay, I won't stop you."
\."I didn't say I wouldn't come along, you know!!"

83-1-message:
\C[3]Laizer's Chip

A small chip removed from Rio Laizer's head.
Capable of nullifying the facility's security.

2-1-message:
\."Huh...? O-Of course...
 I guess I didn't mention it, did I...?"

\."I'm just thinking... Once we go in the room,
 we might only have one chance..."
\."So... Would you let me check the chip first?"
\."Yes. If it's broken, this plan will be a failure..."

\."I just feel like...
 you aren't your usual self..."
\.\C[4](I want to believe you too, Nao!)
\.\C[4](I'll close my eyes... and take a deep breath.)
\.\C[4](I'll look at Nao again with a clear head.)
\.\C[4](The way I did when I was Keiji...!)
\.\C[4](I'll close my eyes... and take a deep breath.)
\.\C[4](I'll look at Nao again with a clear head.)
\.\C[4](The way I did when I was Keiji...!)

\.\C[4](What would Keiji do?
 How can I move her...?!)
2-1-choice:
Is the secret room really here?
Let's hurry

Hand over the chip
Don't hand it over

I do trust you
I can't trust you
2-3-message:
\."We're allies. If you're just going to trick me,
 I'd rather we stand together and share our worries."
\."...You saw right through me, didn't you."
\."I don't know anything about this secret room."
\."I do... know how we can find out."
\."I'd love to know what YOUR plans are going forward."

\."Come on... Have you even thought about
 \C[2]how you'll use this chip\C[0]?"
\."We know how...! Please, give it back!"
\."What a liar you are, miss Sara."

\."Hold on a second.
 Why do you know about the chip...?!"

"If we just mess around with it,
 we'll figure something out!"

\."No you won't. Precision machinery
 is a lot more delicate than you are, miss Sara."
\."Hmph. This isn't the time for childish arguments."

"I need to go and \C[2]analyze\C[0] the chip
 with this \C[2]laptop\C[0]."
\."Ahaha. At least you're being honest, miss Sara."

\."You having this is like
 casting pearls before swine."

"You're the worst, meow!!
 You used big sis Nao for that, woof?!"
\."She's a good kid, unlike you two."

\."Alright, miss Nao.
 Hand me the chip."

\.\C[3]Nao grabbed the laptop, pushed Sou away,
and took off running.

\."Hang on! The chip and the laptop...?!
 Where are you going with those?!"

\."Big sis Sara, let's go after her, woof!
 She went toward the lobby, meow!!"
2-3-choice:
We know how to use it
Why do you know about it?
We'll figure something out
We don't know
2-5-message: \C[3]My feet move as if guided by something.
\.\C[3]Some sort of premonition is calling me.
3-1-message: \."So both of you, please come to the lobby."

\."Okie-dokie. I'm half-believing...
 But I'll come to the lobby once I'm done here."
"Wonder how much time we have left..."
3-2-message: \."So both of you, please come to the lobby."

\."Okie-dokie. I'm half-believing...
 But I'll come to the lobby once I'm done here."
\."Where'd you learn a word like that, huh?"

2-1-message:
"Sou and Kanna are cooped up in their room...
 Can't even negotiate."
\.\C[4](...Feels like he's breathing a little easy.)
"Q-taro... What are you going to do now?"

\."Oh, Sara. I was thinkin', this is exactly the sort of
 time to leisurely think about clues for escape..."

\."But I'm havin' a humdinger of a time
 on account'a findin' diddly squat."
\."Well, but I guess there's one thing..."
\."Are you looking for leads on escape, Q-taro?"

\."Don't casually switch over to conversation!!
 You freaked me out!!"
\."Kai's laptop... 's pretty much all I got..."

\."Would be nice to persuade Sou...
 But he ain't leavin' his room."

\."And Kanna's with him too...
 Hope he don't use her for nothin' evil."
2-1-choice:
What are you doing now?
Scare him from behind
2-2-message:
"Maybe the reason he's not entirely at wit's end...
 is because he's got lots of tokens."
3-1-message: "Can't spare the time to reapply my makeup..."
"Can't believe you, Kanna... Is Sou really...?"
\.\C[3]Reko slapped my shoulder with an accepting smile.
\."Wha?! Sara!! You just made eye contact, right?!"
\."Sorry... I thought I'd be butting in."

\."Huh, is that why...
 I was feeling a little down..."

\."I see you've got some color back in your face.
 Glad you're okay, Sara."

\."It's fine, don't say a thing.
 We actually kept looking at the laptop..."

\."If I knew a little more about computers,
 maybe I could do something..."

\."But that ain't happening.
 Gotta think of something else..."
3-2-message: \."Hmm? You want a hug, Gin? C'mere."
\."Stop it, woof!! I'm seriously searching, meow!!"
\."Hahaha! Sure you are, sure you are!"
3-3-message:
\C[3]Whenever Kanna looks uneasy,
Alice lowers his head a little.
\.\C[4](Such scary eyes... And yet he's talking with Kanna...)

\."Hmph... For how blue in the face you were
 when you ran off, you're looking better now."

\."Me, worried...? That's for someone
 far more gullible... Fool..."

\."Though it's fine.
 You've always been too nosy..."

\."It's our fate to fight...
 It's best you drop half-baked ideas of friendship."
\.\C[4](I ignore him, and suddenly he gets chatty...)

\."Sara Chidouin, after you left,
 we did continue to investigate the laptop..."

\."But there was no great information.
 ...I'm just letting you know."

\."More importantly, would you take my place
 as Kanna Kizuchi's conversation partner?"

\."She's treating me just like a friend.
 Has she not forgotten I'm a murderer...?"
3-4-message: \.\C[4](Wonder what kind of smell that is...)
4-1-message: \C[3]Kanna is quietly conversing.

"Kanna... needs to search for
 anything she can do too...!"
"Yes... Sou really has done a lot to help us escape..."
\.\C[4](They're talking about Sou...?)
"Kanna..."
\."Sara!! Are you okay now?"
\."Yeah... I just wasn't feeling well earlier."
\."Please, sit down! By all means!"
\."Nah, I'm fine... You were sitting here first."
\."T-Then I'll sit on your lap, Sara!"
\."No thanks... Anyway, what's this about Sou?"
\{"KANNA!!"
\."HyaaaAAAaaaAAAaaa?!"
\."Talking about Sou? Let me hear it."
\."Aahh... You scared me, sist...!!"
\."I-I mean, Sara."
\."Earlier... I went to return the laptop to Sou..."

\."And it looked like he was making progress
 on a plan to escape...!"
\."I... Is that right?!"
\.\C[4](Was what he said before really true...?)

\."I'm sure Sou can come up with a way
 for all of us to leave...!"

\."...Whatever role card you have...
 It doesn't matter, Sara."
4-2-message: *sniff sniff*...
\."Yaaah!! Nooo!!"
\."Meooow?! That hurt, woof!!"
\."Huh...?! I-I'm sorry..."

 waiting up ahead..."

 even if it means going alone, won't you?"

and gently slopes downward.

\.\C[3]There doesn't seem to be a plug nor a cord
that would be needed to power a computer.

4-1-message: \.\C[3]A Ring-Up Box has appeared in the back of my room.
\.\C[3]It's... quiet.
\.\C[3]Here in my room, I'm all alone.
\.\C[3]My hands are shaking.

\.\C[3]Back there, I tried to cheer everyone up
so they wouldn't be uneasy.
\.\C[3]I told myself I couldn't give in around them.
\.\C[4](But when I'm alone... I'm so cowardly...)
\.\C[4](No, no... I can't get timid...)
\.\C[3]Suddenly, the tablet began making a sound.
\.\C[4](Could this sound mean...)
\.\C[4](It's begun...?)
\.\C[3]The \C[2]Trading Phase\C[3] of the Main Game will now begin.
\.\C[3]Now accessing your role card.
\.\C[3]A fateful moment.
\.\C[3]My heartbeat is loud and out of control.
\.\C[3]Subconsciously, I was praying.
\.\C[4](Don't do it...)
\{\C[10]Anything but the one that killed Joe...
\.\C[4](C... Commoner...)
\.\C[3]Before I knew it, I'd dropped to the floor.
\.\C[3]Relief...
\.\C[3]I stayed there motionless for a few minutes.
"Hey, Sara."
\."...Is that you, Keiji?"

\."Yep. Could you open up?
 Can we talk in there?"
\."...Is that you, Nao?"

\."Does my voice sound that cute?
 Nope, it's your friendly policeman."
\."...You okay? You on guard?"

\."Your friendly policeman just wants to
 come in and chat... How about it?"
\.\C[4](It's Keiji...!)
\.\C[4](Should I open the door and invite him in?)
\."I'll open it now."
\."...Thanks."
\."For now, can we... just talk like this?"
\."...Okie-dokie. I'll just get straight to business."
\.\C[4](Business...?)
\."...Didn't want to have me at your door, huh?"
\."Hmm. I mean, caution's a good thing and all..."
\."Okie-dokie. I'll just get straight to business."
\.\C[4](Business...?)

\."If you're Keiji, you should know the password!
 Tell it to me!"

\."...Now that's a toughie.
 Guess this case is going unsolved."

\.\C[4](I can only imagine Keiji giving
 such an unmotivated reply...)
\."Okie-dokie. I'll just get straight to business."
\.\C[4](Business...?)
\."What exactly... do you want?"
\."...I'll get straight to the point, Sara."
\."Sara, you're..."
\."The \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], right?"
\."Hahahaaa! That's one obvious reaction, Sara..."
\.\C[4](S... Shoot! I made a weird sound!)

\."Ahh, thank goodness... If you really were
 the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], I'd have been pretty worried."
\."I-I haven't confirmed anything yet!"

\."You make it obvious, but you won't confess...
 Sure enough, you're clever."
\."But you're still a bad liar, huh?"
\."Well, I'm the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0]."
\."Not gonna trust me at my word though, are you..."
\."'Scuse me for a second."
\.\C[3]Keiji slipped by me into the phone booth.
\."What are you doing?!"
\."...Presenting proof, I guess?"
\.\C[3]Keiji went on inserting token after token.
\."Ahoy-hoy..."
\.\C[4](Don't tell me...!!)
\.\C[4](The tablet again...!)
\.\C[4](My role... changed!)
\.\C[3]The first trade has just been performed.
\.\C[4](A trade?!)
\."Huh... So you were a \C[4]Commoner\C[0], Sara."

\."Did you just trade?!
 Your \C[2]Keymaster\C[0]... for my \C[4]Commoner\C[0]!!"

\."That proves it to you, right?
 Your friendly policeman's the Keym..."
\."What were you thinking?!"

\."That was a valuable chance for a trade!
 Why did you go and waste it on this?!"
\."Sara, you're..."
\."The \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], right?"
\."Hahahaaa! That's one obvious reaction, Sara..."
\.\C[4](S... Shoot! I made a weird sound!)

\."Ahh, thank goodness... If you really were
 the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], I'd have been pretty worried."
\."I-I haven't confirmed anything yet!"

\."You make it obvious, but you won't confess...
 Sure enough, you're clever."
\."But you're still a bad liar, huh?"
\."Well, I'm the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0]."
\."Not gonna trust me at my word though, are you..."
\."Just hold on a sec, Sara."
\.\C[3]I hear footsteps trailing away from my door.
\.\C[4](What's he going to do...?)
\.\C[4](The tablet again...!)
\.\C[4](My role... changed!)
\.\C[3]The first trade has just been performed.
\.\C[4](A trade?!)
"Well? I traded you my \C[2]Keymaster\C[0]."
\.\C[3]Practically on reflex, I opened my door.
\."Thanks. So, Sara, you were a \C[4]Commoner\C[0]."
\."What were you thinking?!"
\.\C[3]I dragged him into the room and closed the door.

\."That was a valuable chance for a trade!
 Why did you go and waste it on this?!"
\."Huh... You're mad at me?"
\."I'm not mad!!"
\."Just... wanted you to trust me."

\."We've only got 3 hours.
 No time to waste suspecting each other over roles."
\."'Cause we're... gonna make our escape."
\."...I understand."
\."You must have an idea. Tell it to me."
\."Right..."
4-1-choice:
Is that Keiji?
Is that Nao?
..........

Open door and invite in
Don't open and chat
Silently ignore him
Ask him for a password
5-1-message:
"Say, Sara.
 What sorts of methods could we escape by, you think?"

"We could search for an exit
 without letting the kidnappers find us out."

\."That's true. Maybe we can avoid
 the watchful eye of the Floor Masters."

"Let's defeat the kidnappers and return home
 gloriously out the front door."

\."Whoa, so courageous.
 They might have weapons, y'know."
\."...You're makin' me feel bad for Q-taro, Sara."

\."We could cause a stir, to the point that they're like
 "the Death Game is neither here nor there!"..."
\."Hmm. Then what, should we make a time bomb?"
\."Sure enough, the thing we need... is information."
\."Where is this place? What sort of building is it?"

\."If we just had a floor map, at least,
 we'd have half a chance."
\."Which of us would know about something like that?"

"Sou... He's done a lot of suspicious stuff.
 Maybe he knows something..."

\."But I doubt we could investigate him
 even if we had all the time in the world."
\."Mishima died and reappeared as an AI, but..."
\."What if some floor map data was put in him...?"
\."So then, the person I was thinking was..."
\."Okay, I'll confess who I was thinking of."

\."Even if he didn't know the details of the Death Game,
 he might have known something about this facility."
\."So then... the laptop he left behind?"

\."Yep. There's still info
 we haven't checked on that laptop."

\.\C[4](Q-taro got his hands on it once,
 but it ran out of battery...)
\.\C[4](And now, it's back in Sou's hands...)
\."You remember the place we found it?"
\."Well, I did a little detectiving there."

\.\C[4](But before we even came to the third floor...
 Kai was already...)
5-1-choice:
Secretly look for an exit
Defeat our enemy and leave
Destroy the Death Game

despite its complexity, offers only simple functions.
1-2-message:
\C[3]In front of the monitors is a machine that,
despite its complexity, offers only simple functions.

\C[3]Looking down by the ground,
various wires are connected to the computer.
\."They said it was the blue wire, right?"
\.\C[3]I connected the blue wire to the computer.
\."I'm going to press things at random...!!"
\C[3]My hands move on intuition and instinct.
\.\C[3]As if I knew the answer from the very beginning.
\.\C[3]...made an unpleasant error noise and froze.
\."Sara, don't suddenly turn to desperation on me."
\."Look, by your feet. See those wires?"
\."It was the blue one, yeah? Let's try connecting it."

\.\C[3]Keiji connected a blue wire
on the floor to the computer.
\."Can't refuse a request from you, Sara."

\.\C[3]Keiji connected a blue wire
on the floor to the computer.

17-1-message: \C[3]The center monitor shows Nao's bedroom.

\.\C[4](Is she okay...? She keeps talking with
 the Professor Mishima AI...)
\C[3]The center monitor shows an empty bedroom.

\.\C[4](Huh?
 Something's odd about this bedroom...)
\.\C[4](W-What...?! What's going on?!)
\.\C[4](That's the Mishima AI...!!)
"*pant*... *pant*... I made it back..."
\."Is this... really for the best...?"
\sw[324]"Indeed. Well done, miss Nao."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"I'm glad your safety was ensured."\sw[325]
"But, but... he'll...!!"
\."Professor! What should I do...?!"
\sw[324]"Believe in me, miss Nao."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"For I was miraculously revived
 so that I could protect you..."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"Do just as I say... yes?"\sw[325]
"R... Right..."

\sw[324]"Now, put on a smile!
 I like to see you cheery, miss Nao."\sw[325]
\sw[324]"Fantastic. What a good student I have, indeed."\sw[325]
\C[4](What's... going on?)
\."...This isn't good."
\."Keiji..."
"Just what is that Professor Mishima...?!"
\."Hmm... He said he "revived," but..."
\."He was always just an AI that Reko destroyed here."

\."It's a tricky subject, huh?
 AIs are entities of pure data, so..."

"If our enemy's up to it, maybe they're free to
 revive 'em and copy 'em as they like."
\."What's "death" even mean in that case...?"
\."The scarier thing is..."

\."They might also be able to remake their personalities
 however it suits them, don't you think?"
\."Nao's behaving strangely, isn't she...?"
\."It sure looks like Mishima put her up to something."
\."Maybe that card trade earlier was Nao...!!"

\."But it takes 50 tokens to trade.
 Nao shouldn't have very many, I thought."
\.\C[4](Then what in the world...?)
\."Mishima just said he'd been "revived"..."

\."But wasn't he always just
 an AI that Reko destroyed right here?"
\.\C[4](Reko had a good reason to destroy him, and yet...)
\."Wonder if he's really the same AI...?"

\."Only Nao's room having a monitor in it
 is pretty suspect, too."
\."Maybe the Floor Master is plotting something."

What's with that Mishima...?
Nao is acting strange

\C[3]We checked all the monitors,
but Gin was nowhere to be found.
\."It's Gashu... I'll shut off the security system."
"Oh dear. Just what are you two up to...?"
\."Hm? Sure are nosy... We're having a moment here."
\."While you're here, though, tell me something."
\."Are there AIs on all these monitors?"

\."Here are assembled AIs of
 all candidates who \C[2]cleared the First Trial\C[0]."

\."Gotcha. You can go.
 We've got... a thing to get back to here, see."
\."Yes. I shall leave you to it..."
\."We should really get back to looking for Gin!"

\."I'm gradually coming to understand
 how our enemy operates..."

\."By the time he comes back safe...
 We should have an escape plan to surprise him with."

\."I know...!
 We should collect Ranger's chip while we still can!"
\."I'm sure... he'll escape and return to us..."

\."And when he does... we should have an escape plan
 worked out to surprise him with."
\."Let's go... To the Room of Lies!"

 There's a path in the back, woof!"
3-4-message: \C[3]There's a pitch black path further in.
3-5-message: \C[3]There's a pitch black path further in.
4-1-message: \C[3]Sou and Kanna are whispering in the corner.
\.\C[4](Not the kind of thing I can barge into...)
5-1-message:
\."Yeah!! I'm totally better, woof!
 Poison won't scare me anymore, meow!"

\."Guess the antidote Keiji brought worked like a charm!
 Don't see no weird after-effects, neither!"
\."Good showing from your friendly policeman, eh?"

\.\C[4](It really was a close call...
 If Keiji hadn't found the antidote, Gin might have...)

\."The antidote Keiji brought's workin' like a charm!
 Don't feel no weird after-effects, neither!"
\."Good showing from your friendly policeman, eh?"

\.\C[4](It really was a close call... If Keiji hadn't
 found the antidote, both of them might have...)
"Same to you. Your reasoning saved us, Sara."

\."Not to mention your decisiveness in that moment...
 You and Nao are really something."
\."...I allowed the fake Reko to die."
\."...That's about the only thing I could do."

\."Mostly it came down to Q-taro
 putting his life on the line."

"Well, we've been here three whole days.
 All that searching around was worth it."

\.\C[4](Stupid... Why'd I have to say that
 like I'm suspicious of him?)

\."But if Gin had taken all five of those stingers...
 it'd probably be impossible."
\."We owe it to Q-taro for putting his life on the line."
\."...We've lost a lot of allies on the way here."

\."Alice... he may have looked like trouble at first...
 But I don't think he was a bad guy..."

\."You've got the lives you saved right here.
 ...Isn't that right?"
\.\C[3]Gin's smile is helping to save us all.
\.\C[3]If we lost him, too... I'm sure we'd...
\."Haha... What're you crying for? You're a big kid."

\."Sorry, meow... I couldn't do anything...
 So Alice..."
\."Ain't nothing for you to apologize about, Gin."

\."Sorry the real me couldn't be there
 when you were in a pinch."

\."Human or doll, it don't matter.
 Both of 'em were our allies... and..."

\."All the kidnappers are planning here
 is for us to kill each other."

\."You let someone live, and kill someone else.
 That's all it is."

\."So why would you help each other?
 Why try to be kind..."

\."If she'd thought only for herself a little more,
 maybe she wouldn't have had to die like that..."
\."She was lonesome. Despite how it looked..."
\.\C[4](Of course we won't forget. We can't...!)
\."Hmph... Maybe there's something wrong with me, too..."

\."Even though you and I are
 soon going to be killing each other..."

\."I will now begin explanations
 for the second Main Game."
\."Mr. Gin Ibushi... How are you faring?"

\."You think we're just gonna sit here
 and listen to yer damn explanation?"

\."You guys are always pulling tricks!
 I won't trust you, woof!!"

\."W-What the heck, woof!!
 Don't come any closer, meow...!"

\."Just amazing, Mr. Gin Ibushi. Astonishing resilience!
 Why, you're the picture of health already."

\."And \C[2]Uncle Crabstache\C[0]...
 It's an honor to receive such a charming nickname."

\."Mr. Q-taro Burgerberg, you're healthy as well...
 My word, the stamina of a first-class baseball player
 is truly something else!"
\."Oh dear... So there is yet some venom left!"
\."...Um, when are you getting to the explanation?"
\."Well then, I shall explain this Main Game."

\."That said, the basic rules are the same.
 It is a voting game making use of four cards:
 the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0], \C[3]Sage\C[0], \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], and \C[5]Commoner\C[0]..."

\."The \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] is the \C[2]keyman of destruction,
 should they be chosen\C[0]... The one who carries it bears
 great responsibility, but it also serves as armor."

\."The \C[3]Sage\C[0] is a \C[2]superhuman who knows
 the one in possession of the Keymaster role\C[0].
 But once exposed... it is hard to protect oneself."

\."The \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] will \C[2]die unless chosen\C[0].
 They are the sole person who can turn
 defeat into victory, or victory into defeat."

\."And the \C[4]Commoners\C[0] have no power at all...
 But thus they fill the role of guiding the discussion
 in the proper direction."

\."However, this time, we will use data
 in place of paper cards."

\."Card data has already been distributed at random
 to the voting tablets you possess."
\."All that remains is... the permission to access it."
\."Why'd ya hafta make it so roundabout?!"
\."Because this time, you are able to make \C[2]trades\C[0]."
\."Indeed. Now then, let me show you."
\."A phone booth came from the floor...!"

\."You may trade cards by making a request at
 one of these Ring-Up Boxes, situated in each room."

\."They are simple to use.
 Simply \C[2]insert 50 tokens\C[0] and grab the receiver."

\."Of course, just like the Sub-Game,
 you cannot use your own tokens."
\."Oh? I had thought you would be delighted, Mr. Q-taro."

\.\C[4](That's an awful rule! People without tokens
 don't even get the right to trade...!)

\."Trades are 1-on-1 with who you select.
 Please trade freely, with whomever you wish."
\."You have a time limit of approximately 3 hours."

\."When all have returned to their bedrooms,
 that will signal the start of this trading phase."
\."Do not wear such gloomy looks, everyone."

\."Win, and survive.
 For you were all born to win."

\."So then, please return to your rooms
 within 5 minutes."
\."If you do not... You understand, don't you?"

\.\C[3]We look at each other's faces
and try to judge how we're feeling.

\."It's not like we're out of time...!
 There must be something we can do!!"

\.\C[4](That might sound flimsy...
 But I'm not giving up!!)

\."I mean, it ain't like everything's
 going hunky-dory for them neither!"

\."The guy with the 'stache shooting Ranger
 must've been unexpected too, right?!"

\.\C[4](Unexpected... If we look for things our enemy
 didn't expect, there's sure to be a way out of this!)
\."For now, let's go back to our rooms..."

\."And after that, we'll definitely
 find a way to escape."
\."I won't let them have their way!!"

\."I won't give up!
 There must be a way to escape... somewhere...!!"

\."Y-Yes, that's right!
 There just has to be...!!"
\.\C[4](I can't let my feelings give in!)

\."Then I'll head back first.
 Don't want to get killed for being tardy."
5-1-choice:
Thank you very much
...Good job knowing where it was

We'll definitely escape
Let's go to our rooms for now
..........
6-1-message: \C[3]Q-taro is chatting happily with Gin and Keiji.
\.\C[4](It's... hard to imagine the Main Game is approaching.)
7-1-message: "Ah... Sara and Gin."
\."Big sis Nao? What're you doing, meow?"
\."I was just looking for Safalin..."
"Why Safalin...?"
\."Ah... um... No particular reason..."
\."She wasn't here, meow?"

\."Hmm...
 I thought I did see her enter the Medical Office..."
"Did you find her?"
\."No, she isn't anywhere..."

\."It's strange...
 I thought I saw her enter the Medical Office..."
7-3-message: "If you're going in... I'll come with you!"
7-4-message:
"Meow... She has sort of a pleasant scent
 mixed with the smell of an art room, woof."
\."Definitely a scent that screams "big sis Nao," meow!"
