1-6-message: "Waaaaaugh!! Nooooo...!!"\|\^
3-1-message:
\."Just now, Human Flower seeds were injected
 by your necklace through your body."

\."Please be at ease...
 She won't suffer like miss Nao."

\."Roots will spread through her body... and feeling
 a comforting numbness... she'll die beautifully..."
"...This is how the chosen one meets her end."

\."So long as the flowers don't wilt...
 her body will always be preserved beautifully..."
\.\sp[15]\C[10]I'll kill every one of you who killed Kanna...!!
\.\sp[15]\C[10]That's right... and first... will be Sara...
\.\C[3]I don't want to look at that reality anymore.

1-1-message: "Hey, you know what a majority vote is?"
\."Well? Gotten used to majority votes yet?"
\."At this rate, you can just vote for you who hate."
\."But it's okay. Just vote for who you hate."
\."Well, keep it up, and vote for who you hate."
\."Kill the people who get in your way."
\."No big, no big. It's not like it's your fault."
\C[3]Reko... has just been staring at the unmoving Alice.
\."Maybe even you going and killing a guy...!!"
\."It's my fault...!! It was all my fault!!"
\."I had so many chances to forgive you...!!"
\."But the Main Game will be very soon..."

\."We were told to assemble, right?!
 I know that!!"

\."But if I see one of those kidnappers' faces right now,
 I know my fists are gonna fly...!!"

\."Y-You can't do that!
 We can't lose you too, Reko...!!"

\."R-Right...? So please...
 Just leave me alone, Nao...!"
\.\C[4](If I don't persuade Reko with Nao, she'll...!)

\.\C[4](If I leave her alone now...
 Reko's heart will...!!)
\."Never mind... for just a little bit..."
\."I can't support everyone like you, Sara..."
\."But I think I can support Reko right now...!!"

\."I'll be right there!
 I'm sure Reko will get back on her feet...!!"
\.\C[4](I'll trust Nao! Off to the Medical Office...!)

1-1-message: \C[3]When I woke up... I was on an island.
\."Where in the world might this be...?"

\.\C[3]Following our first meeting in some time,
I was driving my former student, miss \C[2]Nao\C[3], back home.
But along the way, I lost consciousness.
\."I guess... we've been kidnapped after all...?"

\."I mean, I've sure never heard of
 kidnapping people to an island before..."

\."But gathering this many people together...
 What do they intend to do with us?"
\."Anyhow, we oughta get lookin' for a way to escape!"

\."Seems we've got no choice but to work together...
 Cooperation is key."

\."That can wait until we get to know each other.
 Shall we do introductions...?"

\."Err...
 My name's \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
 I'm just a high school student."

\."I'm \C[2]Jou Tazuna\C[0], but just call me Joe!
 I'm Sara's bud! Ask me anything about her!"

\."I'm \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0], a middle schooler!
 ...And she's not here, but I have a big sister!"

\."\C[2]Q-taro Burgerberg\C[0]'s the name!
 I'mma pro baseballer! ...Second-string, tho!"

\."I'm \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]. I don't really want to say it, but...
 I guess you'd call me a job-hopper."

\."My name's \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0]!
 I'm attending art college right now!"

\."I am \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0].
 As you can see, I work as a homemaker."

\."I'm \C[2]Gin Ibushi\C[0], meow! Don't underestimate me
 'cause I'm just a grade-schooler, woof!!"

\."I am \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0].
 I work as a high school teacher,
 teaching the subjects of art and Japanese."

\."...\C[2]Gonbee Yamada\C[0].
 My occupation is that of a model prisoner...
 I won't be taking any further questions."
\."Seems we've got a dangerous one among us..."
\."Um... Come to think of it, what about you?"
\."Eheehee... What fun you look to be having."
\."I am the Island Master, \C[2]Sue Miley\C[0], the Laughing Doll."
\."Well, everyone? Are you pleased with the island?"
\."Ahaha... What a dreadful way to put it."

\."I merely issued you all an invitation
 to this wonderful \C[2]Isle of Memories\C[0]."
\."What in the world do you mean to have us do?"
\."Eheehee... A most wonderful game of survival."

\."It's all very simple.
 You must merely \C[2]survive here\C[0] for \C[2]30 days\C[0]."

\."Go foraging for food, craft defenses for your base,
 and keep your lives amongst dangerous creatures
 and trap-laden facilities."

\."W-What are you talking about?!
 Let us go right now...!!"
\."Ahaha... Please do give it your all."
\."Dammit!! You hold the hell up, lassie!!"

\."Hmph... What of it?
 At a mere 30 days, this is practically a vacation."

\."Nothing we can do.
 Let's all work together to overcome this."

\.\C[3]Touch the face icons to pick each character's action,
then touch "Next" to advance time!

\.\C[3]Also, with a \C[2]right-click\C[3] (or \C[2]two-finger tap\C[3]),
you can look at each character's stats!
(The View button also works!)

\.\C[3]If \C[2]the protagonist dies\C[3] or \C[2]your Base points hit 0\C[3],
it's game over!

18-1-message:
\C[3]\>[Radio]\<
\>Gives somewhat important info for survival.\<
\>Can also listen to music on it.\<

"Hey, bastards! It's the Rio Ranger Station,
 bringing you some hot survival tips!"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 If you choose to have Sara Forage,
 sometimes she'll go foraging a second time!
 ...Bet she's good at finding faults, too."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Joe Rests, sometimes he gets buddy-buddy,
 and makes everyone's Fondness go up a li'l.
 ...Everybody's friend, eh? Hate those types."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Keiji Train, seems that
 he'll train a second time on occasion.
 ...You beefy guys gross me out."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Kanna Rests, apparently she'll sometimes
 heal a wounded ally by one stage.
 ...What a hypocrite, right? Don't get betrayed!"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Q-taro faces a foe in battle,
 he might sometimes block attacks on the base.
 ...Would love to see him die the hero."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 Even if Sou's about to kick it from starvation,
 he might be able to stick it out!
 ...What are ya, a cactus?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Reko Train, rest easy,
 'cause it seems she never gets hurt doing it.
 ...Is she a robot made of steel or what?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Nao Craft,
 sometimes she'll Craft a second time.
 ...Ah, must be a shut-in, huh?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Kai Craft,
 I hear he'll sometimes find a serving of food.
 ...Is he layin' eggs like a chicken?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you choose to have Gin Rest,
 sometimes all his stats'll go up.
 ...Those clothes won't fit if you get tall, y'know!"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Mishima gets injured Crafting, Foraging,
 or Training, sometimes all his stats'll go up.
 ...You one of those monkey aliens, or what?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 After Gonbee attacks in a battle,
 he'll sometimes attack for you again.
 ...No tellin' what a brutal criminal will do."

\."Hunger happens in about 4 stages!
 A green face is bad news - eat or you'll lose health.
 A purple face is on the verge of death - eat or die!"

\."You ever see wood on the ground around the base?
 Pick that stuff up!"

\."If you see an icon pop up on screen,
 you should try touching it! Should have an effect."

\."You know about Life Shards?
 I hear they can be used to raise Fondness.
 How to get 'em...? You'll know when you get one."

\."When a heart icon pops up, touch it!
 You might get friendlier with somebody."

\."Keep making new weapons, got it?
 It'll increase your Fighting stat.
 Seems there's a limit to that, though."

\."When you make armor,
 it'll only block a single enemy attack.
 Doesn't look like there's any upgrading it."

\."As the days go on, the enemies attacking the base
 will probably get stronger and stronger..."

\."To make the base bigger,
 you gotta gather materials and get to Crafting!"

\."Foraging has the highest odds of injury!
 'Course, if you just coop up indoors, you'll die."

\."Resting normally recovers you by one stage.
 But get a good sleep, and it'll be a full recovery!"

"...Welcome to DJ Gashu's All Night Island.
 This is the song we present you today..."

20-1-message: \C[3]Using a Life Shard on someone will increase fondness.

they'll build a resistance to it

by \C[2]touching their face icon\C[3].
21-1-message: \."It seems it's about time for the base to get larger."

"We've done it!
 It's now a bigger base than before!"

\."And using the new workbench inside,
 we can now \C[2]construct the tools\C[0] we need!"

"Fantastic!
 It's now a sufficient base for habitation indeed!"

\."We can construct more on the workbench,
 and above all, the building looks better than ever!"

"Ohh! Just incredible!
 To think our base would become so splendid!"

\."At this size, we might as well make it a school!
 A school built on a deserted island! How dreamy!"

"What a thing to behold!
 We've built ourselves a castle...!!"

\."Provided we had a stable food supply,
 I might not mind spending the rest of my life here!
 Indeed!"

\."You don't really want this, do ya?!"
\.\C[10]"I've always been your enemy, you see?"

 This facility has a defense system...!!"
\."Ghaah!!\. Urk... Got weapons like this, too...?!"

\."There's actually just
 one thing wrong in your reasoning..."
\."And I'll... tell you what it... is..."

\.\C[4](This wasn't here before, was it?
 Maybe I shouldn't go touching it...)
\."Not good! Someone's coming from the central hall...!"
\."Let's go back to the kitchen and hide!"
\.\C[4](I don't know who you are... but don't notice us...!)

\.\C[3]Keiji picked me up under his arm
and moved me into the kitchen.
\."...? The key that was here is..."
"Listen, don't let Gashu have his way."
\."He's trying to destroy the Death Game."

"The Monitor Room should have
 a \C[2]surveillance mode\C[0], correct?"

\."Connect the \C[2]blue wire\C[0],
 and keep a careful eye on Gashu."
\."You must retrieve \C[2]the chip in Ranger's head\C[0]."

\."That chip can destroy this place's security.
 It's a menace."

"Please be quiet...!
 What if someone heard you?"

"Eheehee...
 Then things would get quite fun, I suppose."
\.\C[4](Wha...?! The tablet?! This is not the time!!)

\."It didn't look like those two
 had captured him, at least."
\."...Let's think about what we can do."
\."Those two mentioned some very interesting things..."
\."Yep. Something about \C[2]a chip in Ranger's head\C[0]..."
\."Plus \C[2]a surveillance mode in the Monitor Room\C[0]..."
\."I don't know what sort of functionality it has..."

\."But if we could watch
 the security cameras on all the floors...!"

\."Sounds loads better than sneaking
 back onto the first floor and getting caught."

\."That annoying noise earlier signaled a trade..."

\."Ah, right.
 Someone's cards must've gotten traded."

\."Glad it didn't add any extra complications.
 Now let's go to the Monitor Room."
\."Our priority should be to check our roles."
\."That annoying noise earlier signaled a trade...!"

\."Ah, right.
 Someone's cards must've gotten traded."
\.\C[3]The second trade was performed 4 minutes ago.
\.\C[4](So it was between people other than us...)

\."Glad it didn't add any extra complications.
 Okay, now about that conversation we overheard."
\."Those two mentioned some very interesting things..."
\."Yep. Something about \C[2]a chip in Ranger's head\C[0]..."
\."Plus \C[2]a surveillance mode in the Monitor Room\C[0]..."
\."I don't know what sort of functionality it has..."

\."But if we could watch
 the security cameras on all the floors...!"

\."Sounds loads better than sneaking
 back onto the first floor and getting caught."

28-1-message: \C[3]It's locked and won't open.
\."Ngh, this door... Was it always locked?"

\.\C[3]Taking a closer look at the doorknob,
I found a dial lock on the side.

\.\C[4](Looks like you have to set it to
 a number from 1 to 9.)

\.\C[4](I can just try every possibility,
 and I'll have solved it in 9 tries...)

\."Hold on, Sara.
 There are little holes on the knob."
\."...It might pop out poison needles."
\."...! Then I can't get this wrong."

\."Sure there's no hint somewhere in this room?
 You should know what's up before you try."
\.\C[4](Even though it was open the first time...)

"Keiji, please bust down the door
 with your brute strength like usual."
\."Eh...? Don't think that's in my wheelhouse."
\."These arms are for protecting people, see."

\.\C[4](Sure enough, I should consider how to solve this.
 I wonder if there's a hint anywhere...)

Ask Keiji

\."Hold on, Sara.

\."...! Then I can't get this wrong."

\."We did see the hint...
 But \C[2]it could be terrible if you get it wrong\C[0]."

\."Sure there's no hint somewhere in this room?
 You should know what's up before you try."
\.\C[4](Even though it was open the first time...)

\."Ugh...!! Maybe there's an antidote
 in the Medical Office...!"
\.\C[3]After coming so far, this is what does me in...
\C[3]The handle turns with a click, and the door opens.

\."Way to go, Sara.
 Now we can enter the Pink Room."
\.\C[4](I'm not confident... I should rethink this.)

\."On the \C[2]blackboard\C[0] in the bar...
 There was \C[2]a list of names showing
 who could and couldn't drink\C[0]."

\."...Feels like you're gonna give me a doggy treat."

2-1-message: \."To think it would connect to here..."
4-1-message: \."Well now, I remember coming here."
\."If I remember right..."
\."This is the first floor \C[2]kitchen\C[0]."

\."The place where Nao was hiding out
 and holding Professor Mishima's head..."

\.\C[4](It's pitch black...
 Was Nao sitting in the dark like this, too...?)
\.\C[4](All alone... talking to Mishima's head...)
\."Nao was despairing..."
\."And Kai used that despair."
\."To take the laptop from Sou."
\."Amazing how she could recover from that."
\."...We're all getting a stronger, bit by bit."

\."Yeah...
 But at the same time..."
\."No, forget it."

\.\C[4](Hold on a second...
 Did no one notice this secret passage?)
\."I wonder if Kai noticed this secret passage..."
\."Yeah, that's the feeling I'm getting."
\."I wonder if Nao noticed this secret passage..."

\."Hmm...
 She had the time to look for it, but..."

\."You really think in all her distress,
 she was up for something like that?"
\.\C[4](That's true...)
\."But Kai... Maybe he noticed."
\."I wonder if Miley knew about this secret passage?"
\."...Probably."

\."She calls herself a Floor Master.
 Wouldn't surprise me if she knew
 the structure of the rooms."
\."...And Kai might've noticed it, too."

\."Whether he knew it from the start
 or only noticed while searching, I don't know..."

\."But I'm thinking that's the fundamental reason
 the laptop ended up in the Room of Rubble."

\.\C[4](Kai came to the third floor,
 and placed the laptop there...)
\.\C[4](He's right, it's possible...)
\."Wahaha... That's convinced me, personally."
\."...Alright. Let's go look for Gin."
4-1-choice:
Maybe Kai...
Maybe Nao...
Maybe Miley...?

Alice, Kai, Kazumi, Keiji, Shunsuke,
Sou, Naomichi, Mai, Megumi, Reko, Q-taro

Anzu, Kanna, Gin, Kugie, Sara, Joe,

 waiting for 'em to come back..."

\."Well... At any rate, we should be able to
 open the Pink Room door with this info."
\."Dunno if Gin's there, but want to go check?"

 But can you carry him, meow?"
\.\C[4](I was able to carry Alice, though...!)

\."We can explain later...
 Q-taro is okay, right...?"

\."Hmm... Might take a while before
 he regains consciousness, it looks like."
\."...We'll meet up in the lobby later, Sara."

\."I'll give him a piggyback ride if I have to...
 'Cause you're onto a way to escape, right?"

\."Keiji... Could you take Q-taro and Kanna,
 and all gather in the lobby later?"
\."We... might know a way to escape."

\."Okie-dokie. I'm half-believing.
 But if you say so, I'll trust you."

4-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Order 8."
\C[5]Kai, good work guarding the Chidouin family.

\.\C[5]It seems the Chidouins have been
looking for assistants as of late.

\.\C[5]This is good timing.
Kai, get them to employ you and slip into their midst.

\.\C[5]The organization has prepared the necessary documents.
They're all kept in this file.
\C[5]Kai, good work guarding the Chidouin family.

\.\C[5]It seems the Chidouins have been
looking for assistants as of late.

\.\C[5]This is good timing.
Kai, get them to employ you and slip into their midst.

\.\C[5]The organization has prepared the necessary documents.
They're all kept in this file.
\C[4](It's... a forged resume.)

\.\C[4](The photo should be authentic, at least...
 Though it seems to be pretty old.)
\.\C[4](I knew we had an assistant when I was a kid...)

\.\C[4](But they only worked while I was at school,
 so I never saw them around.)
\.\C[4](Was Kai... really there, at my house...?)
7-1-message: \C[5]A file named "BACKDOOR.SMUT."

\.\C[3]Inside, there were long strings of text and symbols
I couldn't make any sense of.
\.\C[4](Urgh... I'm good at math and science, but...)
"H-Hey! Quit it with that!!"
\."I-I'm not exactly excited myself, but..."
\."...Well, it's not an image file, right?"
\C[3]I nervously opened the file.

\.\C[3]Inside, there were long strings of text and symbols
I couldn't make any sense of.

\."Can't make heads or tails of it.
 Hard to believe Kai was into this..."

\."Is this a, whatchamacallit...
 Some kinda programming thingie?"
\.\C[4](We can't decipher this sort of thing...)
8-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Order 59."

\C[5]Kai, the Death Game Project is finally
taking on tinges of reality.

\.\C[5]At last, your time has come
to be useful to the organization.

\.\C[5]Guard Sara Chidouin until the planned day,
and ensure she remains healthy.

\.\C[5]And as much as possible, keep an eye out
for her close friends Jou Tazuna and Ryoko Hirose.

\.\C[5]We can't add anyone else.
Understood? Fulfill your duty, Kai.

\C[5]Kai, the Death Game Project is finally
taking on tinges of reality.

\.\C[5]At last, your time has come
to be useful to the organization.

\.\C[5]Guard Sara Chidouin until the planned day,
and ensure she remains healthy.

\.\C[5]And as much as possible, keep an eye out
for her close friends Jou Tazuna and Ryoko Hirose.

\.\C[5]We can't add anyone else.
Understood? Fulfill your duty, Kai.

\C[4](Even Joe, and my best friend Ryoko,
 are mentioned in here...!!)

\.\C[3]The file contains investigative reports on,
and photos of, Joe and Ryoko.

\.\C[4](Don't tell me... Was it planned
 for Ryoko to get involved, too...?)
9-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Sara's Tastes."

\C[5]Miss Sara's Favorite Things (Sweets Edition)

Strawberry jam (jam in general)
Mashed sweet potatoes w/ chestnuts  Koshian toast

\.\C[5]Taste Notes
Miss Sara eats well with a balanced diet.
She especially likes sweet things.
I'm happy to understand her just one bit more.
\C[3]It goes on and on like this.
\C[4](Maybe I'm a bit of a glutton...)
\C[4](Did Kai make this file himself...?)

Mashed sweet potatoes w/ chestnuts  Koshian toast

Miss Sara eats well with a balanced diet.
She especially likes sweet things.
I'm happy to understand her just one bit more.

\.\C[4](Now that I think about it, there always was
 something paste-like at the dinner table...)
10-1-message: \C[5]A file named "To Miss Sara."
\C[5]Hello, miss Sara. I am Kai.

\.\C[5]I am truly sorry you had to get involved
in such an incident as this.

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, if you are reading this,
there is something I want to tell you.

\.\C[5]I, Kai Satou, was an agent
belonging to a certain vile organization.
\C[5]In addition, I was raised as an assassin.

\.\C[5]However, I could not carry out the assassination orders
I was issued in my youth.
\.\C[5]I could not kill another human being.

\C[5]My father was disappointed in me...
and my standing in the organization was low.
\.\C[5]Then one day, I was appointed to a certain task.
\.\C[5]It was to guard and care for you from the shadows.

\.\C[5]I say this, but it was not a task
I held in high regard at first.

\.\C[5]Not until the plans for the Death Game
were beginning to approach a reality.
\.\C[5]I myself do not know the Death Game's objective.
\.\C[5]However, while this is merely my impression...

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, it is possible that
this is all revolving around you.

\.\C[5]Of course, I do also believe
that you are merely a victim, miss Sara.
\.\C[5]Still, the organization needs you.
\.\C[5]And they will take any means necessary.

\.\C[5]The organization's name is \C[2]ASU-NARO\C[5].

It is a secret organization possessing
superb technology in a multitude of fields.
\.\C[5]This Death Game is not for pleasure nor revenge.

\.\C[5]To the organization, it is an inevitable mission.
...That is what my father believed.

\.\C[5]The organization drove my father mad.
There may come a time you must confront him.
\.\C[5]At that time, please, defeat my father, Gashu.

\.\C[5]I have collected all the data
I've researched in the "Sara" folder.
If I am already dead, please make use of it.

\.\C[5]The password is your mother's name.
I hope it can be of some use.

\.\C[5]I pray you will not be swallowed up
by the whirlpool of deception and slaughter.
\.\C[5]Please survive, even if it must be you alone.
\C[5]Hello, miss Sara. I am Kai.

\.\C[5]I am truly sorry you had to get involved
in such an incident as this.
\C[4](This was written during the Death Game...?!)

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, if you are reading this,
there is something I want to tell you.

\.\C[5]I, Kai Satou, was an agent
belonging to a certain vile organization.

and my standing in the organization was low.

\.\C[5]It was to guard and care for you from the shadows.

\.\C[5]I say this, but it was not a task
I held in high regard at first.

\.\C[5]Not until the plans for the Death Game
were beginning to approach a reality.
\.\C[5]I myself do not know the Death Game's objective.
\.\C[5]However, while this is merely my impression...

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, it is possible that
this is all revolving around you.

\.\C[5]Of course, I do also believe
that you are merely a victim, miss Sara.
\.\C[5]Still, the organization needs you.
\.\C[5]And they will take any means necessary.

\.\C[5]The organization's name is \C[2]ASU-NARO\C[5].

It is a secret organization possessing
superb technology in a multitude of fields.
\."Asunaro...?!"
\."Y-You startled me... What's the matter?"
\."That's the same name as the orphanage I'm from!!"
\."...Settle down. Let's keep reading."
\.\C[5]This Death Game is not for pleasure nor revenge.

\.\C[5]To the organization, it is an inevitable mission.
...That is what my father believed.
"His father..."

\C[5]The organization drove my father mad.
There may come a time you must confront him.
\.\C[5]At that time, please, defeat my father, Gashu.

\C[5]I have collected all the data
I've researched in the "Sara" folder.
If I am already dead, please make use of it.

\.\C[5]The password is your mother's name.
I hope it can be of some use.

\.\C[5]I pray you will not be swallowed up
by the whirlpool of deception and slaughter.
\.\C[5]Please survive, even if it must be you alone.
\.\C[3]The message ends here.

\.\C[4](...Kai.
 We're all working together now...)

\."...Hey, Sou.
 Don'tcha think this clears Sara of suspicion?"

\."Weren't you on about that? Saying Sara, Kai, and Joe
 were the masterminds working together..."

\."Well... that was just a little tit for tat.
 I wasn't exactly calm at the time."
\."Sorry, miss Sara. I'm glad we could reconcile."
11-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Personal Thanks."
\C[5]Hello, this is Kai.

\.\C[5]Apologies, but this message has
absolutely nothing to do with the Death Game.

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, I wish to express
my personal gratitude as Kai Satou.
\.\C[5]I owe a great deal to the Chidouin family.

\.\C[5]Your father hired me as an assistant
to help out with his job and housework.

\.\C[5]Of course... this was also a job for the organization,
to keep watch of you.

\.\C[5]At first, I felt disgusted with your father,
who treated me as if I was family.

\.\C[5]I was trained as an agent from a young age.
I had never experienced anything such as "affection."
\.\C[5]I was afraid. Afraid that I might be changing.
\.\C[5]But over time, I came to want to protect your family.
\.\C[5]I wished to see you grow to maturity with my own eyes.
\.\C[5]For the first time, I had a reason to live.
\.\C[5]I'm truly glad I could meet the Chidouins.
\.\C[5]Thank you very much, miss Sara.

12-1-message:
\.\C[5]I was able to use an old ID to successfully access
a very small section of the organization's database.

\.\C[5]There, I discovered data pertaining to
\C[2]participants in the Death Game\C[5].

\C[5]Unfortunately, data on most of the participants
was protected in such a way I could not extract it.

\.\C[5]But there was one man in particular
for which that protection was removed.
\.\C[5]It appears his file was at one time deleted...
\.\C[5]But for some reason or another, it was restored.
\."Sorry, I... I gotta use the toilet..."
\.\C[5]I do not even know his name.

\.\C[5]However, there is only one reason the organization
would delete a file on someone.
\.\C[5]If he passed away before the Death Game...

\."I know... I know I've seen this guy!!
 Somewhere or another...!!"

\."Kanna thinks so, too...
 But she can't remember anything...!"
\."He's wearing the same scarf as Sou...!"

\."Kanna... thinks she must have met him...
 But she can't remember anything!!"
\."The man... the man that I killed...!!"
\."What're you talking about?!\! I mean, Sou's..."

\."Dammit!! Why...?!
 How could I forget what he looked like?!"
\."And... just who in the world is he?!"
\.\C[5]I could not solve the riddle concerning him.
\.\C[5]And there is one more curious aspect.

\.\C[5]There should have been 20 participants
in the Death Game...
\.\C[5]But there were not enough files for everyone.
\."Urgh...!! But this ain't the time for that!!"
\.\C[4](Someone who isn't present initiated a trade...!)
\."Yeah! You guys make sure ya check yours, too!"

\."G-Guys! The info on the laptop
 is more important than our cards right now!!"
\."I-I mean... We can't not look, right?!"
\.\C[3]Q-taro and the others started up their tablets.
\.\C[4](We'll just have to check our cards first, then...)
\.\C[3]The third trade has just been performed.
\.\C[3]And of all things, they pushed on me the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[3].
\.\C[10]"How's it feel to have my card?"

\.\C[10]"No worries. It's not like that card
 means you definitely die, y'know."
\.\C[3]I feel a touch on my shoulder...
\.\C[4](I need... I need to trade cards...!!)
\.\C[4](Right, I left the wallet in my bedroom!!)
\.\C[3]Not caring about anyone watching, I start running.

\.\C[4](What should I do?!
 I can't borrow from anyone!!)
\.\C[3]Not caring about anyone watching, I start running.

Check my role
Focus on the laptop

1-1-message: \.\sw[324]"Ah, if it isn't miss Sara and the others!"\sw[325]
\."Meowww?! It's the old guy's monitor, woof!!"

\."The professor's been brought back again!!
 To protect us...!!"

\.\sw[324]"Please trust me. You require a \C[2]map\C[0]
 of the facility, do you not?"\sw[325]
\."Maybe it'll show us the secret room!"
\."Maybe it'll show us the layout of the facility!"

\.\sw[324]"With the laptop miss Nao has brought,
 I can send over the data."\sw[325]
\."That's why big sis Nao took the laptop...!"
\."Why did you make her steal it...?!"

\."I wouldn't think Laizer's chip
 has anything to do with all this..."

\.\sw[324]"...I can analyze it as well.
 I just thought I would do both at once..."\sw[325]

\."Sara!
 Please don't be suspicious of the professor, okay?!"

\.\sw[324]"Now, connect it quickly.
 There's no time."\sw[325]

\."Big sis Sara!!
 This sounds a little too good to be true, meow!!"
\."It kinda... doesn't feel like the real old guy, woof!"

\."I won't forgive you
 for doubting the professor's generosity!!"

\.\sw[324]"Come, miss Nao.
 Miss Sara and her friends are tired."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]\C[10]"This laptop... this chip...
 They were major nuisances for the Death Game."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]\C[10]"But now, Master Gashu can rest easy."\sw[325]
"Nao! Give us the laptop and chip...!!"
\.\sw[324]\C[10]"It's too late. Both are already connected to me."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]\C[10]"I will destroy all the data on them.
 You'll never so much as dream of escape again...!"\sw[325]
\.\sp[15]\sw[324]\C[10]"Don't run from the Main Game, filthy humans..."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"Nao...! What did you do?! This is...!!"\sw[325]

\."Don't you dare say my name
 with the professor's voice and face!!"
\.\sw[324]"Don't tell me... From the very beginning...?!"\sw[325]

"Did you think my bond
 with the professor was that flimsy?!"

"Hey, miss Sara.
 Do you remember a mysterious program on the laptop?"

"Ahaha. Well, there was one.
 With the filename "BACKDOOR.SMUT"..."
\."Well... That was a last resort Kai prepared."

\."A file named BACKDOOR...
 that was really a \C[2]hacking program\C[0],
 used to get data from the organization."
"Ahaha. You're the one who's getting deleted."
"Oh, really. Did you legs give out?"

\."I'm going to get straight to analyzing now,
 so you do your part."

\."Gather everyone in the lobby.
 I'm counting on you."

\.\C[3]Paying no mind to me struggling to keep up,
Sou began fiddling with the laptop.

Something's fishy!
Thank you very much

The BACKDOOR file

I can stand by myself
Take his hand
I can't stand
2-12-message: "Don't really get a scent from the monitor, woof."
4-1-message: \."Sorry for tricking you, Sara..."
\."Explain everything, please."
\."My head is still hazy..."
\."I suppose so..."
\."That was good acting, Nao."

\."Did you figure out the whole thing...?!
 Amazing!!"
\.\C[4](Well, there are parts I don't get...)
\."I'll explain. You see..."

\."When the trading phase began and we were given
 our role cards... the fake appeared on this monitor."

\."I believed it only at first.
 That the professor had been revived..."
\."But I quickly came to my senses."

\."The fake ordered me to
 collect the laptop and Ranger's chip."

\."And he said to do it alone,
 without discussing it with anyone..."
\."Did you obey the fake's orders?"
\."No... But I feigned obedience."
\."When did you team up with Sou?"

\."Just a while ago...
 Before I saw you in the Medical Office."
\."Everything just followed from there, I suppose."

\."Y-You've figured it out with
 just that part of the explanation?!"
\."Err... I'll explain it in full just in case."

\."At first, I immediately thought of
 discussing it with you, Sara."

\."But I thought the fake
 might have anticipated that, too."

\."If they found out I was wary,
 I was sure the fake would disappear..."

\."So I thought, I had to extract
 as much info from it as I could...!"
\."And so you talked with the loner, woof?!"

\."Right! The fake wouldn't expect me
 to discuss it with the l... with Sou."

\."And continuing to act like I was fooled,
 we sent the fake the hacking whatzit!"
\.\C[4](To think Nao was capable of that...)
\."The best way to get the fake to believe me..."
\."Was to antagonize you in front of him, Sara."

\."And that was all the loner's plan too, woof?
 Amazing, meow!"
\."T-That's true. I guess I'm a gloomy sort myself..."
\."No, big sis Nao's the chipper type, meow!"
\."I really don't think I am!"
\.\C[4](But getting help from Sou, of all people...)
\.\C[4](However you look at it...)
\."I'm... going to believe in Sou."
\."Sou mentioned... a plan for escape, didn't he?"
\."Please, gather everyone in the lobby."
*sniff sniff*...
\."Wyah?! A... Am I sweaty?!"
\."Nah! You smell nice, meow!"
\."O-Oh, really! Ehehe..."
\."Please, trust Sou, and bring everyone to the lobby!"

Explain everything, please
My head's still hazy
That was a good act

Did you obey?
When'd you team up with Sou?
The rest followed from there

\."...I'll give you food if you go away."
\."Don't treat me like a cat, meow!"

2-1-message: "Hey! Gashu! I have the right to an explanation!"
"Kinda feels like this won't be a normal Main Game..."
\."Transgression? I'm afraid I don't know what you mean."
\."Don't tell me it's about the wallet...!"

\.\C[4](Huh...?
 That reaction seems to indicate it's not...)

\."Understand that if there truly is a transgression,
 it should become clear in your discussion."
\."Supposing one is discovered, it will be addressed."

\."Yeah right, jackass! It's you who's gonna decide
 what counts as a transgression, isn't it?!"

\."Don't mock us, would you?!
 You're the one deciding what counts as one, surely?!"

"At least call Miley!
 So she can hand down a judgement on any misconduct!"

\."...Miley is the Floor Master for floors 1 and 2.
 I cannot do that."

"At least call Safalin!
 So she can hand down a judgement on any misconduct!"
\."Very well, if that will satisfy you."

\."Such determination to have a fair slaughter,
 without having to worry over misconduct...!"
\."Now then, let the second Main Game..."
\."D... Dammit!! So it's starting after all...?!"
\."Now, we shall begin the second Main Game."

2-1-message: \C[3]An extremely heavy air dominates the space.
\."...Keeping quiet's only making time pass, guys."
\."Let's at least decide our fate by our own hand, okay?"
\."It's okay. We've walked this road before, haven't we?"

\."We're allies by now!!
 We've spent way more time together...!!"

\."Let's find our resolve.
 You said that in the first Main Game, right, Q-taro?"

\."Everyone, the \C[2]card designs\C[0] have been
 displayed in the rulebook this time."

\."So be aware that you cannot judge using knowledge
 of the designs as in the first Main Game."

\."Well then. Please spend this cruel and dense time
 to your heart's content."
\C[3]Gashu quietly sat down in a chair.
\.\C[3]And... once again... the Main Game began.
3-1-message: \.\C[3]I can feel my strained nerves loosening.

\."It's just like I said.
 I'm not the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], I'm a \C[5]Commoner\C[0]."
\."Four will advance to the final vote."

\.\C[4](You can't want to have a conversation
 when you feel like this...)
\.\C[4](Like Keiji did for me in the first Main Game...!)
\."Are you all going to give up here?!"
\."We've always done when we had to do...!"
\."No matter how cruel it is, you can't stop!!"

\."Even if someone is the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0]...
 We move in the same direction!"
\."We talk, and we advance the discussion!!"
\."Guess those of us who weren't picked should start!"

\."All right...! First, it's time for those of us
 who weren't picked to guide the discussion!"

\."Incidentally, I am a \C[5]Commoner\C[0]...
 Be at ease..."

\."Muscle gorilla! It's not the time to shrivel up, meow!
 Let's remember the card trades in order, woof!"
\."Now, please grasp your fate with your own hands."

\."Now, we're gonna proceed along
 digging into the details of the \C[2]trades\C[0]!!"

\."Now we will have an in-depth discussion
 on the \C[2]card trades\C[0]!! Understood?!"
\.\C[3]Gashu quietly sat in the chair again.

"There were four trades made in total!
 That ain't that many!"

"By the way, I've been a Commoner the whole way, woof!
 Didn't get traded with even once, meow!"

"Trading cards required 50 tokens!
 So only so many people could make trades!"

"Trading cards requires 50 tokens.
 It's not as if just anyone could do it."

Give a pep talk
Question them
3-5-message: Please choose who to vote for.
4-2-message: "Kanna! Are you fine with him just saying that?"\.\.

"Come on, Kanna! Um... hmm...
\! What should I say...? Get mad? Err..."

\."...Could you not get in the way
 of the discussion, miss Sara?"
\.\C[4](No good! I couldn't find the words...!)
4-4-message: "Be as silent as you want, it's no use..."\.\.
"Please say something... Q-taro...!!"
\.\C[4](No good! I couldn't find the words...!)
4-6-message: "Sou!! This is the moment to reveal your true self!!"\.\.

\C[4](I can feel his heart trembling!
 I should just be a step away...!)
6-1-message:
\C[3]The discussion is stuck in equilibrium,
failing to come to an agreement...!
"How about I hear the truth from your mouth?"

\C[4](Between the statements these two give, I should either
 \C[6]affirm correct ones\C[4] or \C[10]deny incorrect ones\C[4]...!)
7-1-message:
\.\C[4](Ack...! I can't upset the balance!
 Let's start over!)
8-1-message: "I didn't want to fight you, Sara, but... well."

\.\C[4](Can't let him mislead me...!
 I'll \C[2]choose words I can refute\C[4] and talk back!!)
\."Let's discuss the \C[2]victim video\C[0] Nao saw, how about?"
8-11-message: \."I give up... I can't beat you, Sara."
\."Please... tell us everything, Keiji."
\."The video... is real."
\."The victim video that Nao saw..."
\."And it... was also my First Trial..."
\."The woman's name... was Megumi Sasahara."
\."She was my boss ever since I joined the force."

\."I'm Keiji Shinogi. I've been assigned here
 starting this week. It's good to meet you."

\."Good to meet you too. I'm Megumi Sasahara.
 ...I suppose this makes me your trainer."

\."Well, well...
 Pretty impressive for your age, Shinogi."
"Y-Yes, ma'am."

\."...But you might be a bit too serious.
 Even if you have stamina, you have to think about
 how to spend it, or it won't last."
\."Um... I heard you were rather elite, Miss Megumi."

\."Why would you, err...
 serve as a trainer for the likes of me?"
\."Heehee... I wonder, indeed."
\."...I have high hopes for you."
\."But... then came the day of my nightmares..."
\."I... shot a person."
\."The criminal in a certain case..."
\."Miss Megumi..."
\."Why am I... not being punished...?!"
\."I've killed a person...!!"
\."...In self-defense, yes."
\."But... the criminal wasn't even holding a weapon!!"

\."...That's just what the law says.
 You've done nothing wrong."
\."Miss Megumi... I heard you made a backroom deal...!"
\."...So what?"
\."...Get back to your duty. You're police."
\."Wahaha... She's the benefactor who protected me."

\."I'll never forget it.
 I owed her the worst kind of debt..."
\.\sp[15]"Left her to die...?"
\.\sp[15]"But... I killed her... Megumi..."
\."Mr. Policeman...! Get a hold of yourself, meow!!"
\."...Sorry for keeping quiet, everyone."

\."Truth is, your friendly policeman's
 not a policeman anymore."
"Whew... Still find Mr. Policeman suspicious?"
\.\C[4](Urgh! He danced around it too well...!!)

\."Miss Sara... Don't tell me you went easy on him
 because it was Keiji?"
\."Of course not...!!"

\."Our lives are at stake in this discussion...
 If you can't be serious, you've got no value."
\.\C[10]"Will you die, Sara?"
\."...Quit it, Sou."

\."Then talk. If you don't say something,
 miss Sara might be the one dying."
\."...Alright, fine."
\."The video... is real."
\."Mr. Policeman...?!"
\."The victim video that Nao saw..."
\."And it... was also my First Trial..."
\."The woman's name... was Megumi Sasahara."
\."She was my boss."
\."You knew each other?!"
\."You knew each other?!"
\."She's a benefactor I owed quite a bit at work."
\.\C[4](Benefactor...?)

\."I'll never forget it.
 I owed her the worst kind of debt..."
\."M-Mr. Policeman...?"
\.\sp[15]"Left her to die...?"
\.\sp[15]"But... I killed her... Megumi..."
\."Mr. Policeman...! Get a hold of yourself, meow!!"
\."...Sorry for keeping quiet, everyone."

\."Truth is, your friendly policeman's
 not a policeman anymore."
\.\C[4](Keiji... How deep does your darkness go...?)

\.\C[4](\C[2]If I'd won that argument\C[4]...
 Maybe I could have heard more...)

\."I'm surprised. What a dangerous individual
 we've had lurking in our midst."
\."...If you vote for me, I won't complain."
\."Umm... Everyone..."

\."Speaking of voting,
 I think it's about time to decide..."

\."Who you'll vote for, and which four
 should enter the final vote..."
\."...Meowww?!"
\."No way!! That was way too quick...!"

\."Well... You need time to work out
 the card trades this time, you see..."

\."Precisely. Choosing a victim without a satisfactory
 discussion is not an outcome we desire either."

\."What do we do?! I don't wanna suspect, but...
 Q-taro, Sou, Keiji... You three are pretty sketchy..."

\."Then what to do...? Q-taro, Sou, Keiji...
 I can't rightly say you're not suspicious..."

\."H-Hold up!
 Don't we need one more person, though?!"

\."Troubling, huh? If it's down to three options,
 it'll make our choices that much narrower..."

\."We gotta suspect someone again, woof?
 *sniffle*..."

\."Then... maybe it's better to think of
 \C[2]who to leave out\C[0] from the final vote, meow..."
\."Who to leave out...?"
\."That's a good idea, Gin."
\."R-Really, woof?"

\."If you aren't chosen in the preliminary vote,
 and are \C[2]dropped out\C[0]..."

\."Because you can no longer be chosen,
 \C[2]there's no need to lie anymore\C[0]!!"

\."We can't run away, Gin!
 We just have to suspect each other!!"
\."Myaaah..."
\."U-Um, Sara!"
\."I think it's a good plan, actually...!"
\."You mean it, woof?!"

\."If you \C[2]drop out\C[0] after the preliminary vote
 because you weren't voted for..."

\."Because you can't be chosen anymore,

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]This is a waiting room
for until the next episode is released.

\.\C[3]Well then...
Thank you very much for staying with it this far.

\.\C[3]Further down on the page is the official home page
with the latest information, so please take a look!

(A Your Turn To Die manga is also available!)
\.\C[3]Alice's body has been completely cleaned up.
\.\C[3]Reko's body has been completely cleaned up.
\."Of course... I also carefully transported the bodies."

\."Toying with us using nonsense like
 tokens and Clear Chips..."
\."And once we grasp hope, you take it away and kill us."

\."How must you feel about it...
 to be able to do things like this...?"

\."When we die, do you even collect
 all the tokens we earned? Haha..."

\."Did you lose your wallet?
 I haven't seen it anywhere..."
\."All of them, temporarily, for a certain plan..."
\."I planned to take them back, assuming survival..."

\."And we didn't hear anything about
 the dead's tokens being forfeit."
\."Sorry... I'm busy, so if you'll excuse me..."

\.\C[4](That's impossible...!
 Alice was one of the high-placers for tokens!!)

\.\C[4](That's impossible...!
 Reko should have had her own tokens, right?!)
\.\C[4](Urgh... Did someone do this to trap me...?)

\."Yeah... I can't muster the energy
 to think about anything anymore...."

\.\C[10]"In the end, I guess you weren't
 seriously thinking you could escape either, huh?"

\.\C[10]"Just the hunch I got. You find hope for
 everyone else... 'cause those without hope die.
 Is that how you thought?"
\."Yeah... I never thought I would die myself."
\.\C[10]"Pretty conceited in the end, weren't you?"
\."I was the one who needed hope."

\."As long as I'm looking forward...
 I can look away from the reality of killing you."

\."But the future waiting once I return...
 I can only imagine it as pitch black."

\.\C[10]"What the hell, Sara.
 You wanted to die that bad?"
\."Maybe so... Somewhere in my heart, I..."
\."Joe... Finally, I won't have to run from you anymore."
"Big sis Sara!! Stay with us, meow!!"

\."Big bro Joe isn't here, meow!!
 Don't give any attention to anything weird, woof!!"
\."So I can cheer big sis Sara up, obviously!!!!"

\."Believe in the real Joe!!
 Please, big sis Sara...!!"

\."You're not the only one
 who couldn't do anything, meow...!"

\."And yet... big bro Joe
 put on a smile to the end, meow..."

\."And everybody else who died...
 They were thinking of the ones who'd be left
 'til the very end, woof!!"

\."So I'm sure what he really wants
 is for everyone to get home alive!!"

\."You have to believe in the real Joe,
 big sis Sara...!!"
\.\C[4](I feel like... I've lost sight of him already...)
\.\C[4](That guy who was always by my side...)
\C[4](Do I have the courage to face him head-on...?)

Give up on the tokens
Trick Safalin
4-2-message: \C[10]No way you can forget me, Sara.
\C[10]You're already broken.
"Stay with us! Big sis Sara!!"
\."Big sis Sara...!!"
4-3-message: \.\C[10]"It's impossible to get rid of me for good."
\."I won't let anyone else's lives be lost."
\."I won't let the kidnappers have their way!"

2-3-message: \."Meow! It smells really sweet near her head, woof!"

\."Eheheh... It's actually as delicious as it looks.
 Would you like to have a bite?"

"I believe this machine to be
 one way of achieving happiness."
\."No matter what you think of it..."
3-1-message:
\."Sometimes... it's better to forget memories
 that are simply too painful."
\."And in reality, the human brain is made to do so."

\."All of you are too strong...
 So you can't erase your own memories."
\."And so... You wanna erase them yourself...?!"

\."Those fun memories as brother and sister...
 Those will remain, and you can just forget
 the bad memories."
\."I am the only one who can cure you..."
\."I don't have too many memories with him..."

\."If I lost the bad memories...
 there'd hardly be anything left."
\."So... I don't wanna forget even a shred..."
\."What were you doing in the dark here?"

\."I'll be in the lobby, Sara.
 Talk to me if you need me."

\."Sometimes... it's better to forget memories
 that are simply too painful."
\."And in reality, the human brain is made to do so."

\."All of you are too strong...
 So you can't erase your own memories."
\."So with this machine, you really can erase them."

\."Those fun memories as brother and sister...
 Those will remain, and you can just forget
 the bad memories."
\."I am the only one who can cure you..."
\."Make it quick. Before I change my mind..."

\."I see...!! What a good feeling!
 My head is clear...!"

\."Ahh, Sara Chidouin.
 How long have you been there?"

\."Well, yes... Mwahaha... I should have asked to earlier
 if I'd known I'd feel so refreshed."

\."Is that okay, meow...? Even your bad memories...
 were memories with big sis Reko..."

\."Hmph...?
 I've more memories than I know what to do with."
\."Is it okay to just forget Reko...?"

\."Hmph... What are you saying?
 Reko is my dear sister. I wouldn't forget her."

\."It's unfortunate she had to die...\!
 But Reko will surely live on in my heart."

\."Being able to say a thing like that
 all casually... It's not right, woof..."

\."Gin... Please, don't.
 If all you have is burdens, that isn't life..."
\."I can't say... Alice did anything wrong."

\."Indeed. Don't hamper my invigorated mood.
 ...I think I'll go rest in the lobby."

So you wouldn't use the machine
What were you doing in the dark?

So you used the machine
Is it okay to forget Reko?

\."How much do you know about yourself, Ranger...?"
\."Gashu strongly imbued you with a certain emotion."

1-1-message: \.\C[3]Just as Keiji reached out his hand...

\."It's just a powerless doll.
 Not moving an inch."
\."Did Sue Miley, the Laughing Doll, break down...?"
\."This is the Miley we first met."
\."Did Miley run out of power and stop moving...?"
\."This is the Miley we first met."

\."She called herself the Laughing Doll, Sue Miley...
 But she must be human."
\."...Think back on what's happened so far."

\."\C[2]Dolls don't bleed\C[0]...
 The doll Ranger proved this fact with his own body."
\."When Miley was struck by Kai, she was \C[2]bleeding\C[0]."
\."That's why... I figured Miley was probably human..."

\."Wahaha... Great memory, Sara.
 You're exactly right."
\."This doll is probably the Miley we first met."

\."Our first mission was to search for
 the scattered parts of Miley's body, wasn't it?"

\."Come to think of it...
 We searched for the parts, then assembled her."

\.\C[4](And after a white gas filled the room...
 Miley suddenly started to move.)

\.\C[4](That's right, the room that filled with gas
 is connected to this room by the ventilation...!)
\."That's when the human Miley swapped herself in."
\.\C[4](So the real Miley is separate from this doll...!)
\."If you retrace your memories, you should realize it."

\."\C[2]Dolls don't bleed\C[0]...
 Ranger, the doll, proved this fact with his body."
\."All starting to line up, isn't it?"
\."Bet this room still hides some interesting truths."
\.\C[4](I wonder if Miley is still on this floor somewhere...)
1-1-choice:
Miley broke down?
She's out of power?
She's not the real one?
2-1-message: \."I didn't know!! I didn't know anything!!"

\."You're listening there, aren't you?!
 Help meeeee...!!"

\."What's going on over there?!
 Can you hear us?"

\."Hey! Say something back!!
 I won't tell anyone...!! I promise!!"

\."I've got no qualms!!
 I just want to live in peace...!!"
\."Were we all gathered for her sake...?"

\."All you organization members...
 And Sara Chidouin..."

\."...This is probably footage of
 a person who died in the First Trial..."

\."I don't know this person!!
 I've never seen his face...!!"

\."I have no idea what's going on...!!
 This... this video...!!"

\."You might just have an intimate connection
 to this Death Game."

\.\C[3]It's no use.
The more I say... the more suspicious I look.

\."Are you going to be our goddess of victory...
 or our angel of death?"
\."Doesn't sound too bad to bet my life on that."
\."Hm? That's been my plan for a while now."
\."...Can I trust my life to you, Sara?"
"I understand. I'll take your life in my hands, Keiji."
\."What if I am an angel of death...?"
\."Wahaha... Well, now I won't be lonely."
\."Okay, let's search around a little more."
\.\C[3]I've... always been a bit suspicious of him.
\.\C[3]Keiji never wants to talk about himself.

\.\C[3]There must be a past he can't talk about.
A truth he can't say.

I don't know this person
I have no idea what's going on
I'm innocent

I understand
That's a heavy burden

Fine by me
I don't intend to die
2-2-message: \.\C[4](I'll put in the disk from the drawer.)

\."This video's pretty long.
 We should probably skip to the important parts."
\."You could see things you don't like."

\.\C[4](That's true...
 What if some distrustful act got recorded...?)
\."You didn't do anything suspect, did you, Keiji?"
\.\C[3]Keiji began to play the rest of the video.
\.\C[3]Our actions up to this point played back.
\.\C[3]A recording from when we were all still alive.
\.\C[3]We skipped through, checking for anything suspect.

\.\C[4](It's one of the role cards
 used in the first Main Game!)

\."To think Q-taro was the one who
 \C[2]set the role cards in place\C[0]..."
\."We had a discussion like this before, remember?"
\."What do you mean...?! I mean, as I recall..."
\."The one who set up the cards should have been Sou!"

\."Sou executed a strategy in the bar
 so he could use Kanna!"

\."And traded her a \C[4]Commoner\C[0] card!
 To put her in his debt!"
\."And then Sou had Joe pick up that \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] card...!"
\."All of it... was a trap laid by Sou, I thought!"

\."But from what we can see in this video...
 It's Q-taro who placed the cards first."
\."Sou just saw him and adopted it, that's all."
\.\C[3]While trying to sort my head out, I pushed play.

\.\C[3]Sure enough, Q-taro was shown again and again,
secretly placing cards.
\.\C[3]And Sou picked up a few of those cards...
\.\C[3]And indeed, made a trade with Kanna.\.

\.\C[3]Keeping my hazy feelings in check,
I let the remaining bit of video play.
\."Are Joe and Kai talking about something?"

\."Such enigmatic faces...
 Just what were those two talking one-on-one about?"
\.\C[4](Joe never told me about anything like this...!)
\.\C[4](Ugh! If we could just hear their voices...!)
\."Hmm... That's everything of note in the footage."
\."Sure took up some time. We should leave here soon."

\."We made some findings...
 Now we search for Gin and work toward escape."
2-2-choice:
I believe in everyone
I'm prepared
Will YOU be okay, Keiji?

Think back on earlier
What do you mean?
2-3-message:
\."Sure, my life was pretty boring,
 and I didn't care about the future..."
\."Ain't it strange...? It doesn't hurt at all..."

\."When I'm bleeding this much from my gut?
 Why doesn't it hurt..."
\.\C[4](It's as if... he fell asleep at the end...)

\.\C[3]He was probably a high-schooler.
A human... about the same age as me.
\.\C[4](Maybe... he was one of the happy ones...)
\.\C[3]I just felt a tinge of envy, that's all.

\.\C[3]Being able to die without having to
experience those things is happy.

\."Whyyy...!!
 Why does this have to happennn...?!"
\."How could I possibly know which one's right?!"
\."I can't do ittt!! I can't fire these things!!"
\.\C[4](Urgh!! Is this from the First Trial, too...?!)

\.\C[4](It's just too cruel...!!
 How could you think up such a thing?!)
\.\C[3]From demons who make us do things like this...?
2-3-choice:
Victim E Disk
Victim F Disk
Cancel
3-2-message: \.\C[3]There are computer disks in the drawer.
\.\C[4](What are these? I'm not really sure...)
\.\C[4](Hm? This one has a label on it...)
"Well now... We might've been getting filmed."

\."It's not so strange... There's too many of us
 for just the Floor Masters to watch over."
\.\C[4](When you think about it, maybe so, but...)
"I wonder if there was an observer in this room..."

\."...Don't see many traces of
 there being multiple people here."

"I never saw any security cameras
 in all my searching so far..."

\."Could be hidden cameras.
 ...They probably didn't want 'em getting destroyed."
\."We can probably view the footage on that computer."
3-2-choice:
Was someone here watching?
I'm curious about the footage
There were cameras?
3-3-message: \.\C[3]The contents of the drawer are a mess.
4-1-message: \C[3]Some sort of door.
4-2-message: \C[3]The door is shut fast.

\.\C[4](There's no handle...
 It probably can't be opened manually.)
5-1-message: \C[3]It seems to be a thick glass window.
5-2-message:
\C[3]Behind the thick glass, I can see a figure
that appears to be sleeping.
\."Keiji! There's a person...!"
\."Hmm... Not showing any signs of movement."
\.\C[4](Do they not notice us...?)

\."Can't imagine there'd be a new
 surviving participant at this point..."

\.\C[4](If they're an enemy...
 We'd better not let them realize we're here!)

\."Well, doesn't seem to be any way
 of getting to the other side anyhow."
\."Let's leave quietly once we're done searching..."

\C[3]Laizer's Chip

A small chip removed from Rio Laizer's head.
Capable of nullifying the facility's security.

1-1-message: \."I don't... even have the energy to move."

\."If I'd known about this...
 I wouldn't even want to see hope..."
\C[4](I can't find the words right now...)
2-1-message: \C[3]Within the passage is an endless flight of stairs.
\.\C[3]Hurried yet careful, we advance step by step.
\.\C[3]Along the way, we notice doors on the sides.
\.\C[3]Lots of them, spaced some distance apart.
"I suppose these connect to the other floors..."

\."These are probably the victory stairs
 that only the survivors are allowed to climb..."

\."It must be built so that they can access these stairs
 no matter when the Death Game concludes."

\."Wahaha... Hearing that makes me hope,
 whether or not I want to."
\.\C[3]If there really is an exit like Sou says...

\."Even once we go home...
 Will you still see me, meow?"
\."But... I'm sure it'll make you remember..."
\."Yet... I'm sure when you meet, you'll remember..."
\."You want... to forget it all, woof...?"
\."There's no way... I could forget, meow."

\."The things we lost... the despair put in us...
 There's a lot that won't go back to normal..."

\."Peace... Our normal lives...
 That's real victory."
\."If we meet... I'm sure we'll remember them..."
\."It's better if we forget everything here..."

\."Just having those bad memories...
 and not being able to see all of you anymore...?"
\."I don't want that one bit, woof!!"

\."There's no way I can forget, meow...\!
 I don't want to... woof..."

\."These memories won't go away anyhow.
 Nuts to living in despair forever, I say."
\."Real victory for us isn't just getting home alive."

\."It's getting back the peace we should've had...
 Returning to life as usual... Isn't it?"
\."...Why don't we get back that peace together?"
\."Let's get it back together. Our peace..."

\."When you go back to life as usual...
 What will you do?"
\.\C[3]What did I want to do when I got out of here?

\."I wanna play video games at home, meow!
 Big sis Sara should come too, woof!"

\."First, well... I wanna hold one hell of a concert!
 My band's gotta be dying for me to come back."
\."Oh! Um...! Can I come see it too?!"

\."Well, duh!
 I'll show you some amazing stuff, Gin, Kanna!"
\."That's not fair! I want to see it too!!"
\."Hmm? Might have to think about that..."

\."Huh?!
 Why are you suddenly being mean about it?!"
\."Oh! That's great! Kanna wants to come with you!"

\."...Hey, detective.
 Shouldn't you go along with them?"
\."Really?! Let's all go watch something together!"
\."Meow? Do you not have anything, Mr. Policeman?"

"Then first, maybe you should look for
 something that feels worth doing..."
\."Maybe I'll think about a reason for living..."
\."I'd be glad to assist, if that's okay."

\."...Ahh, taking it literally, I see.
 Thanks, Sara."

"If you don't have anything to do,
 keep an eye on your health."
\."Urk... Yeah, sure... Maybe I'll eat more veggies."

\."That's good! Maybe you'll find something
 that makes you look sharper, and does away with
 those bags under your eyes."

"Since you're being set free and all,
 you should satisfy your desires."
\."Then maybe I'll go eat some meat..."

\."Sad, isn't it?
 Be a grown-up who dreams big, Gin."
\."According to the floor map, this is..."
2-1-choice:
Of course
It's better we don't

Let's find something worthwhile
Focus on health, maybe?
You should satisfy your desires
2-3-message: \."For what? To find a way to escape, meow!"
\."Well... Though I didn't find an exit or anything..."
\."But I found a smartphone on the stairs, meow."
\.\C[4](There wasn't anything like that when we came up...)
\.\C[4](What in the world is this trade...?!)
\."...You just had a scary smile, meow..."
\."More importantly, Gin, about the phone you found..."
\.\C[3]The moment I felt that, my senses cut out.
"H-Hey! Ain't there some way we can save him?!"

"Hrmm... With so much bleeding,
 I fear nothing can be done..."
\.\C[4](Did I just have... some kind of dream?)

What for?

1-1-message: \."Reko... you really were kind... such a good kid..."
\.\C[3]Just like... I lost my best friend.
\.\C[3]She was a trustworthy ally to me, too.

\."...I know how you feel.
 But the Main Game's going to start again...!"

\."They're giving an explanation...!
 Please, come to the Medical Office!"

\."It shouldn't matter to you
 if anything unfavorable happens to us."
\."In the Main Game, everyone is an enemy..."

\."Again, at least two people will die!
 It might be you and me next...!"

\."But I don't think giving up on living,
 and thinking, is the right thing to do...!"

\."If we diligently think about it...
 I'm sure... I'm sure there's a path!!"
\."I've long since passed up such a thing..."

\."Because I thought someday...
 my parents, or Reko, would repay me..."
\."Hey now, Nao Egokoro... What are you...?!"
\.\C[3]Nao removed the gloves from Reko's body.

\."There's surely someone else waiting...
 who treasures Reko as much as us..."
\."Alice... Please, you take one of these too."

\."...I'm going.
 I need to move forward...!"
\."Sara Chidouin... I will tell you this..."
\."The name of the man I killed...\! was \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]."\.
\."I don't care about Sou Hiyori at this point..."
\.\sp[15]"Who I really need to kill is..."
\.\C[3]Revenge against our enemy who plotted the Death Game.

\.\C[3]Anger and hate...
Those made the only path that would move Alice now.
\.\C[4](The Main Game... I won't let it happen!!)
2-1-message: \.\C[4](He was a doll, just like the fake Reko...)
2-1-choice:
Take the hairclip
Cancel

\.\C[4](Because of Ranger... Reko and the fake Reko both...)
5-1-message: \C[3]Reko lies in the center of the Room of Lies.
\.\C[4](Tons of blood is pouring from her chest...)

1-1-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.
"Yeah... No doubt about it, it's Gashu's room."

\."I'm using Ranger's chip right now
 to neutralize the security."

\."It's got a lot of important data
 that could probably be misused."

\."Almost makes me think Ranger was
 intended to inherit all that data."
\."Was he going to be a successor or something...?"
\."I wonder if he was... a stand-in for a son..."

\."I'm sure it's just a backup...
 They'd use it if something happened to Gashu."

\."The hacking is still going to take some time.
 Could you keep an eye out below for anyone coming?"
\."Big sis Sara, you watch the loner, woof!"
1-1-choice:
What are you doing?
Is this the secret room?

In place of a son?
It's just a backup
That doesn't matter
1-2-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.
1-3-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.
\."I did it, I did it! It went great, miss Sara!!"
\."I'm in the depths of their security now!"
\."Ahaha. Don't celebrate just yet, miss Sara."
\."...Quit it with the weird chipperness, miss Sara."
\.\C[4](Even though you went along with it...)
\."Things are going to get a little difficult from here."

\.\C[3]Sou stooped over further
and began to work on the computer.
\."Miss Sara, could you help me out?"
\."See the four monitors in this room?"

\."There's going to be red error screens
 appearing on them."
\."When you see one, tell me right away so I can fix it!"
1-3-choice:
You did it!
High five!
You sure are energetic
1-4-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.

"Are you ready? When a red error screen appears,
 tell me what monitor it's on."
"Be quick, miss Sara...!"
"Okay! Leave this to me!"
1-6-message:
\C[3]I'm looking at the computer screen,
but I can't sense any particular change.
\.\C[4](Did he really hack in with this...?)
3-1-message: \.\C[5]Quite some time has passed since then.

\.\C[5]But even now, those hellish memories
are scorched into the back of my mind.
\.\C[5]In the first trial, I killed a person.

\.\C[5]I would never trust others.
That was what I decided.

\.\C[5]In the Russian Roulette that followed, too,
I didn't participate.

\.\C[4](This is describing the same things
 we had to go through...!!)

\.\C[5]At the end of their argument,
the challenger chosen was someone most surprising.

\.\C[5]With overwhelming charisma,
she had a talent for getting people in order.

\.\C[5]And in the first \C[2]victim conference\C[5],
she was a central figure as well.
\.\C[5]But there, she lost her best friend.

\.\C[5]A boy even younger than her,
and the man whose views most aligned with hers.
These two...
\.\C[5]Seeing her so exhausted, I felt pity.
\.\C[5]For the first time, I spoke my true feelings.

\.\C[5]By the time we were done talking,
I had acquired an admiration for her.

\.\C[5]To the point that I would be fine
with even my own death as long as she won it all.
\.\C[5]It was the first time I'd shed tears for a stranger.
\.\C[5]Even now, I see hallucinations of her.
\.\C[5]As many women as I try to love, I'm never satisfied.
\.\C[4](What in the world is this book...?)

4-1-message: \C[3]Papers titled "Floor Master's Code."
\.\C[4](Floor Master's... code?)

\C[5]Floor Masters, let's carry out
  the Death Game with pride!

\.\C[5][1] For trials that require explanation,
    give one to the participants in advance!
\.\C[5][2] Floor Masters must not directly kill participants!

\.\C[5][3] Floor Masters cannot lie
    with the intent of deceiving participants!

\.\C[5][4] If there is misconduct during the Main Game,
    it either proceeds with the transgressor's death,
    or \C[2]must be retried 24 hours later\C[5]!
\.\C[5][5] Treat the participants with love!

\.\C[4](Misconduct during the Main Game...?
 This is the first I've heard of that.)

\.\C[4](If a participant transgresses, they die as penalty...
 And if a Floor Master does, it's a 24-hour extension?)
\.\C[4](That seems to be how you'd interpret it.)
\.\C[4](...Talk about unfair rules.)

15-2-message: "Are you not taking your mischief a bit far?"
\."As Floor Master, I cannot overlook this act."
\."It is truly unfortunate... but I must take action."
\C[3]A white gas floods into the room.
15-3-message:
\."You probably can't tell at a glance...
 But things are getting really outrageous."

\."Hahaha... Let's save the celebration for later.
 Let's go, Sara!"

1-1-message:
\."You can't!!
 Even after you got your collar off...?!"

\."You said you wouldn't let the kidnappers
 do what they wanted, right?!"
\.\C[3]I keep shaking him, but he isn't moving a muscle.
\.\C[4](Whatever I do, as much as I struggle...)
\.\C[3]I hear a noise from the monitor.

\.\C[4](No, that doesn't matter...
 I don't want to think anymore...)

\.\C[4](Nothing is going to change now.
 My actions can't affect anything...)

\.\C[3]Looking closely at the keyboard by his hands,
there were bloodstains from him using it.
\.\C[3]Is this some kind of joke again...?
\.\C[3]The face of my best friend, who I always saw at school.

\."Is that... Sara?
 What's goin' on with me...?"

\.\C[3]It's another hallucination.
I've finally broken down.
\.\C[3]Because there shouldn't be an AI of Joe...
\.\C[3]But that doesn't matter to me right now.
\."Even though you were my best friend...!!"
\."I vowed to everyone that we would escape together..."

\."Professor Mishima, and Kai, and Alice,
 and Nao, and Sou...!!"

\."Professor Mishima, and Kai, and Reko,
 and Nao, and Sou...!!"
\."I can't protect anyone!! I can't save anyone!!"

\."We were hanging out all the time
 before we even knew it, huh?"

\."Having stupid talks on summer break, buying junk food
 after school, getting Ryoko laughing at us..."

\."And when my grades tanked, you were the one
 freaking out, Sara! Never asked to go studying."

\."Oh, and I remember all those
 dumb requests you made me sing at karaoke!
 I sang with all I had, so you were cracking up!"

\."And when bad stuff happened and it wasn't fun,
 you were there talking to me."
\."I feel nothin' but gratitude for ya."

\."I dunno about all this betrayal or dyin'...
 Don't have any memory of that part..."
\."You'll always make choices I can trust, Sara."
\."Were you thinking I hated you or something?"

\."Don't put me down, Sara!
 I'm not that self-righteous a guy!"

\."Well,\. it's hard for a guy and a girl
 to say this sorta stuff to each other,\. but..."

\."...I love ya, Sara.
\! You're my best friend!"
\."...I always wanted to say that, too."
\."Please, always watch me from close by...!"
\."We aren't going to kill each other anymore."
\."They won't make us do that ever again...!"
\."I'm going to end the Death Game...!!"
\."I'm on board. No matter how tricky our opponent..."

\."Yeah, that's right!!
 I'll avenge Nao and Alice...!!"
\."I... don't want anyone to die either!!"
\."I'll make them learn Sou's regret, meow!!"
To be continued in the Final Chapter\.\.

2-1-message: \.\C[3]Is this some kind of joke again...?
\.\C[3]The face of my best friend, who I always saw at school.

\.\C[3]It's another hallucination.
I've finally broken down.
\.\C[3]Because there shouldn't be an AI of Joe...
\.\C[3]But that doesn't matter to me right now.
\.\sw[934]"Yep. So, looks like you've been well!"\sw[935]
\.\C[3]This was a hallucination... a false Joe I created.
\.\C[10]\sw[934]"Lemme hear it! Who'd you kill this time?"\sw[935]
\.\C[10]\sw[934]"You sacrificed someone weaker than you to survive."\sw[935]
\.\C[10]\sw[934]"What's your excuse for this time, Sara?"\sw[935]
\."You left me... and died on your own...!!"
\."Just give me a break... Forgive me...!!"
\."Just give me a break... Forgive me...!!"
\.\C[3]The last thing I want to remember. Joe's end.

\."Thank goodness...!
 Sara... Nothing wrong, is there?"
\."Big sis Sara!! You came to, meow!"
\."You were passed out in the Room of Rubble."

\."That must've been an AI
 of big bro Joe, right, meow...?"

\."It was an AI of Jou Tazuna...
 Why in the world was that there...?"
\."It was a fake Joe somebody set up out of malice..."
\."Sara... Don't worry about anything it said."
Your Turn To Die:\.\. Chapter 2\| End
To be continued in the Final Chapter\.\.

Shut up
You aren't Joe

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]It's nothing but rocks...
Almost like there'd been a landslide...
\.\C[3]But without a door... there was no point.
\."This shit ain't what I signed up for...!!!!"
\."Don't be ridiculous...!! What in the wooorld?!"
\."It can't be!! This is all... a lie!!"
"...This is the truth you sought out."

\."An external explosion was used to make a physical lid.
\! Long before the Death Game began..."
\."W-What's going on... That thing on your neck...!!"
\."Until it is all over... our fates are intertwined."
\C[4](A collar...! Even the Floor Masters are...?!)
\."WHAT THE SHIT?! What the hell are you guys?!"

\."Please forgive my rudeness.
 I do not wish to use violence."
\."Now, everyone, it is time to stop dreaming."

\."You must win...!
 Only for the victor will the path open!!"

\."You have only a brief time left...
 Spend your last moments before the Main Game well."

\.\C[3]Before I knew it,
everyone had gone off to do their own thing.
\.\C[3]To use this final time granted to us meaningfully.
1-1-choice:
Trust the others and accept death
Trick the others if I must to live
2-1-message: "Just can't find it in me to give up..."
\."It might be futile... but I'm gonna struggle."
\."What can you do without heavy machinery...?"
2-2-message: "Wonder if I can open a way. Even the tiniest gap..."

\."*pant*... *gasp*...
 Don't flap your mouth, move your hands...!"

\C[4](This seems like it's on a whole other level
 than what can be accomplished by human strength...)

1-1-message:
\."I truly thank you for once again
 participating in the \C[2]Main Game\C[0]."

\."I will omit detailed explanations,
 but I have one point of warning this time..."
\."It appears one of you lost your tablet."

\."Due to the need for fingerprint identification,
 others cannot misuse it, but..."

\."As it is a disadvantage to not know your own role,
 a spare tablet has been placed on your table."
\."Please use it if you are the person in question."

\."That is all for my warning.
 To proceed with the rules, please touch the screen."
1-2-message:
"Well then, allow me to explain
 the rules of the Main Game."

\."The basic rules are that one person to be sacrificed
 will be chosen by majority vote."
\."The vote will be split into two parts."

\."Through the first round, the \C[2]preliminary vote\C[0],
 half the total will be chosen as candidates."
\."As there are 8 presently alive, this would be \C[2]4\C[0]."

\."A \C[2]final vote\C[0] will be held using these,
 deciding the ultimate \C[2]victim\C[0]."

\."In other words, the sacrifice is decided
 by narrowing down from 8, to 4, to 1."
\."This is a normal role, which has no powers."

\."As one would expect, they hold the key.
 If chosen as the victim, all will perish."

\."By the power of holy divination,
 they can know who the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] is."

\."This is a card of reversals, which lets its owner live
 only if they are chosen as the victim."

\."But meanwhile... if not chosen, they will die.
 So it is also an accursed card."

\."And if they win, they can escape together
 with one person of their choice."

\."Incidentally, in the event that
 multiple people are tied for first..."

\."If the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] is in the tie, the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] wins.
 If the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] is in the tie, all perish."

\."If both the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] and \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] are
 tied for first... The \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] takes priority,
 and all perish."

\."The distribution is 1 \C[2]Keymaster\C[0], \C[3]Sage\C[0], and \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0].
 All others are \C[5]Commoners\C[0]."

\."Best of luck... and may you avoid
 total destruction at all costs."
\."Well, everyone, please wait for the game to beg..."

\."Gashu, are you listening?!
 You've really gone and mucked things up...!"

\."You've made a flagrant transgression...!!
 One that shakes the very core of the Main Game!!"

\."Are you trying to appropriate
 the Main Game for yourse..."
\."The Main Game will now begin. Please enter, everyone."
1-4-message: "We have already opened. Please enter quickly."

1-1-message:
\."I'm gonna take you on a stroll down memory lane,
 recap the story so far. Be grateful, ya bastard!"

\."'Course, if you're thinkin' "thanks but no thanks,"
 you're free to leave, okay?"
"Right! Get down on your knees and listen!"

\."I'm gonna take you on a stroll down memory lane,
 recap the story so far. Be grateful, ya bastard!"
"Geez, what a bore... Alright, I getcha."

"I'm a masterpiece, sooo,
 I'll just tell you the short and sweet version."
"...You're gonna pay for this, y'know that?"

These guys are \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0]
and her best friend \C[2]Joe Tazuna\C[0].
They're a pair of dweebs who waltzed together
into the Death Game, all friendly-like!

Without having a clue what was what,
their \C[2]First Trial\C[0] began, and they cleared lots more...

And they chose to cooperate and survive
with all the other participants.\|\|

But their cooperation was for naught!
And high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0] died.

His ex-student \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] went into
this hilarious panic over it, see.

So the self-described homemaker \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0]
made use of that to instigate her...

And she stole back the laptop that job-hopper
\C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0] got his hands on!

The laptop concealed proof that Kai
was colluding with the organization.

Ultimately, Kai died in the \C[2]Main Game\C[0].

All 'cause he grabbed the \C[3]Sage\C[0] card!
And Joe, too, he got the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] card... and died.
\C[10]Seems hallucinations started to eat away at Sara...

The second stage was the Sub-Game,
where everybody traded \C[2]tokens\C[0] amongst themselves.
During all that, an AI of the dead Mishima showed up...

And so did a fake doll that looked just like Reko!
It was one huge calamity.

Amid all that, \C[2]Q-taro Burgerberg\C[0]
discovered that laptop again.

He was nearing the heart of the Death Game, but...

Lured by tokens, he handed the laptop over to Sou.

Man, ain't double-crossing just the best?

Q-taro gathered the most tokens,
and \C[2]Gin Ibushi\C[0] didn't collect squat.

I was looking forward to one of 'em dying, but...
"Which of these two was the one to actually die?"
1-1-choice:

Leave (Return to title)

Hurry it up (Skip summary)
Is it long?

Let me hear it
Hurry it up (Skip summary)
1-3-message:
It was \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0] who died in the end.

...Stabbed by the fake Reko, in fact!

It was \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0] who died in the end.

...Caught by my lies, in fact!

\."Having feelings when you're killing each other...
 It'll only hurt you, y'know?"
What I didn't know... is that I'd be killed, too.
But I... I should've been dad's masterpiece...!

\."Now, everyone.\! If your memories are all in order,
 allow me to invite you once again."

A normal high school girl, \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
And her best friend, \C[2]Jou Tazuna (Joe)\C[0].
One day, they were pulled into a cruel Death Game...

Rather than submit to fear,
they chose to cooperate with the other participants...\|\|

But alas, high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0]
became the first victim.
There was no stopping that they would \C[10]kill each other\C[0].

After a cruel majority vote,
homemaker \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0] died...

And Sara's best friend Joe died as well,
unable to defy his fate.
As her heart crumbled, the peril only continued...
1-3-message: The next victim was singer-songwriter \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0].
The next victim was murderer \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0].

As desperately as they tried to grasp escape,
their enemies gave their very lives to stop it.

When the Main Game occurred once more,
art student \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] died.
1-5-message: The next victim was middle-schooler \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0].

And \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0], who'd failed to protect Kanna,
was left with a strong hatred of Sara.
Due to a malicious Joe AI...
\.Sara forgot that Joe even existed...

The next victim was
self-described job-hopper \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0].

After removing his collar,
using the last of his strength...
He started up a Joe AI.

\.At last, Sara reunited with her best friend,
and awoke from her long nightmare.
The Death Game... is not over yet.
\C[10]6 Remain
