6-5-message: The next victim was middle-schooler \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0].

And \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0], who'd failed to protect Kanna,
was left with a strong hatred of Sara.
Due to a malicious Joe AI...
\.Sara forgot that Joe even existed...

The next victim was
self-described job-hopper \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0].

After removing his collar,
using the last of his strength...
He started up a Joe AI.

\.At last, Sara reunited with her best friend,
and awoke from her long nightmare.
The Death Game... is not over yet.
\C[10]6 Remain

1-1-message: Hey, Keiji, tell me what it is.
"...Yer just exhausted. Y'oughta take a rest."
No, my head feels perfectly clear...
"T... Then nothin' to worry about, right?"
"...Hmph. Then what is there to worry about?"
I want to remember... everything that happened here...

\.Nao... and Kanna...
Everyone who had to be sacrificed...
"Then don't just sit around and think about it."
\."Let's move. ...So that nobody else has to die."
"Everyone... This floor will be closed off soon."

\."If you don't go to the next floor within
 about 5 minutes, your collars will activate..."

"That ain't good...!
 Guess we gotta move it quick, eh?"

\."Now look here...
 We can't leave that jerk Sou alone."
\."We should probably wait for him, meow..."

\."If he hasn't shown up yet...
 Could be he's gone on ahead."
\."Hmph... There's no need to wait for that man."
\."Meow... But if we left him and he died..."

\."Seems unthinkable to me...
 Don't you suppose he's gone on ahead instead?"
\.\C[4](I wonder where on Earth he went...)
\.\C[4](Maybe... he doesn't want to see us anymore.)

\."G-Got it, woof! I'll look for him, meow!
 So you guys just wait, woof!"

\."Quit it, you!
 You make it sound like we're being selfish!"

\."Ahaha. Try greeting me with a smile next time.
 We're allies, aren't we?"
\."Like I can be all smiles right now..."

\."Just stop it!!
 The one you were tryin' to protect...
 We just went an'...!!"

\."Well, it was too bad. In that Main Game,
 Kanna even went and got the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0]..."

\."But alas, she didn't get the chance
 to choose me and have us escape together."
\.\C[10]"Couldn't use her after all... A shame."

\."Ah, how pitiful...
 If ever there was a world where that happened..."
\."Kanna wouldn't pick you, she'd pick Sara."
\."Haha... Did you really think she'd pick you?"
\."I know that...! Of course I know that!!"

\."You just want to laugh at me,
 'cause I'm fated to die no matter what!!
 Well, go ahead and laugh..."

\."You put your life on the line to protect Kanna.
 You were ready to throw your own life away..."

\."Those weren't rational actions.
 They were your heart screaming out."
\."That's... what Kanna wanted us to do..."
\."Enough. Let's hurry to the next floor."

\."During the discussion, I could've sworn
 you wanted me to die so bad."
"Let's go already. We can deal with him later."

\."I know, Gin.
 I wanna do something about it, too."

\."'Cause now I know even Sou's a human with a heart...
 ...Shit, man."
\."He was just desperate, meow... I'm sure of it..."

\."Very well, I suppose we're desperate ourselves...
 Now, to the next floor, so we don't die."
1-2-message: Kanna was always with her big sister.
\.But Kanna was always just a bother to her...

\.Even that time when it mattered most,
she couldn't do anything.
But that message... made her remember.
\.That surely, her big sister was watching over her...
\.That she had to stay strong on her own...
\.That it wasn't her sister who wrote that message...
...There's people who tried to protect Kanna.
\.There's people who worked to encourage her.
\.So... she doesn't want anyone else to die.
"Everyone... This floor will be closed off soon."

\."Please proceed to the next floor quickly...
 Or else your collars will..."
\."Miss Sara, could it be that you're..."
"It felt like I'd been having a bad dream..."

\."I tortured myself with
 hallucinations of my own making."
\."I... no, we... won't lose to the likes of you!"

"Just what I've come to expect...
 You always stand right back up, Sara."
\."It's not like it's on my power alone..."

\."Can't say I had a handle on 'im up to the very end.
 'Cause I kept getting used and falling for lies..."
\."But... it's the truth that he tried to protect Kanna."

\."Kanna, don't go thinking about
 giving yourself up ever again, alright?"

\."You gotta give the kidnappers the beating
 Sou would've given 'em, ain't that right?"
\."And not just for Sou... for Nao, too..."
\."Ya gotta live on for his sake, Kanna."
\."Don't go thinkin' about self-sacrifice no more!"
\."And... for big sis Nao's sake, too..."
\."That's why we've gotta pull out all the stops now."

\."And first up... is the next floor.
 'Cause it'll kinda throw a wrench in things
 if our collars activate."

\."Then should we not head to the next floor now...?
 I wouldn't care for my collar activating..."

\."We'll restart our escape plan
 once we're on the next floor, meow!"
\."This time... This time, let's escape for sure!"
\.\C[4](That's right... So no one's death will be in vain!)

1-1-message: \C[4](This isn't where that door went before...!)

\."It's nothing surprising at this point, woof.
 It's just an image, meow."
\."Y-Yer becomin' such a worn-down adult, Gin!"
\."It's like we're walking through the sky..."

3-1-message:
\C[3]At the top of the stairs is a door
that blends in with the background.

"I'm fine, meow! Hold on tight to the clothes
 of the person in front of you, woof!"

"Ahh, 'zat right... Thought my back smarted.
 So it was Gin's claws!"

"I-Is somebody near me...?
 Ah! Is this Gin?"

"Hm...? Hey, you lot!
 I've found a washtub of some sort..."

"Aaah...! That's Kanna's bucket!
 Please give it back...!"
"Mwahaha... Are you lot unsuited to such darkness?"

"Guess the guy who locked himself in a locker
 would be an authority, meow."
"Ah...! I can see a faint light!"

1-1-message: \."Hey there. Doing your best, I see."

\."It's a little early, but that's all for today...
 How about a short break?"

\."The next part is planned to be
 updated tomorrow, \C[2]February 26th\C[0]..."
\."So... I hope you'll wait a bit until then."
\."Sorry for my selfish request. But thanks!"

\."I know! Want to save here?
 You'll be able to start from here after the update!"
\."Well then... See you in another part!"
1-2-message: \C[3]Holding our breaths, we waited in the elevator.
\."Always putting on the pressure, huh, Sara?"

\."Guys, \N[4] might be on this floor.
 Be cautious..."

1-1-message:
"That's right. You're dead meat
 if you don't handle it the right way, got it?"

"Meowww?! That's absurd, muscle punk!
 We can't fight against something like this, woof!"

\."True... I can't imagine we can do much
 taking it on fair and square."

\."We'll all think about it,
 and \C[2]pick someone's idea\C[0] to drive it away."

\."If we discuss it...
 We might jus' \C[2]figure out a weakness\C[0]!"

2-1-message:
\."I was sweatin'...!
 What the hell was that monster?!"

\."We managed to defeat it in a daze,
 but just what was that thing?!"

\."W-What...?!
 What are you thinking, locking me in here?!"
\.\C[3]The coffin has been destroyed with terrifying might.

\."Shit!! Hey, Anzu!
 Are you for real?!"
\."T-This is bad! Will it come for us next...?!"
\.\C[3]The monster stood up and walked into the darkness.
\."It went off the same direction as \N[4]..."

\."It was saying...
 it was satisfied having destroyed one of us..."

\."Can't you tell just lookin' at that coffin?
 She's been scrapped..."
\."She... really seemed to be suffering... Urgh..."

\."A doll meant to impede our objective...
 And who'll come after our lives... apparently."

\."It was saying... it definitely wouldn't be satisfied
 until it destroyed one of us."

\."That ain't funny!
 After all this, suddenly we gotta use violence?!"

\."Putting our heads together,
 and sometimes having someone risk themselves...
 That's all we can do."
\."We don't want to meet a fate like that either..."
\."I mean... we don't wanna die, either..."

\."Seeing that happen to Anzu right in front of me...
 I'm still distraught, honestly..."
\."We know the fear of death better than anyone..."
\."Hmph... Perhaps it's fine to trust them."

\."I learned how elaborate these AIs are
 from the incident with the fake Reko..."

\."These fellows are alive.
 They're not just dolls."
\."...Whether that's a good thing or not aside..."
\."It's makin' me remember that fake Reko business..."

\."These guys ain't just
 artificial things either, I'm sure."

\."They're alive.
 ...Hell if that ain't cruel, though."

\."Well... guess it's fine.
 The more people, the more fight we can bring."
\.\C[4](No use suspecting them for now, I guess...)
\."So, uh... Let's keep it up, Sara."

\."Alright then. First up...
 Let's go after \N[4]."
11-1-message: "I found a broken shovel."

\."I think this might be usable as a weapon
 if it's reinforced... I'll hold onto it."
\."Nah... No need. Right, Sara?"

\."I think you need to protect yourself...
 You should take it."
\."See, miss Sara says so too! Leave it to me."
\."...Really itching to take it for yourself, huh."
\."Hmm... I think you should leave it here."

\."W-Why? If you're just going to leave it,
 you wouldn't mind me taking it, right?"

\."Sure, but...
 I'm uneasy about trusting you guys with weapons."
\."W-What's that? You still won't trust me...?"
\."Give it up, Hayasaka."
\."Mr. Policeman's got his eye on us."
\."Wahaha..."
\."If we can't be trusted, it's over for us..."
\."I know... Haha... What low status we have."

\."Meow! Relax, suit-and-specs!
 Weapon or not, you've got me, woof!"
\."O-Oh, really... How encouraging... Hahaha..."

 \N[4] talked to us together..."

 Human or doll, it doesn't matter..."

\."Anyway, how long are we planning

\."Right... Nothing left for us here. Let's go."

 Let's move."

\."There won't be a way... unless we believe!"
\."Bwahaha... You're a real idiot..."
\."What the hell do you mean, "you shouldn't lose"?"

\."You mean you gotta "win," right...?

\."A match..."

\."Hey, old man Q-taro.

\.""Not losing" and "winning"
 are completely different things, little missy."
\."Please, don't call me "little missy"!!"
\."Brat."
\."That's worse!!"
\."Kanna..."
\."I can't give this to you yet..."
\."Sorry... We might need it for a puzzle."

\."So later, after this game of tag...
 I want you to investigate it yourself."
\."So that we can win...!"

\."Look at the front cover!
 It says "Shin Tsukimi AI Test Data"!"
\."AI test data...?!"

\."...That's probably an experiment log
 written by \N[4]..."

\."Don't tell me the reason he got
 close to me was for this...?"

\."Dammit, man... You really gotta
 spit out everything you know soon."
\."...Why should I tell you?"
\."H-Hey, quit it...!"

\."They're your beloved allies, ain't they?
 No keeping secrets, yeah?"
\."...I don't have any allies."

\."Miss Sara and \N[4]...
 They're hardly any different to me."

\."The main course can wait for the end...
 Right now, it's \N[4]'s turn.
 That's all it is, right?"

\."So for now, we'll hold hands and do our best...
 Miss Sara."

\."Come on, now. If you don't hurry,
 you'll lose this game of tag, right?"

\."Oh yeah, right!
 Now ain't the time to worry about what's in the book!"
\."Sara! Let's hurry and catch \N[4]!"
\."Tha's right! First, we'll win the game of tag!"
\."Let's resume our search, master!"
\."Quit with that already!"

\C[4](It's a handwritten message.

\C[3]This is farewell.
I'll be departing this facility shortly.

\.\C[3]Of course, I feel a sense of responsibility for
aiding a plan to restructure the criminal underworld.

\.\C[3]But deciding deaths by majority vote?
I can no longer entertain this.

\.\C[3]Here on the sixth floor,
there is an escape route known to no one.

\.\C[3]I commend you for finding this message.
By all means, visit me, and together
we shall build a new underworld.
\.\C[3]Shinobu Gokujo
"Shinobu Gokujo...?"
"That's the name from that wanted poster, meow...!!"
\."What do you mean?!"
\.\C[3]I explained the Hades Incident.\|

"A mutual slaughter to
 decide the don of the seedy organizations..."
\."You mean... a Death Game?!"
\."Yes. And this being written on the wall here..."
\."Means... it took place here?!"
\."Ain't this huge?! If this is all true..."
\."There might still be an exit on Floor 6...!"

\."It's an incredibly tiny hope...
 Could've long since been sealed off."

\."Even if it's still around...
 no tellin' whether we would find it."
\."...But it ain't impossible."
\."There's hope of us getting home...!"
\."Wahh?! That hurts, Reko...!"

\."My bad! Felt like I just had to hug ya!
 Haha!"

\."What does all that mean?!
 You've got some explaining to do!!"
\.\C[3]I explained the Hades Incident.\|

"A mutual slaughter to decide
 the don of the sinister organizations..."
\."Rather... a Death Game?!"
\."Yes. And this being written on the wall here..."
\."You mean to say this is where it happened...?!"
\."That's outrageous news! If it's all true..."
\."There could yet be an exit on the sixth floor...!!"

\."It's an absurdly small hope...
 It could well have been sealed off long ago."

\."Even if it does remain,
 who can say if we'd be able to find it..."
\."...But there's a non-zero possibility."
\."There's hope of us getting home...!"
\."Exactly right! Mwahaha...!!"

\C[4](The moment we saw that exit...
 it was all replaced with abject despair.)

\C[4](Now... I feel like I've seen the tiniest,
 thinnest sliver of light.)
\."And also, if what Mai says is true..."
\."Even we can escape with you...!"
\."And also, if what Mai said is true..."
\."Even we would be able to escape..."
\."And also, if what Mai says is true..."
\."All the Dummies can escape with us...!"
\."If what Mai says is true..."
\."Even the Dummies might be able to get out with us..."

\.\C[4](W-What the...! It's a bunch of poems!)
\."This... seems like it'll take time to decipher."
\."And it doesn't feel very good to read, either."
\."We can agree on that..."
\C[4](I shouldn't make him push himself any more...)

"Sou.
 Can we talk about your lost memories?"
\."Ahaha... Why should I talk to you?"
\."You had the deepest connection to \N[4]..."
\."But... do you really know everything about him?"
\."Getting right to the heart of it, huh?"
\."It's true that we were friends..."

\."But... I know nothing about what was inside him.
 I didn't dare peer into that unknowable darkness."
\."So, want to peer together, miss Sara...?"
\."...That's what I was hoping to do."
\."Well then... Let's go."

\."Fine by me.
 I won't be satisfied leaving it unfinished."

3-1-message:
\."What? Guessin' Hayasaka's
 the one finding it familiar this time?"
4-1-message: \C[3]Only this computer is turned on.

\."T-This desktop...!
 Maybe there's... some sort of information..."

\.\C[3]I looked at the screen,
and saw an image being displayed.
\."I-Isn't this a picture of me?!"

\."What the...? There's height, there's weight...
 And some other numbers I don't get..."

\."What is this? Height, weight...
 Everything from blood composition to allergies!"
\."It's almost like a physical exam...!"
\."It's like a physical exam or something..."
\."Um...! Can we stop looking at that for now?!"
\.\C[4](Hayasaka... He knows about this!)
"Hayasaka! What's the meaning of this?!"

\."H-Hold on!
 I didn't research this because I wanted to...!"

\."Is this your computer?!
 What's your aim, you damn pervert?!"
\."Hoh... So it really was information you researched..."
\."A-Ah, shoot...!"

"Hayasaka, please tell me.
 What is this?"
\."Urgh... Well, it's, um..."
\."I-I'll confess..."

\."The company I work for deals in
 medical machinery and information, and..."

\."Because of that job...
 I got to know a man from Asunaro."

\."On the surface, Asunaro is an upstanding company
 that does clean research..."
\."But I learned that it has another face."
\."Another face...?"

\."They're connected to shady businesses,
 and produce illegal medicines...
 Things of that nature..."

\."I even heard rumor that among those
 were illegal drugs and euthanizing medicines..."

\."I also heard about...
 inhumane research that wasn't to be spoken of..."

\."Thinking about it now,
 that was probably research into reproducing humans..."
\."And so you just gave them my information...?!"
\."Not... just yours."
\."I was told... to get information on everyone...!"
\."Bastard!! Don't tell me that covers us too?!"

\."I didn't know...!
 I had no idea what they'd do to me if I resisted!"

\."Their power is too immense...
 It's hardly even an exaggeration to say
 they control the dark side of society..."

\."Shaddup...! What'd you use this data for?!
 Depending on your answer, I may just have to
 kick your ass right here!!"
\."Mm... What're you doing, meow...?"

\."Why am I being carried around, woof?!
 Meooow! Let me down, suit-and-specs!!"
\."A-Ahh... Sorry...!"

\."Good for you, suit-and-specs!
 You stopped the ceiling trap, meow?"
\."We were able to stop it thanks to you, Gin."

\."I knew it, meow!
 You should be grateful, woof!"
\."Th-Thanks, Gin..."
\."Tch! Took the wind outta my sails..."
\."I've been saved... Haha..."
\."I'm the leader, meow! It's only natural, woof!"

\."Yer a big man, Gin!
 C'mere and show me that wound."

\."Come to think of it, my head kinda hurts, meow!
 Do something, muscle gorilla!"

\."Whew...
 I was nearly scrapped by my allies there..."

\."All thanks to Gin.
 He seems fond of you."

\."Is he really?
 Even though he calls me "suit-and-specs"...?"
\."Yeah... Maybe because of that, in fact."

\."When we first got here...
 There was someone else in a suit and glasses."
\."That was Professor Mishima."
\."It wasn't for long, but Gin and him acted together."
\."But he died...?"
\."Yep. Killed with his collar..."
\."Still not sure where his head is, even now."
\."O-Oh dear..."

\."Think of it from Gin's perspective.
 It was the first time he'd seen a person
 he had conversations with die before his eyes."

\."..."Couldn't he have been saved?"
 Maybe he had regrets like that..."
\."Is Gin associating me with him...?"
\."And that's why he tried to protect me..."
\."Maybe so."

\."What an idiot... He nearly died over that,
 for the sake of someone he barely even knows...?!"
\."When I'm not even human anymore...!!"
\."Wahaha... Doesn't seem that part matters to Gin."
\."Let's go... You don't wanna get separated."

\.\C[6]Report. We've located two promising choices
who meet Gashu's requirements.

\.\C[6]Both are extremely capable,
but are treated poorly at their current workplaces.

\.\C[6]Michiru Namida is a diehard researcher. Extraction
should be simple if offered an ideal environment.

\.\C[6]Emiri Harai is satisfied at present.
Extracting her will prove more difficult.

\.\C[6]The biggest reason is the presence of
the man she is considering marrying at her workplace.
\.\C[6]If we can't win her over, there's only one thing to do.

 If you say so, then I guess we won't... Haha..."

\."Haha... Can we do that later?
 There's a lot I want to check on..."
65-2-message: "Oh? You look like you're in a hurry."

2-1-message:
\."Well? Are you done passing around
 that dirty role of "being it"?"

\."That's not it at all!!
 We're all allies!!"

\."Is that sooo! That's perfect in its own way!
 How beautiful!!"
\."A gun is against the rules of tag... right?"

\."...Sure.
 As long as you're going to follow the rules..."
\."Hmph... Your life as a runaway is over..."
\."Hmph... Your life as a runaway is over..."
\."I won't forgive you even if you apologize, meow!"

\."Because, look...
 I don't even have a collar to play tag with."

\."What do we do, meow?!
 Even if we tag him, there's no point, woof!!"

\."Ahaha. I did say you should've
 given me back that collar, didn't I?"

\."What will you do?
 If you give it back, I'll put it on."

\."But of course, only once you leave here...
 Slowly..."

\."Or else, do you want us to
 kill each other violently after all?"

\."It's too good to be true...
 Feels like you've got something planned."

\."I can't see this futile chase
 as anything but a time-waster..."
\."Wahaha... You're cute when you're dimwitted, Sara."
\."You mean the Dummies are gonna do something...?!"
\."Do the Dummies have some other objective?!"

\."That's right. Ultimately,
 they're assassins sent by \N[4]..."
\."Maybe they have some kind of mission...?"

\."But, but...! But suit-and-specs and the others
 went through all the same stuff as us..."

\."Come to think of it...
 Why aren't Q-taro and Mai here...?"
\.\C[4](It can't be... Is the Dummies' aim to...?!)
\."Let's hurry and find muscle gorilla, meow...!!"

\."\N[4] isn't being serious
 about this stupid game."

\."...He never once said
 that if you lose at tag, you die."

\."I'm sure he's just waiting
 for something to happen."
\."Is try to destroy us from the inside..."

\."It's amazing how ridiculous you can be
 at a time like this..."

\."You don't mean...
 He's gonna make the Dummies do something?!"

\."Surely you don't mean...
 He intends to have the Dummies do something?!"

\."But, but...! But suit-and-specs and the others
 went through all the same stuff as us..."

\."...Then why do you suppose
 not everyone has assembled here?"
\.\C[4](He's right... Q-taro and Mai aren't here!!)

3-4-message:
\."I've met you before...!
 Ain't that right?!"
\."This photo! You took it, didn't you?!"

\."And it wasn't just once...!
 We must've met a bunch of times!"

\."After it, too...!
 When you should've been dead!!"
\."Back then... you made a request of me!"

\."You made up this shitty murder case...
 and pinned the crime on Alice!!"
\."...I was thinking I'd call upon this."

\."How cruel... I really did die then!
 Have some sympathy!"
\."Why would a dead man come back to life...?"
\."I'm sure it flows within you! A vile black blood...!!"

\."As if I don't know that!!
 I'm not some kind of moron, you knooow?!"

\."Could you not be so irresponsible?!
 Obviously he's prepared to shoot me down!!"
\."...I was just thinking I'd use this."
\.\C[3]Something pierced the wall with a loud sound.
\.\C[4](But if we got hit by something like that...!)

\."Miss Reko, you're saying
 that I fabricated my own death..."
\C[3]\N[4] took the hand out from the wall.

\."Just so we're clear, miss Reko...
 I'm deeply angry."
\."Even I didn't plan for such an incident."

\."It made me lose my seat in the Death Game
 that I was so looking forward to..."
\."I'd hoped to kill Alice for that by my own hand."

\."And also... you haven't properly
 remembered everything yet."
\."That lantern... it'll reveal the truth for you."

\."Go try it out.
 ...Not just on miss Reko, but on everyone."

\."Still, I definitely think seaweed-head
 framed Stripey, meow..."
\."Alice was... a weak person... nicer than anyone..."

\."Thinking about it now...
 It'd all make sense if it was all that guy's fault!"
\."I should have... believed in my bro..."
\.\C[4](Reko was trying to accept Alice's crime...)

\.\C[4](She tried to convince herself
 that it was Alice's fault...)
\.\C[4](But if we got hit by something like that...!)
\."So? Are you still going to consider me a human?"
\C[3]\N[4] took the hand out from the wall.

\."Just so we're clear, Alice...
 I'm deeply angry."
\."Even I didn't plan for such an incident."

\."It made me lose my seat in the Death Game
 that I was so looking forward to..."
\."I won't forgive you for that, Alice."

\."And also... you're barking up the wrong tree
 putting all the blame on me."
\."That lantern... it'll reveal your true sin."

\."Go try it out.
 ...Not just on Alice, but on everyone."

\."I was so nervous, meow... If that thing flew at me,
 I wouldn't be able to dodge, woof!"

\."Maybe that's the extent of
 the anger left within me..."

\.\C[4](Alice used Safalin's machine
 to erase his painful memories of Reko...)

\.\C[4](Did that keep him
 from falling for that provocation?)
\.\C[4](...Is it right to call that happiness?)

 Should we split up and search for clues now?"
\."We don't have many people. Let's do what we can."
\."Be sure to put your safety first."
"Ehh? It'd be best if we stuck together..."
\."Huh...? So you don't trust us after all?"

\.\C[3]I agree to devote myself to
Asunaro for granting my wish.

"Asunaro... that's a type of cypress, right?
 So like, devoting yourself to the environment...?"
\."Don't be stupid! You know what they mean by Asunaro!"

\."Basically... it means giving yourself
 to the organization, right...?"

\."You could take it to mean... "I won't complain
 even if you play with my life in a Death Game.""
\."In exchange for just a single wish...?!"

\."It ain't possible!
 No way we signed something like that..."

\."What would happen if I wished
 to "put an end to the Death Game"...?"
\."Would it all end... at the cost of my life?"
\."There'd be no point! I wouldn't want that!!"

\.\C[3]It felt like a cold wind blew
through a crack in my heart.

\.\C[3]I've come all this way, constantly thinking
that I wanted to live, that I didn't want to die.
\.\C[3]And yet... the opposite feeling tugs at my heart...
\.\C[3]If I died... everyone could be saved.
\C[10]I want to survive, no matter who it costs.

2-1-message: \."Kind of makes my heart pound to visit here..."
3-1-message: \."Doubt there's any fuel... The doors open, though."
\."Huh? There's a license sitting on the seat."
\."Hm? There's a license on the seat..."

\."Yeah, sure enough...
 This must be the "place of memories"
 for your friendly policeman."

\."If we need memories...
 Guess I gotta tell you now."

\."You remember the story I told you
 about why I wanted to be a policeman...?"

\."I usually prefer "Mr. Policeman," okay?
 I'm not a geezer!"

\."Haha, what a fibber.
 You got in a fight, right? I saw it happen."
\."Drop by the police box! We've got tasty coffee."
\."Huh... So that's why you started punching?"
\."I mean, those guys were making fun of me..."

\."Fists of justice, eh...
 I'm fond of it, but that's not really very nice."
\."Why not...? I was in the right, wasn't I?"

\."...Exactly. The more right you are, the less reason
 to stop you from throwing hands, right?"
\."But cops use force to stop criminals, right...?!"

\."Well now, kiddo...
 Could it be you wanna be a policeman?"

\."Well, huh! Did you see your friendly policeman
 and wanna become one too? Gahaha!"

\."Kiddo... No, Keiji.
 I've got something nice for ya."

\."That thing you're always carrying?
 Ain't it important...?"
\."Yep, it'd be trouble if I lost it..."

\."Then I don't want it!
 And like, isn't this thing meant as
 a wish for safe childbirth...?!"
\."Yep! 'Cause Mr. Policeman's gonna be a dad soon."

\."Okay, let's do this. Keiji, when you become
 a policeman, come bring this back to me."

\."Well, duty calls! Come visit sometime, Keiji.
 And don't leave your coffee next time!"
\."I've got my hopes up for you!"

\."Haha... Never thought the day would come
 I'd tell that to somebody..."

"That's the first time you've willingly chosen
 to tell us about yourself..."
\."Maybe I wanted you to know about it, Sara..."

"You must have some good memories
 associated with this place..."

\."Well, shoot...
 Better figure out what you like for next time."

\."Well, huh... And here I was sure this was a copy of
 the place I wound up after my violent outburst."
\."Waugh, what an awful memory in comparison..."
\."That doesn't sound like as nice a story..."

 Jes' who or what are you?!"
\."Huh...? So sure enough, you don't remember..."

\."That's perfectly fine, though!
 I'm your Floor Master this time! Hello!"

\."Yep! I waited for 5 hours in that coffin!

\."Now now, gather closer to me!"
\."Heeheehee... You too, \C[2]Shin\C[0]... Come on."
\."And you, Alice... my murderer."
\."As I thought... You're the real Sou Hiyori...!!"

50-1-message: \."*pant*... *pant*...! Q-taro!!"
\."Muscle gorillaaa! Where are you, meooow?!"

\."*pant*... *gasp*...! It's okay...
 I'm... awright...!"

\."Never been more glad about
 workin' on my body than today, I tell ya...!"
\."Tch...! How'd she screw that up?!"

\."What a moron!
 To get killed before you could even...!!"
\."I ain't killed her..."

\."Jes' knocked her away a li'l...
 She probably just shut down..."
\."What the...?! You didn't kill her?"
\."Are you stupid?! Why would you go easy on her...?!"
\."She seriously meant to take your life...!!"
\."That ain't what she really thinks!!"
\."That goes for all you guys, right...?"

\."\N[4]'s got your lives in his hands...
 So yer just bein' forced to do this, right?!"
\."We're the same!! You and us...!!"
\."Just stop this..."
\."I'm sick of us pinnin' death on each other!!"
\."Work with us, Dummies...!"
\."W... What're you saying..."
\."We won't do nothin' to you guys, Hinako!!"
\."So let's get through this! You guys, too...!!"
\."Don't be stupid! Didn't you hear the rules?!"
\."One or the other has to die! We...!!"
\."Is doin' as yer told gonna lead to victory?!"
\."We're gonna "win"...!! Right, Kurumada?!"

\."We're gonna win...!
 No more draws or defeats!!"

\."If somebody turns traitor,
 how are we gonna see victory...?"

\."We all gotta believe...
 Or no miracle's gonna happen!!"
\."We're gonna become true allies now...!!"
\.\C[3]Q-taro... is crying.
\.\C[3]Not from the pain of his wound.
\.\C[3]His heartfelt cry is shaking the room.
\."Let me... treat that, Q-taro."
\."Ranmaru...! Idiot! How can you fall for that?!"
\."Oh, shaddup."

\."Shoot... We have nothing to use for treatment,
 but I wonder if we can do something..."

\."All I've got is this hood,
 but should I tear it up to help stop the bleeding?"
\."You're all such idiots...!!"
\."I mean, why not? These guys are interestin'."

\."Seriously now... You picturing defying us
 and winning, little miss middle-schooler?"
\."Shut up...!"

\."Hey, I can't touch him right now...
 You help out here, Kurumada."

\."Awright...! The bleedin's stopped!
 It ain't as bad as it looks!!"
\."Doesn't really seem that way to me..."
\."Keiji..."
\."Sit down. At least get some rest..."

\."Mai can't move either...
 You can't leave an ally behind, right?"
\."Haha... Ya got that right!"

\."If we find anything for medical treatment,
 we'll bring it right away...!"

\."Don't sweat that...
 Focus on doin' what you gotta do!"
\."Y-Yeah!"
\.\C[4](I feel it... a sense of unity.)
\.\C[4](Trust in the truest sense...)
\.\C[4](Q-taro has connected himself...)
\.\C[4](He's bonded with us...!)
\."Now... It's about time to end this game of tag."

\."Gotta catch \N[4]...
 and figure something out."
50-3-message:
\."Keep your distance, everyone!
 Don't let \N[4] tag you...!!"

\."Hey, Keiji... Since you won,
 I'll give you a chance to overcome your trauma."

\."To face the dead... That's another reason
 why Asunaro makes artificial intelligences."

\C[3]While Keiji was distracted,
\N[4] forcefully pushed him away.
\.\C[3]His face pale, he loses balance and backs away.
\.\C[3]...No human can beat the fear of death.

\."Ahaha. My coffin was in just the right spot."
\."Hey, I'll let you in on something neat, miss Sara."
\."These coffins come with a very handy feature."
\."Da-dunnn! They can cremate right on the spot!"

\."The timer's already running!
 If you aren't quick, he'll soon be steak!"

\."Let him out!!
 Mr. Policeman's gonna die...!!"
\."So here's my suggestion as Floor Master..."
\."I never said that losing at tag meant death, did I?"

\."Like Shin said...
 I never said losing at tag meant death."
\."If you would hear out just one wish of mine..."
\."I'll tell you a way you can save Keiji."
"...I'll have you sign that consent form."
\."Once you sign it, it'll be complete..."
\.\C[3]But what other choice do I have...?

\."Or stick to your intentions, and kill Keiji...?"

54-1-message: \."Huh? Did I bring back some bad memories?"
"Huh... So that's why you sought to join the force."

\."Then was your goal to become
 a friendly neighborhood policeman?"

\."No... I just want to return it as promised.
 His good luck charm..."

\."Haha. Then go and give it to him.
 If he's still police, you'll see him soon."
\."Him, huh... No, that won't be possible."

\."Even though he had his child...
 I suppose he took another path."
54-2-message: \."Yep... But I wouldn't get involved with him."
\."It's hard to say it here, but..."

\."He was fired for... trying to expose
 a certain darkness among the police..."

\."He was always devoted to justice,
 so he could be a parent his kid would look up to..."
\."Dunno... If I did, I might get fired too."
\."W... Well, then who had him fired?!"

\."You keep an eye on her too...
 So long as you wanna stay with the police."

\."How much of a grasp do you have on the police...?"
\."Enough to feed false info about the gun..."

\."Ahaha. Just as good an actor as I was then, aren't I?"

 I'll give you something good, heehee..."

"What's this all of a sudden? A trap...?"
\."But... it might help us get closer with her!"
\."Could be... It'd take guts to accept it."
"I dunno how to deal with all'a this!"
\."Don't be afraid! I'm sure we can get along!"
\."It's tough... If only we had some hints..."
\."I won't forgive you!! Any of you!!"
"I can't keep up with all this, meow!"
\."I've had enough... So sad... So sad..."

"Smiling, then angry, then crying...
 Ain't her emotions changing in order?"

"Joy, anger, sadness...
 Hmph... It appears they're changing in order..."

\."Heehee, heeheehee.
 I'll give you something good, heehee..."
\.\C[3]Maple took out a handkerchief from a shelf.

"W-What should we do?
 Should we accept it this time...?"

"Geez! Even if it's creepy, I'd rather
 she just smiled all the time, meow!!"
\."No one understands me... So cruel... So cruel..."

"W-We'll understand!

\."Heehee, heeheehee.
 I'll give you something good, heehee..."

"T... The third time...
 Will we accept it this time?"

"Ugh, so stubborn...

"At least she isn't attacking when she's smiling..."

 Give it back...!!"

\."Eheheh. I want to say goodbye with a smile..."

"A... Ahemmm?!

5-2-message:
\C[3][Maple's Instruction Manual]
It describes how you need to
\C[2]wait until her friendship is high\C[3] to \C[2]reconcile\C[3].
\C[6]The strongest doll, Maple, is a lonesome girl.

\.\C[6]You shouldn't use violence with her. What's important
is sympathizing with her and being her friend.

\.\C[6]Understanding her emotions and
becoming a good friend is the key to peace.
7-1-message:
\C[3]Green books from the library.
They're about the strongest doll, Maple.

\C[6]Hey there! It's me!
For Death Game participants around the nation
troubled by Obstructors, I bear good tidings!

\.\C[6]Believe it or not, I'll tell you the weakness
of the strongest Obstructor doll, Maple!

\.\C[6]It's the crevice in her back!
Remember this, and you'll soon be an Obstructor Master!

\C[6]A follow-up report! A new weakness has been discovered
for strongest of the dolls Maple!

\.\C[6]The key is the link between emotions and colors!
Red is anger, blue is sadness, yellow is joy! WOW!

\.\C[6]Knowing is half the battle!
Remember this, and you'll soon be an Obstructor King!

\C[6]The secret's out! The hitherto unknown weakness
of strongest doll Maple, laid bare!

\.\C[6]"When she's happy, have fun together!"
"When she's angry, hear her out!"
"When she's sad, show her kindness!"

\.\C[6]Be sure to treat her with care!
Remember this, and you'll soon be an Obstructor God!

A normal high school girl, \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
And her best friend, \C[2]Jou Tazuna (Joe)\C[0].
One day, they were pulled into a cruel Death Game...

Rather than submit to fear,
they chose to cooperate with the other participants...\|\|

But alas, high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0]
became the first victim.
There was no stopping that they would \C[10]kill each other\C[0].

After a cruel majority vote,
homemaker \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0] died...

And Sara's best friend Joe died as well,
unable to defy his fate.
As her heart crumbled, the peril only continued...

3-3-message: The next victim was singer-songwriter \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0].
The next victim was murderer \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0].

As desperately as they tried to grasp escape,
their enemies gave their very lives to stop it.

When the Main Game occurred once more,
art student \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] died.
3-5-message: The next victim was middle-schooler \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0].

And \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0], who'd failed to protect Kanna,
was left with a strong hatred of Sara...
So he started up a malicious Joe AI, and...
Sara forgot that Joe even existed...\|
\.The Death Game... is not over yet.

The next victim was
self-described job-hopper \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0].

After removing his collar,
using the last of his strength...
He started up a Joe AI.

\.At last, Sara reunited with her best friend,
and awoke from her long nightmare.
The Death Game... is not over yet.
\C[10]6 Remain
Very good... Now, try to remember more.
After this... a new game begins.

The location: a cemetery.
Inside one of the 7 coffins was...

The real \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]...\!\SE[poka01,90]\sw[324]
The one thought killed by the murderer Alice Yabusame.
That reminds me... What name did you call him by?
No... Surely that wasn't it.

\C[2]\N[4]\C[0]...
Is that right?
Alrighty... Back to the story.

The coffins also contained
6 people known as the \C[2]Dummies\C[0]...
\.Doll copies of those who died before meeting anyone.\|\|
\.Work with them to \C[2]kill \N[4]\C[0]...
\.That was the goal of the \C[2]Murderer Game\C[0].

However... the Dummies' secret objective
was to \C[2]kill the survivors\C[0]...
Those pitiful dolls were made to turn traitor.

\C[2]Q-taro Burgerberg\C[0] was stabbed in the back,
but even so, chose to trust the Dummies...

Yet as it came to light \N[4] was involved
in \C[2]Keiji Shinogi\C[0]'s past, the situation took a turn.

Realizing he had been tricked into
killing his benefactor by his own hand...
\.Keiji tried to kill \N[4] in a rage.

But with the Dummies refusing to cooperate...
he failed.
Keiji's execution was at hand...
However... there existed just one way to save him.
For you, Sara... to sign this consent form.
Now... let us resume the story.

1-1-message:
\."Well... I guess you could say
 I was looking for something."
"What am I gonna name my kid when he's born?"

\."Hmm... It's gotta be a good manly name you can trust!
 Gahahaha!"
\.\C[3]Get me out of this darkness... now...

\.\C[10]"Don't be so quick to resort to punching.
 Surely I taught you that?"

18-1-message: \C[3]The coffin Anzu was in. It's completely destroyed.
\.\C[4](I'm sorry...)

1-1-message:
"The memory Kanna's wondering about was at
 the ice cream shop she went to with her sister."

\."Her sister often went there on the way home...
 so she took Kanna there for the first time."

\."But... something's strange.
 She can't be sure of what really happened then..."
\.\C[4](Well then... Let's give it a try!)
\.\C[4](Is there something wrong in Kanna's memory...?)

\.\C[4](By using this lantern,
 maybe I can bring Kanna's \C[2]real memory\C[4] to light...!)

\C[3]Touch the \C[2]right screen\C[3] to move the lantern's light!
If you find a difference, point it out on the \C[2]left\C[3]!

1-2-message:
"The memory I'm wonderin' about...
 was when I was in the hospital."

\."I toldja when we met that I got injured
 and couldn't play baseball for a while, right?"

\."Never really looked back on that time,
 thinkin' it was in the past..."

\."But it's a real unclear memory,
 and just feels like there's more to it..."
\.\C[4](Alright... I'll try to have him remember.)
1-3-message:
"The memory I'm troubled by was in
 that place I spent time with \N[4]..."

\."He taught me all kinds of things... From an outside
 perspective, though, it wasn't a normal adolescence."
\."Thinking back... I feel like something was off."
\.\C[4](Well then... Let's give it a try!)
\.\C[4](Is there something wrong in Sou's memory...?)

 It's gotta be at the cafe when that photo was taken."

\."I swear I only went to that place with a bandmate...
 What the hell could've happened...?"
\."I wanna go back and remember it clearly!"
\.\C[4](Well then... Let's give it a try!)

 was in the infirmary at school, meow!"

\."It feels like it was fun... or maybe scary...
 It's kind of hard to remember, woof."
\."I wanna remember it properly and clear it up, meow!"
\.\C[4](Well then... Let's give it a try!)

\."Despite how much time I spent there,
 it's strangely vague, you see..."

\."I feel as if something special occurred that day...
 Yet when I remember it, it's all entirely normal."
\.\C[4](Well then... Let's give it a try!)

2-2-message:
"I went to the sweets shop with my sister...
 and there were many written wishes on the wall."

\."Kanna was looking through them,
 wondering if her sister put one up too."

\."Kanna asked the clerk,
 who her sister was familiar with..."
\."Eheheh... Do you know the Asunaro vow?"

"It was that paper on the wall!
 The one that said \C[2]"consent form"\C[0]!"

\."If you write your name there...
 They say one of your wishes will come true!"
"Ahh, there were lots of those little cards, too."
\."Guessing you wrote "I wish to stop wetting the bed"?"

"Waaah?! I-I already have!!
 Don't say strange things out in public!"
\."He said to grant your wish instead!"

\."Maybe I'd wish for you to meet 'em, Kanna.
 Your real..."

\."That's right, your fated partner!
 Don't you wanna meet your fated partner, Kanna?"
"I-I'm fine! You worry about that first, sister!"

"Well, look who's talking! You sure?
 Once I get married, we'll have to separate, y'know?"

"...As long as someone shows up
 who loves you as much as Kanna does, that is!"
\."Kanna just wanted her sister to be happy..."
\."After all... she brought her lots of happiness..."
\C[3]All I could do was gently hold her shoulders.

\.\C[4](Kanna and her sister were
 so thoughtful toward each other, and yet...)
2-3-message: "I took a major injury that threatened my career..."

\."If I got it durin' practice, that'd be one thing...
 but it was a careless, unrelated accident."
\."Stuck in a hospital room, I worried day after day..."

"I got no value left.
 I'd be better off dyin', I tell ya..."
"It's all right. You'll be back on the field soon."

\."How can I play baseball
 with these legs an' these eyes?!"

\."Sorry...
 But just quit tryin' to console me..."

\."If you sign your name on a certain form,
 you can have any one wish granted."
"I ain't gonna believe some silly pipe dream..."

"Well, that's just the official story. Rumor has it
 you can be given experimental illegal treatments..."

\."But if you're just going to die otherwise...
 What do you think?"
\."In truth... I have one of the forms here."
\."I'll leave it here for you, Mr. Q-taro..."
"But... ain't my life always been chasing dreams?"

\."My eyes, my legs...
 I didn't get 'em through above-board means..."
\."They were compensation for signing that form...!"

\."I never really believed in playin' fair
 from the start, did I...?"
2-4-message: "...I remember. All of it..."

"This was what happened...
 between me and \N[4]..."

\."Every day, like we were playing at a secret base,
 we'd assemble at his house and mess with computers..."

\."When \N[4] suddenly disappeared...
 I was left with a confusing feeling between
 happy relief and loneliness at losing a friend."

\."I hesitated over whether to look for him...
 but he didn't leave a single clue anyway."
\."All I could do was look over my memories."
\."That's when I remembered it..."
"My... wish...?"
"Eheheh... What's this now, Hiyori?"
"C'mon, tell me. Money? Freedom? Power?"
"Let's see..."

\."...Well, there's something I overheard
 my parents talking about once..."
\."I might... actually have a sibling."
"Huh? Is that right?"

"Not sure what gender they are,
 or whether they'd be older or younger..."

\."I just figured I heard something I shouldn't have,
 so I got out of there right away."
"...You want to meet them?"

"W-Well... But I'm sure meeting the likes of me
 would just disappoint them..."
"Ahaha, don't be like that."

\."Let's do it like this, Shin.
 I'll grant your wish."

\."And you... should become the person you want to be,
 so you can meet them proudly."
"Y-You can meet me with them? Really...?"
"I can do my part. Can you do yours?"

\."I... I'll do it.
 I'll become... the person I want to be!"

"Haha... Who I want to be today, "asu naro" -
 tomorrow, I will be. We can call it the Asunaro vow."

\."I know! I'll make an agreement form!
 To give form to your determination, Shin!"
"Y-You're gonna do all that...?"

"Yeah! Once I grant your wish,
 maybe I'll have you grant my wish next in exchange?"
"Wha...? Saying selfish stuff as usual..."
"Ahaha!"
"Heehee..."
"It's like... you're a big brother to me."
"It all happened... in the palm of his hand..."

\."He was planning it from the very beginning!
 Even the "Asunaro vow"...!!"
\."He just made it seem like I said it myself..."

\."He made me help without even realizing it!
 With his stupid plan...!!"

\."Even after he disappeared...
 I did all kinds of things to meet him..."
\.\C[4](Sou was made unwittingly complicit to his evil...)
\."...Well, the past is the past."

\."For now... Let's just think about
 how to kill him as part of the game, miss Sara."
\C[4](Is it all right to leave it at that...?)
2-5-message: "...I got it now. I remember everything...!"
\."I wasn't tryin' to meet with a band member at all!"

\."It was a guy I happened to know in town...
 \N[4]...!"

\."He contacted me sayin'
 "I know the truth about Alice's case"..."

\."I was so torn up then, body and soul...
 that I went ahead and met him!"

"Not so loud.
 It was an accident... It's true..."

"Who knows... Don't you think it's strange how
 they aren't reporting any info on the victim?"

\."The world is convinced a drug-addict band member
 committed murder, and insults your family name..."

\."There's a powerful force
 trying to bring ruin to your family."

"You gotta be shittin' me... *sniff*...
 Why the hell do we...?!"

"...You'll need to prepare yourself.
 I want you to sign your name on this paper..."

"The Asunaro vow... It can grant you one wish,
 anything you desire..."

"Sorry... I guess you wouldn't believe me, would you?
 I'll just call the whole thing off..."

\."Release Alice!!
 I wanna meet him... and ask him about everything!!"
\."At this rate... I'm just gonna resent him...!"
"All right, miss Reko... Wipe your tears."
\."I never wanted it to be like this!!"

\."Losing all my precious memories...
 The hell was I supposed to say?!"

\C[3]All I could do was support Reko
as she feebly stood there.
2-6-message: "...I remember, meow! Everything!"
"My real memory... was like this, meow!!"
\."Um... so the thing is..."

\."I don't really get all the details, but...
 I have this sorta condition called autism, meow..."

\."If I don't wear this... I feel really embarrassed.
 I get nervous, woof... I know it's weird, meow..."
\."...It's okay. There's nothing weird about that."
\."R-Really?! That's good, meow!"

\."But... he was the one who was all nice
 and told me I could get better, woof..."
"I'll be able to get along with everyone, meow?"

"Sounds fun, woof! There's lots of guys I don't like,
 but it's not like I don't wanna play with them, meow!"
"That's the spirit, Gin!"

\."You'll get used to everyone little by little...
 And you'll make more friends!"

\."I hated school, myself. I was quick to ki...
 to fight with people, so I didn't have friends."

"Huh! A delinquent, meow?!
 I thought you were better than that, woof!"

"Ahaha, I'm sure you'll grow up right, Gin!
 Your mother's delighted, too!"

"R-Really, meow? She doesn't think
 I'm a weird kid who's too much trouble, woof...?"
"She always sounds happy when she tells me about you."

"Heheh! I'm gonna grow up quick
 and be a man mom can depend on, woof!"

"Oh, really? I wonder...
 Should I teach you the Asunaro vow?"
"What's that, meow?"

"It goes like this: What I want to be today,
 "asu naro" - tomorrow, I will be."

\."If you write your name on this paper,
 I hear you can have any one wish granted."
"Really, meow?! It's a magic paper, woof!!"
"What do you wish for?"

"Well, obviously for mom to be healthy
 and live a long life, meow!!"
"Huh? You're sure you don't want to wish for yourself?"
"I'll be great on my own power, woof!"

\."But if mom isn't there with me,
 then I won't be able to show her, meow!"
"You really are a good kid, Gin..."
"Heehee!"
"I mean... I just love my mom, meow!"
"I signed it, woof... That paper..."

\."If I'm going through this now because of that...
 That's just awful, meow..."
\."If I make mom sad... there's no point, woof..."
\.\C[4](This was Gin's erased memory...)
\."...We'll definitely make it home, meow."

\."Big sis Sara, and everyone else...
 We won't sacrifice anybody, woof!!"
\.\C[4](We will defeat \N[4]... No matter what...)
2-7-message: "...I've remembered. Everything..."
"My true memory... looked like this!"

\."I had been gathering information
 on the murder I had committed."
\."One such morning... an instrument was brought to me."
\."I thought, could it be Reko...?"
\."I tried to ask the guard about the sender..."
\."However..."
"Why... are you...?!"
"How are you alive...?!"
"Ahaha. What an emotional reunion. Happy, Alice?"
"Don't be absurd!! Get me out of here!!"

"No no no! There is a murder case, you know...
 as far as the public is concerned."
\."But good for you, right? You didn't kill anyone."
"What about this is "good for me"?!"
\."My family is a mess because of you...!!"

\."My parents have to live
 as the parents of a murderer...!"
\."And Reko... she could no longer do music!!"

\."She can't sing, you hear me?!
 Even though... she loved to... so much...!!"
"No worries! I met Reko today and took care of her."

\."I'll kill you!! If you did something to Reko...
 This time, I swear I will...!"
"Ehh...? Officially, I'm already a dead man..."
"Does that matter?!"
"Hmm... But actually, maybe this is perfect."
\."You see, I came here today to ask your wish."
"Huh...?! What are you blabbing about?!"
"Atonement for things coming to this..."

\."If you sign a certain \C[2]consent form\C[0] for me...
 I'll grant any wish you have."

\."It's called the Asunaro vow. "Who I want to be today,
 "asu naro" - tomorrow, I will be." Clever, right?"
"You truly don't listen to reason...!!"

\."What are you saying, "who I want to be"?!
 You've wrecked everything!!"
\."I'll end your life...! Go to hell!!"
"Sounds like a deal. Will you sign the form...?"

"Oh, I'll sign it...!
 If it'll stop you from taking another breath!!"
\."I... signed it. That consent form..."
\.\C[4](This was Alice's erased memory...)
\."...Let me thank you, Sara Chidouin."

\."You've reminded me of that feeling...
 of refusing to let that fiend get away with this."
\.\C[4](Is that for the best...?)

1-1-message: \."Agh...! What are we dealing with this time?!"

"Meowww!!
 The whole room's attacking us, woof!!"
1-3-message: \C[3]The light on the locker turned green.
\C[3]The magnetic pull of the ceiling grew stronger.
"A-A whole bunch of stuff fell down, meow!!"
\."What're we supposed to do with this?!"
\."That HURT!! You hit me right in the head!!"
1-4-message:
\C[3]The force pulling on our collars weakened,
and the door opened.
"*cough*... *cough*... That was rough, meow..."
\."But... I knew big sis Sara would save us, woof..."
\."Everybody okay?"
\."Hmph... Are all of us alive?"
\."Sure... somehow."
\."Oh yeah... Are you okay, Kurumada?!"
\."Ah...! What about Naomichi Kurumada?!"
\."I'm fine... I was outside the room with Hinako..."

\."Alright, good!
 If something happened to you, there'd be no point..."

\."Such powerfully bad luck...
 If you had died, there would be no point..."
\."...Are you guys seriously still tryin' to...?"

\."Right! Where's the charger?!
 We didn't find it anywhere!"
\."Oh yeah! What about the charger? Is it here...?"
\C[4](Huh? The lockers...)

"Whaaa...! Another one of these trick doors?!
 I don't wanna go in theeere!"

"So many trick doors as usual, meow...
 What should we do, woof?"
"What other choice do we have?"
\."Sure enough..."
"Someone, please scout it out...!"
\."Gotcha! Leave it to me!"
\."Big sis Reko! Be careful, woof!"
\."It's no big! You watch my back, Gin!"

\."Hoh... So even you've become afraid
 after enduring so much peril?"
\."Stripey, you're braver than I thought, meow...!"
\."I didn't say I'd go!!"

\."Why, you...! To think those sixth-grader eyes could
 have such an effect on adults! I get it, so stop!"
\C[4](She left...)
\C[4](He left...)
1-4-choice:
We just have to enter
Somebody scout it out!
2-1-message:
\C[3][Fancy Cup]
The kind of fancy cup girls tend to like.
Seems like it'd shatter if treated roughly.
4-1-message:
\C[3][Boxing Glove]
A red glove to protect your fists.
Made of sturdy leather.
5-1-message:
\C[3][Skull]
A replica of a human skull.
Has a real heft to it.
6-1-message:
\C[3][Palette]
A board to put paints on when painting.
The paints are all shiny.
7-1-message:
\C[3][School Bag]
The kind of bag high school students use.
These high-quality materials should last for years.
8-1-message:
\C[3][Broadcast Mic]
A stand-up microphone that takes sound in a wide area.
Needs to be plugged in to use.
9-1-message:
\C[3][Book]
A book packed with lots of letters.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."
10-1-message:
\C[3][Red Siren]
A siren emitting a glaring red light.
Takes effect when installed on a car.
11-1-message:
\C[3][Laptop Computer]
A computer lovingly used by modern workers.
It's out of battery, so it won't turn on.
14-1-message:
\C[3][Stuffed Panda]
A cute stuffed toy panda.
It's kind of scarily realistic, upon a closer look.
15-1-message:
\C[3][Big Shogi King]
A large King piece that you'd use in shogi.
It has sharp corners, so it'd hurt to get hit with.
16-1-message:
\C[3][Bug-Catching Net]
A net used to catch insects.
Best used while you're still a kid who likes bugs.
17-1-message:
\C[3][Bell]
A bell to be hung on a wall and rung.
It has a fancy sound, but it's also very loud.
18-1-message:
\C[3][Baguette]
Long and aromatic French bread.
It's stiff due to poor preservation.
19-1-message:
\C[3][Fire Extinguisher]
Can be sprayed at burning flames to put them out.
This says it's good for 10 years.
20-1-message:
\C[3][Tennis Ball]
A yellow, slightly fuzzy ball.
It has a softness that makes it usable for massages.
21-1-message:
\C[3][Playing Cards]
A deck of 54 plastic playing cards.
You can play alone or with a group, or do fortunes.
22-1-message:
\C[3][Trophy]
An ornament awarded to the winner of some competition.
Cool to display, but troubling to dispose of.
23-1-message:
\C[3][Taxidermied Fish]
A crucian carp like you'd find in a river, taxidermied.
Apparently recommended for beginner anglers.
25-1-message:
\C[3][Floor Map]
A map of the room layout for Floor 4 and Floor 5.
\C[3]Closed the Floor Map.
26-1-message:
\C[3][Lantern]
A small lantern with a switch.
What might happen when you turn it on?

\C[4](Huh...? Shining the light on the lockers
 is making something show up.)
\.\C[4](...No idea what it means, though.)
\.\C[4](Is this a hint for solving the puzzle...?)
\> \}Touch to power off\<\.
\C[3]Switched the lantern off.
28-1-message:
\C[3][Padlock]
A dial-based padlock. If you don't have the code,
no amount of force will be able to remove it.

1-1-message:
\.\C[4](A charger.
 Even if we know how to use it, Kurumada isn't here...)

\.\C[4](A charger.
 Hope Kurumada can get better with this...)
1-2-message:
\.\C[4](According to the manual,
 this can recharge one person to full charge.)
\."Hang on, Sara... His head's still fine."
\."Alright... Let's connect him like the manual says."

\."W-What're you saying, meow?!
 If you don't hurry, your battery'll run out, woof!"

\."With this battery here...
 you could extend the others' lives, right...?"

\."If we lose people, we're that much
 more likely to be targeted, right?"

\."So stop saying such tiresome things.
 ...Why not live?"
\.\C[3]The Dummies attached Kurumada to the battery.
\."...None of you idiots think things through..."

\."Should the guy who got himself injured like this
 be saying that?"

\."If a Floor Master \C[2]meets their doppelganger\C[0]...
 \C[2]they die\C[0]."
\."Remember the unique info each of us got to hear...?"
\."Heh... Don't even know what it means..."
\."And besides, what's it matter to me..."
\."There goes the value of letting me live... I guess."

\."...So you're saying
 you want us to protect the others?"
\."Huh?! What, what? Is that how it is?!"
\."As if... All I'm saying is do as you please..."
\.\C[4](We have to find a way to get downstairs!)
1-2-choice:
Let's charge his head
Let's charge his torso
1-3-message:
\.\C[4](It seems it can also be used as a drink machine...
 Though it consumes charge from the battery.)

\."I mean... If we use this,
 it'll use up battery from the charger..."
\."...Fine by me. You got an idea, don't ya?"
\."Now... maybe you can use the \C[2]steam spray\C[0]."
\."Ah, got it...! Let's try it out!"
\.\C[4](But it's not like we should just casually use it...)
\.\C[4](If a good use comes along... we'll try it then.)

\.\C[4](It seems it can also be used as a drink machine...
 Though it consumes charge from the battery.)
1-4-message: \C[3]There's a big charger in the middle of the room.
\C[3]There's a strange machine in the middle of the room.
\.\C[4](You don't suppose this is...)
"...That's a charger."

\."To think it's so huge...
 but only has enough for one full charge..."
\.\C[4](One full charge...?)
\.\C[4](Why does he know that? Don't tell me...)
\."You used it...?"
\."...Only half, though."
\."You think I'd hoard it all for myself...? Shit..."
\.\C[4](So there's still half...)
\C[3]There's a strange machine in the middle of the room.
\.\C[4](No way... Is this...?)
1-5-message: \C[3]There's a big charger in the middle of the room.

\.\C[4](I've got the instructions... should be able
 to hook it up. But I'm sure Kurumada will see...)
\.\C[3]Connected \N[4]'s head to the charger.
\."Huh...? Hey... that's..."

\."Ain't that \N[4]'s head...?!
 Did you kill him?!"
\."Wrong... This is a doll head, and..."

\."Don't screw with me!! Then why're you spending
 precious battery on that thing?!"
"Calm down! I'll explain...!"

276-0-message:
Sara Chidouin
This is me. I'm having trouble with a stalker lately...

\.While returning from high school with Joe,
I encountered my stalker. When I ran home...
my mom had collapsed. After that... I don't remember.

\.After making it through Russian Roulette,
I feel the others trusting me more. I'm glad, but...
it's hard being treated like a leader.
277-0-message:
Jou Tazuna (Joe)
My classmate, a cheerful and good-hearted friend.
He recently started dating my best friend Ryoko.

\.After finding out about my stalker,
he's been kind to me, in his own way.
He's the only one I know in this place.

\.Joe trusted me in both the First Trial
and Russian Roulette. Maybe the reason I'm calm
is because I have this guy around.
278-0-message:
Keiji Shinogi
The "friendly policeman," as he tells it...
So it seems he's a cop.

\.His laid-back behavior feels somehow shady.
It feels like he's trying to guide others
to put their trust in me.

\.But... Before Russian Roulette, he confessed to
shooting a person. Apparently, he hasn't been able
to fire a gun ever since.
279-0-message:
Kanna Kizuchi
A middle school girl. In the First Trial...
it seems she lost her big sister...

\.Full of regret, she asked me about the First Trial.
Professor Mishima happened to be there and lied
out of concern for Kanna. I followed along.

\.I hid the truth... because it was cruel.
But Miley called Kanna a sister-killer...!
Maybe Kanna resents me for hiding the truth...
Even though she sees her sister in me...
280-0-message:
Q-taro Burgerberg
A baseball player on the verge of a comeback...
apparently.

\.Despite his giant, gaudy appearance, he's very wary.
Apparently he was raised in an odd orphanage,
so his dialect is all over the place.

\.We had a confrontation over Russian Roulette,
but he submitted and seemed to trust me after.
Seems like a truthful and logical good sport.
281-0-message:
Sou Hiyori
A self-described job-hopper.
A timid man who speaks with a smile.

\.He's slender and might be pretty weak,
considering he couldn't even open a sliding door.
On the other hand, he made a sudden change
when I picked up the gun... It was a little scary.

\.For Russian Roulette, Sou was left outside the room.
I'm curious about the "secret room" he mentioned
finding while we were dealing with that.

A singer-songwriter who's famous enough
to appear in magazines lately.

\.A band member with a flashy look, worried for

An art student in college. Seems to really respect

getting angry with those who badmouthed him.

\.But... Professor Mishima... was killed by Miley.
...I'm worried for Nao.

Kai Satou

A weirdo with a fixation on Eggs Benedict.

\.His behavior is out-there, and he says things

he didn't vote for me, yet approved of me.

\.But... He's the stalker. He could have something

Gin Ibushi
A somewhat cheeky grade-school boy
who ends his sentences with "woof" and "meow."

\.He seems to have gotten attached to me,
calling me "big sis Sara." His positivity in this
uneasy situation is very unlike a grade-schooler.

\.But I don't know how Gin's mental state
might change from seeing a tragedy happen before him.
...Even I've never seen such a horrible thing before.

Kazumi Mishima
A high school teacher who looks extremely suspicious,
but is really a man of noble character.

for all. Probably loved to smoke, despite his denial.
He told a white lie for Kanna's sake.

\.That Professor Mishima... died.
Miley's vote, claimed to be a practice... killed him.
Being burned by his collar had to be painful.
I... I'll make Miley pay.

360-0-message:
Sara Chidouin
Protagonist of the story. A normal high school girl
attending Sonobeno High School.

\.Coming home from school, she encounters her stalker.
When she hurries home, she finds her mother collapsed.

\.She comes to in an unknown room.
Enduring various death games with 11 participants,
Sara wins their trust.

\.But in the Main Game, she loses her best friend Joe.
With the deaths of high school teacher Mishima
and homemaker Kai, there remain 9 survivors...
361-0-message:
Jou Tazuna
Protagonist Sara's classmate.
A cheerful and agreeable best friend.

\.He clumsily tried to assist Sara after learning of her
stalker. Sara's lone acquaintance in the Death Game.

\.His fate was sealed by drawing the \C[10]Sacrifice card\C[0].
At the end of the Main Game, he left the remark
"all of you must be good people," then perished.
362-0-message:

\.Acts casual, but feels somehow shady.
He often seems to be guiding others

\.Confessed that he once shot a person,
and hasn't been able to fire a gun since.

\.He promised Sara he'd tell her his past
if they survived the Main Game, but who knows...

"sister-killer" remark meant it only wounded her more.

\.In the Main Game, Kanna notably made statements

on the verge of a comeback.

\.Despite his giant, gaudy appearance, he's very wary.

so his dialect is all over the place.

\.Found his resolve faster than anyone in the Main Game,
showing a willingness to doubt others to survive.

confession of having contact with the kidnappers,
he's showing signs of looking into the truth.

"Just wanna chat. You need breaks, right?"
\.\C[4](A break, huh...)
\."Alright. I'll pour you some coffee."
\."Thanks a lot."
\."So... How you feeling, Sara?"

\."I'm feeling great.
 ...I'll have plenty of Clear Chips at this rate."
\."A-Amazing stuff, Sara..."
\."You aren't pushing yourself, are you?"
\."Huh... Maybe you were trained better than me... Hmm."
\."I have to admit... I'm exhausted."
\."No doubt... 'Course you would be."
\."We can't get rest, for our minds or our bodies."
\."Yo, Sara. You like singing?"
\."Singing?"
\."I do. Both listening to it, and singing myself..."
\."Oh, really...!"
\."Hmm... Not really..."

\."What's the matter, Sara? Didn't take you for it,
 but are you tone deaf or something?"

\."Doesn't matter! Your skill at singing
 comes down to if you can sing with your soul!"
\."Is that how it is...?"
\."Now then, please listen. This song is called..."
\."Hold up! What's the matter, Sara?!"
\."You're gonna sing?! Alright, we'll sing together!"

\.\C[3]Suddenly giving ourselves to the flow,
we sang a song together.
\."Feels good, huh, Sara?!"
\."I've loved singing since I was a kid."

\."I got a lot of attention.
 Called me a gifted student in grade school."
\."So you were pretty amazing even then."
\."But it wasn't all sunshine and rainbows..."

\."...Some weird guys approached me,
 and got me making shitty songs I didn't wanna make."
\."I had a pretty long delinquent period, too..."

\."Until I settled with my current one...
 I smashed through all kinds of bands."
\."...I made trouble for Alice, too."
\."Reko... Do you know about Alice's case in detail?"
\."Nah... barely know anything."

\."In fact, I didn't wanna know...
 I acted like I never heard what info did come in."
\."Honestly... It was a shock..."

\."I changed since then, too...
 I took a good look at myself."

\."And I realized all over again.
 That yeah, I loved music."
\."A lot must have happened."
\."That's why... my band now is precious."
\."A treasure, I bet?"
\."Yeah! ...On the level of my beloved bongos."

\."Bongos... Come to think of it,
 you mentioned that when you introduced yourself."
\."Huh...? Yeah."
\."Do you have an attachment to them?"

\."They're just regular bongos you could find anywhere.
 ...But."
\."They're precious bongos like none other in the world."

\."Well, anyway! Enough about me!
 Tell me about yourself, Sara."
\."Huh? O-Okay."
\.\C[3]I continued having an enjoyable chat with Reko.
\.\C[3]I felt like I came to know her a little more deeply.
\.\C[3]But whether that was a good thing... I don't know.
\.\C[3]We would be killing each other again in the Main Game.

\.\C[3]If I knew nothing, maybe I could be heartless.
...Sometimes I found myself thinking that way.
\."That was a blast, Sara. See ya."

640-0-message: \."You've stepped out of line, Rio Ranger."
"I have no more use for you."
\.\C[3]I'm certain I couldn't have heard anything, yet...
\.\C[3]I felt like... I heard a voice calling for someone.
\."Bro!! Can you hear me?! It's me!!"
\."Just once more... Let's be brother and sister..."
\.\C[3]He was able to live... for just a little longer.
\.\C[3]That's all it was... the smallest thing, but...

\."Why do you think you were the most human
 of the dolls I created?"
\."Because... you put your affection into me most..."

\."I implanted in your emotion program
 an excessive sense of inferiority toward
 and hatred of humans."

\."Humans have it nice. I envy humans.
 Why am I a doll? What's so great about humans?!
 ...And so on."

\."With that complex you could never overcome,
 you burned with deep jealousy...
 and truly qualified as "human.""

\."This convinced me that it is
 negative emotions that make a human."

\."Yet... For the burning flames of jealousy
 to turn one into a monster... that is just as human."

\.\C[10]"You are an impediment to the plan.
 A failure."

\."Well then... I apologize you had to
 witness such unsightliness, everyone."
\."I invite you now again to the Main Game."

\."This time, card data for the
 \C[2]Keymaster\C[0], \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], \C[4]Sage\C[0], and \C[3]Commoners\C[0]
 has been distributed to the tablets you possess."

\."This has been done at random, and I imagine
 some of you may be dissatisfied with your role."

\."In this case, you may use a trading function
 to forcibly swap cards with another."

\."However, you must use the Me-Tokens you have earned
 in order to utilize this function."

\."The trust tokens you have earned up to this point
 will be essential in deciding the battle."
\."What the hell...!! Just who are you guys?!"
\."What in the world...?! Just who are you people?!"

\."I am the Reception Doll...
\! No, let us do away with the tedious set dressing."

\."I am \C[2]Gashu Satou\C[0].
 A researcher into negative emotions."

871-0-message:
"If we or any of the pairs get too far apart,
 only my collar'll activate. So careful, Sara."
"Uhh... So is just Sara fine?"
\."Of course. We're probably about the same grade..."

\."You sure? You aren't gonna come to me later
 saying you were actually my senior?"

\.\C[4](I don't think this is the time to be

 That's weird, right?!"
\."...Well, Ranmaru is the only name I heard..."

\."Ah... right... No, well, look, we can just use
 each other's first names, right? Less of a pain..."
\."Could you call me Mistress Sara?"

\."Now that's just weird!
 Don't go making this a master-servant relationship!!"
\.\C[4](Guess that's a tough demand...)

\."You're just wanting to make fun of me
 for my height, aren't you..."
\."More importantly, do you have any info?"

\."It's about these red threads on our collars
 that connect us..."

\."If the people in a pair get some distance apart,
 their collars activate and their heads fly off."
\."What the...?!"

\."Well... actually, that's only for us supports.
 Your collar won't activate, Sara."
\."So only your collar would...?"

\."S-So don't get too far from me, okay?
 Let's put our differences aside..."

872-0-message:
"Our real selves died in the First Trial...
 We were shown videos of that very moment.
 ...Unforgivable, huh?"

"Eeeee! It's cute little Sara!
 You're going to chat with me?!"
\."Not really a chat. I just need your info..."
\."Oh, like my measurements?"
\."N-No, I mean regarding the Death Game...!"

\."If you tell me what your type is,
 then I'll tell you what I know!"
\."Err, uh... Strong people, I guess?"

\."I seeeee!
 People who can support you are great, huh!"
\."T-That's true."

\."...But Sara, you're the strongest person
 in this Death Game, aren't you...?"
\.\C[4](Does she know about the victory rates...?)
\."Err, I guess I'd have to say... Kind people?"

\."I totally get that!
 People who treat you nice are the best, after all!"
\."Y-Yeah."
\."...But kind people can't survive here, huh..."
\."Urgh... I can't think of anything."

\."Ahaha! So then your type is just
 people you end up liking!"

\."Huh, come to think of it...
 Maybe it does happen in that order."
\."Gosh, you're too serious, Sara! So cuuute!"
\.\C[4](Ugh, she's hard for me to handle...)

\."Ah... Sorry if I upset you!
 Right, you wanted to hear my info!"
\."Well, it's about us..."
\."...Our real selves died in the First Trial."

\."And we were shown these Victim Video things...
 that showed the moment of our deaths."

\."Let's be honest... It's unforgivable.
 That they would do this to us..."

\."So... I want to give my all, too...
 And I want your aid as well, Sara. Please."

\."Thank yooou, Sara!
 We're not a pair, but let's do our best!"

873-0-message:
"Apparently six victims of the First Trial
 who had no acquaintance with you guys
 were chosen as the supports."
"...Hey there, Sara-senpai."
\."Senpai...?"

\."You not a fan of that?
 To me, high school students are like adults..."
\."You can call me what you like, Hinako."

\."Great, Sara-senpai.
 ...Glad you're someone who talks sense."
\."Oh yeah, I'll tell you a piece of info."

\."The requirement for us being chosen as supports...
 It's that we're dead people who never
 had any contact with you survivors."

\."I heard 8 people died in the First Trial,
 so 2 of them must've already known survivors."
\.\C[4](Kanna's sister... and Megumi Sasahara, I suppose.)

\."I have another big piece of info...
 But I can't say it yet."

\."Haha... If you just reveal your entire hand...
 You'll get used as a pawn, right?"
\."Nobody likes being used..."
"I'd never do such a thing."

\."When their life's on the line,
 who knows what kind of evils someone will do...
 I thought you'd know that even better than me?"

\."This is my means of defense...
 Don't be mad at me, Sara-senpai."
"I want us to be friends, Hinako."
\."Oh, neat. Are we going on a date?"
\."Don't tease me."

\."It might take a little more time to hit "friendly."
 ...I'm shy, you see."
\C[10]"Mwahaha... You saw right through me."
\."...You're a terrible actor, Sara-senpai."
\."Haha... I'll tell you whenever I can trust you."

874-0-message:
\."Any memories that were inconvenient
 to the organization... they got erased, I tell you."
\."Do you know something about this Death Game, perhaps?"
\."Don't play dumb. I mean about this Death Game."
\."You saw my victim video, did you...?"

\."Just think about it... I'm not the real Hayasaka.
 I'm a doll made to look exactly like him."

\."Obviously the organization wouldn't leave me
 any memories that'd be a problem for them, right?"

\."I-I'm glad you understand.
 Well, if that'll be all..."

875-0-message:
"'Parently monsters lurk on this floor.
 Oughta round up some weapons."
"Bwahaha... You're Sara Chidouin, ain't ya?"
\."Is something funny, Mr. Kurumada?"
\."Sure is. You're just a plain ol' high schooler."
\."Way to survive, am I right? Straight-up amazin'."

"It's been a close call at every turn.
 I've just been lucky..."

\."Strong folks are blessed by luck.
 'Course, I had zilch."

\."If you're all focused on winning,
 things can fall apart pretty quick, y'know?
 Oughta keep that in mind."
\."W-Winning..."
"It's thanks to my allies. We all help each other..."
\."Allies, huh?"

\."Well, alright then. Guess that was
 the right call after all if you're still alive."
"Even if I have, we've made many sacrifices..."
\."I've lost... countless allies..."
\."Don't go makin' allies, dumbass."
\."My bad, my bad. Forget I said it."

\."Oh yeah, but really, I should tell you.
 'Parently there's \C[2]monsters\C[0] lurking on this floor."
\."Monsters?"

\."Probably just dolls, really, but it'll spell tragedy
 if we don't get weapons. You ever been in a fight?"
\."Not the violent sort, naturally."

\."Then you have your fluffy-mop buddy give 'em hell.
 Maybe if you give 'im a good smooch,
 he'll work his butt off for ya."

\."No, if someone else is going to fight for their life,
 I'm going to fight for my life too."
\."I see, I see. You're real interestin'."

876-0-message:
\."G-Go ahead and ask me anything!
 ...As long as I can answer it."
"So you're Sara, right?"

\."Oh! Let's be friends!
 We're about the same age, right?"

\."...Urk! You're judging my outfit, aren't you?!
 You think I'm... weird!"
\."I mean..."
"I'm not thinking that at all. Really."
\."Yeah, in fact, I like those clothes. They suit you."

\."E... Ehehe. Even if it's flattery, I'm sorta glad.
 Since I made these myself..."
"True, I did think it was a little weird, but..."

\."I-I knew it! Can't avoid that, I guess!
 Normally I do wear a regular uniform, you know?!"
"That hood looks familiar."
\."You're referring to that doll Rio Ranger, right?"

\."That guy's awful. He pilfered my clothes
 and wore them for himself!"

\."It's hard to explain, but see,
 I do this clown sort of thing outside of school..."
\."Look! I attend events dressed like this!"
\.\C[4](What a scary mask...)
\."So no reason to be creeped out! Really!"
\."S-Sure... Anyway, do you have information...?"
\."Of course! Err, let's see..."
\."C-Could I have you ask someone else?"
\.\C[4](Ngh... Did she forget...?)

 All I have to do is take you out, Sara."
\."But... I can't do something like that."
\."I'm sure I could kill... anyone else...!!"

\."I know that...!
 I'll... I'll do it all myself!!"

"That's not something you want! Right...?!
 So it'll all be... something I did on my own!!"

\.\C[10]"Don't do it, Ranmaru...
 I don't want to make you do such a thing..."

\.\C[10]"I don't want to hurt you, Ranmaru...
 My precious... friend..."
\.\C[3]It fills my body, and runs rampant.

\.\C[3]How good it would be
to spew it all out and feel relief.
\.\C[3]What I really think... my feelings for others...
\."Forget it... All of that just now..."

\."We're all allies!
 We've overcome hardship together!!"

\."Reko, Q-taro...
 They protected us, even as they were hurt!"

\."When Q-taro and Alice were shaken,
 they still never tried to abandon us!"

\."When Gin and Kanna were taken by suspicion,
 they still believed in us and gave us courage!"

\."When Gin was taken by suspicion,
 he still believed in us and gave us courage!"

\."Even Sou, deep in his heart, was worried for
 his allies and considered escape above all else!"
\."So never say something like that again...!!"
\."I had no right to be your friend..."
\.\C[3]The more you want to live, the more real death feels.
\.\C[3]I'm sure Ranmaru... had given up, at first.
\.\C[3]It was me who gave him hope.
\.\C[3]But I can't make a choice like that.
\C[4](...This is no time to be crying.)
1133-0-message:
"Boy, the chaos one little piece of paper can cause...
 Ahaha!"

\."I mean... I had everyone sign this form
 to have them participate in the Death Game, see."
\."So of course I wouldn't accept "put an end to it"!"

\."Though for the record, I'd be fine
 granting a wish that gave you an advantage!"
\."I never signed that consent form, and yet..."
\."I really think it's a shame, miss Sara."
\."I so wanted you to wake up..."

\."To see the awakening...
 of the ultimate Sara Chidouin!!"
\.\C[10]"My miscalculation... was having Joe take part."\.
\."I was opposed from the beginning, you know."
\."I... can't see where you're going with this."

\."Miss Sara, what do you think those victory percentages
 you've been carrying around are for?"
"Yes, those. Did you think we were placing bets?"
"What did you prepare such a thing for?!"
\."This Death Game must be a holy event."

\."Everyone must be given a fair chance...
 a way to survive."
\."The victory rates... had to be made \C[2]equal\C[0]."
\."You made us kill each other for your selfish project!"

\."And based on nonsense "winning percentages,"
 you brought in completely unrelated people...?!"

\."Even without doing that...
 didn't I have the highest percentage?! Why...?!"
\."Don't I... have the highest victory rate...?"
\."Giving me an ally... doesn't make sense..."

\."In the worlds without Joe,
 you were a truly terrifying sight to behold..."

"A stronger survival instinct than anyone else.
 A heart that would never give in..."

\."Such resourcefulness, strategy, and cunning...
 You used any means to survive."
\."...was how you used the deaths of others."

\."After killing them... you'd shed tears,
 and tug at everyone's heartstrings."

\."Such tremendous charisma!
 Even though you had zero intent of self-sacrifice..."

\."As the AI tests continued,
 even I got shivers down my spine."

\."If I could've met you like that...
 Ahah..."

\."But hey, have to obey the will of the organization!
 I'm an adult, after all!"

"Well, miss Sara?
 Did Joe do a good job dragging you down?"
\."Was killed... for a reason like that...?!"
\."Was killed... for a reason like that...?!"
"This isn't the kind of method I want from you..."

\."The people whose names aren't on the list...
 They had no connection to anything, right?!"

\."And you used them like toys...!
 For the most worthless of reasons!!"
\."We were all just living regular lives!!"
\."Oh, dear... You really have gotten too kind..."\.\.
\{"But that's not you, is it, Sara!!"\}
\."Go back to the way you were then, Sara!!"
\."Say, did you really intend to kill me just now?"

\."Why, that's strange...
 If you did that, you'd die, remember?"
\."You're human garbage! I'll kill you, bastard...!!"
\."Are you going to drag down miss Sara, too...?"

\."It's the tag finale!
 Gotta touch someone, or you're gonna die!"

\."I'll have you disappear too, Ranmaru...
 for miss Sara's sake."
\."And... give me a good show, won't you, miss Sara?"
\.\C[3]If it was my best friend that kept me in check...
\.\C[3]And I'm not able to remember him... then I...
\."Shoot...! I have to go after him!!"
