actors-1.name: Sara Chidouin
actors-1.profile: A high-schooler with a composed air.

items-1.name: Inside House
items-1.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-2.name: Hallway
items-2.description: The lights aren't on. A plant's fallen over.

items-3.name: Living Room
items-3.description:
The living room.
Normally, my parents would welcome me home here.

items-5.name: Path Home
items-5.description: The path I take to school.

items-9.name: Hidden Room
items-9.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-10.name: Red Room
items-10.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-11.name: Blue Room
items-11.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-12.name: Bar
items-12.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-13.name: Back of Cafeteria
items-13.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-14.name: Pink Room
items-14.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-15.name: Game Room
items-15.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-16.description: The passage leading to the bar.

items-17.name: Passage to Bar
items-17.description: The passage leading to the bar.

items-18.description: A hallway with a smoking area.

items-19.name: Smoking Area Hallway
items-19.description: A hallway with a smoking area.

items-20.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-21.name: Cafeteria
items-21.description: My home. The lights aren't on, so it's pitch black.

items-39.name: Rulebook 1
items-39.description:
4 people are nominated by preliminary vote.
In the final vote, one victim must be chosen.

items-41.name: Rulebook 1
items-41.description:
5 people are nominated by preliminary vote.
In the final vote, one victim must be chosen.

items-42.name: Rulebook 2
items-42.description:
Commoner: No powers. Keymaster: All die if chosen.
Sacrifice: Has two votes, but lives only if chosen.

items-48.name: Long Narrow Box
items-48.description:
A box with a note saying "Please use as you wish."
There are numbers resembling a code inside.

items-52.name: Sara Doll
items-52.description: A doll that looks remarkably like me.

items-54.name: Bath Stopper
items-54.description: A stopper at the bottom of the bath. Small and heavy.

items-56.name: Left Gun Painting
items-56.description: A painting of someone holding a gun.

items-58.name: Right Gun Painting
items-58.description:
A painting of someone holding a gun.
Has another painting on the back.

items-60.name: Spray
items-60.description:
A tool for spraying the liquid inside.
Droplets of water stick to it.

items-62.name: Light Bulb
items-62.description: A light bulb for illuminating a room.

items-66.name: Two Needles
items-66.description:
A long needle and short needle.
Not sharp enough to pierce anything.

items-70.name: Keymaster Card
items-70.description:
A card reading "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."

items-72.name: Painting
items-72.description: A painting of a man in profile.

items-74.name: Tools
items-74.description: Tools for removing screws and more.

items-76.name: Torn Paper
items-76.description:
A note with some names, including Prof. Mishima.
There's also the name Alice Yabusame.

items-78.name: ??? From Kitchen
items-78.description: Paper money not usable in Japan.

items-82.name: Dart
items-82.description: A fancy dart. It's extremely solidly-made.

items-84.name: Revolver
items-84.description:
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.

items-86.name: Dummy Bullets
items-86.description:
Fake bullets. If you pull the trigger with these,
all it does is make a sound.

items-88.name: Live Bullets
items-88.description: Can be loaded into a gun and fired. Extremely lethal.

items-90.name: Cigar Cutter
items-90.description: A tool for cutting a cigar to smoke it.

items-140.name: Stop Viewing
items-140.description:
Stop viewing personal info or victim death videos
in the Monitor Room.

items-155.name: Web of Happiness
items-155.description:
A long white rope.
...Not sure what the "happiness" part means.

items-157.name: Band Breakup Article
items-157.description:
An article on 36-Rai 818 (Samurai Yaiba)'s breakup.
Vocalist: "I can't sing this band's songs anymore."

items-159.name: \I[19]Four Papers
items-159.description:
Papers listing participants in the Death Game.
There are only 16 names here.

items-161.name: Email Log
items-161.description:
A log of emails sent and received on Kai's computer.
...Not an actual item, just remembered in my head.

items-167.name: Laizer's Chip
items-167.description:
A small chip removed from Rio Laizer's head.
Capable of nullifying the facility's security.

items-169.name: 1F Security Footage
items-169.description:
Filmed by 1F security cameras. Shows our past actions.
Sou witnessed Q-taro placing the cards.

items-171.name: Key With Tag
items-171.description: A mysterious key found in the kitchen on 1F.

items-173.name: Tablet
items-173.description:
A tablet you can use to check your role card.
Found it next to passed-out Q-taro in the Rubble Room.

items-175.name: Stun Gun
items-175.description:
A disposable stun gun that can immobilize a person.
It's dangerous, so Gin and I took it in secret.

items-177.name: Victim Video
items-177.description:
The victim video Nao had. It shows a policewoman
dying in the First Trial. Is the man in front Keiji?

items-179.name: Red Book
items-179.description:
A red book from the Discussion Room.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-181.name: \I[17]Transceiver
items-181.description:
A battery-powered communicator.
Should work if they're within close enough range.

items-183.name: \I[18]Voice Recorder
items-183.description:
A voice recorder seemingly used in a First Trial.
It gives instructions to cooperate with a partner.

items-185.name: \I[16]Green Book
items-185.description:
A green book from the classroom.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-187.name: Yellow Book
items-187.description:
A yellow book from the office.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-189.name: Blue Book
items-189.description:
A blue book Kurumada found.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-191.name: \I[13]Lantern
items-191.description:
A small lantern with a switch.
What might happen when you turn it on?

items-193.name: \I[15]Note
items-193.description:
A printed note.
It reads: "Game Start: Blue 1, Red 6, Yellow 0"

items-195.name: \I[20]ID Card
items-195.description:
An ID card with \N[4]
(real name Sou Hiyori)'s face on it.

items-197.name: \I[21]ID Card
items-197.description:
An ID card with \N[4]
(real name Sou Hiyori)'s face on it.

items-198.name: \I[22]First-Aid Kit
items-198.description: Stocked with implements for treating wounds.

items-202.name: \I[22]Paintbrush & Paints
items-202.description:
Tools for doing watercolor painting,
found in the Discussion Room.

items-204.name: \I[24]Upgrade Parts
items-204.description:
Replacement body parts the Dummies can attach.
They can give special abilities.

items-206.name: \I[26]\N[4]'s Head
items-206.description:
A doll head found in a box. Will function if charged.
A letter noted its left eye was repaired.

items-208.name: \I[25]Small Key
items-208.description: A small key Maple had on her.
